original: RV_05.001.01.1 abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣāsam
analyzed: abodhi agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum iva āyatīm uṣāsam

original: RV_05.001.01.2 yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam acha
analyzed: yahvāḥ iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam acha

original: RV_05.001.02.1 abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvo agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt
analyzed: abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt

original: RV_05.001.02.2 samiddhasya ruśad adarśi pājo mahān devas tamaso nir amoci
analyzed: samiddhasya ruśat adarśi pājaḥ mahān devaḥ tamasaḥ niḥ amoci

original: RV_05.001.03.1 yad īṃ gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śucir aṅkte śucibhir gobhir agniḥ
analyzed: yat īm gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śuciḥ aṅkte śucibhiḥ gobhiḥ agniḥ

original: RV_05.001.03.2 ād dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayanty uttānām ūrdhvo adhayaj juhūbhiḥ
analyzed: āt dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayantī uttānām ūrdhvaḥ adhayat juhūbhiḥ

original: RV_05.001.04.1 agnim achā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūrye saṃ caranti
analyzed: agnim achā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣi iva sūrye sam caranti

original: RV_05.001.04.2 yad īṃ suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām
analyzed: yat īm suvāte uṣasā virūpe śvetaḥ vājī jāyate agre ahnām

original: RV_05.001.05.1 janiṣṭa hi jenyo agre ahnāṃ hito hiteṣv aruṣo vaneṣu
analyzed: janiṣṭa hi jenyaḥ agre ahnām hitaḥ hiteṣu aruṣaḥ vaneṣu

original: RV_05.001.05.2 dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhāno 'gnir hotā ni ṣasādā yajīyān
analyzed: damedame sapta ratnā dadhānaḥ gniḥ hotā ni sasāda ā yajīyān

original: RV_05.001.06.1 agnir hotā ny asīdad yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhā uloke
analyzed: agniḥ hotā ni asīdat yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhau uloke

original: RV_05.001.06.2 yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣṭha ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhya iddhaḥ
analyzed: yuvā kaviḥ puru niṣṭhaḥ ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhye iddhaḥ

original: RV_05.001.07.1 pra ṇu tyaṃ vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agniṃ hotāram īḷate namobhiḥ
analyzed: pra nu tyam vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agnim hotāram īḍate namobhiḥ

original: RV_05.001.07.2 ā yas tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinaṃ ghṛtena
analyzed: ā yaḥ tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinam ghṛtena

original: RV_05.001.08.1 mārjālyo mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavipraśasto atithiḥ śivo naḥ
analyzed: mārjālyaḥ mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavi praśastaḥ atithiḥ śivaḥ naḥ

original: RV_05.001.08.2 sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabhas tadojā viśvāṃ agne sahasā prāsy anyān
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tad ojāḥ viśvān agne sahasā prāsi anyān

original: RV_05.001.09.1 pra sadyo agne aty eṣy anyān āvir yasmai cārutamo babhūtha
analyzed: pra sadyas agne ati eṣi anyān āvis yasmai cārutamaḥ babhūtha

original: RV_05.001.09.2 īḷenyo vapuṣyo vibhāvā priyo viśām atithir mānuṣīṇām
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā priyaḥ viśām atithiḥ mānuṣīṇām

original: RV_05.001.10.1 tubhyam bharanti kṣitayo yaviṣṭha balim agne antita ota dūrāt
analyzed: tubhyam bharanti kṣitayaḥ yaviṣṭha balim agne antitas ā uta dūrāt

original: RV_05.001.10.2 ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatiṃ cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram
analyzed: ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatim cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram

original: RV_05.001.11.1 ādya ratham bhānumo bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam
analyzed: ā adya ratham bhānumas bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam

original: RV_05.001.11.2 vidvān pathīnām urv antarikṣam eha devān haviradyāya vakṣi
analyzed: vidvān pathīnām uru antarikṣam ā iha devān haviḥ adyāya vakṣi

original: RV_05.001.12.1 avocāma kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe
analyzed: avocāma kavaye medhyāya vacaḥ vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe

original: RV_05.001.12.2 gaviṣṭhiro namasā stomam agnau divñva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret
analyzed: gaviṣṭhiraḥ namasā stomam agnau divi vai rukmam uruvyañcam aśret

original: RV_05.002.01.1 kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdhaṃ guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre
analyzed: kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdham guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre

original: RV_05.002.01.2 anīkam asya na minaj janāsaḥ puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau
analyzed: anīkam asya na minat janāsaḥ puras paśyanti nihitam aratau

original: RV_05.002.02.1 kam etaṃ tvaṃ yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna
analyzed: kam etam tvam yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna

original: RV_05.002.02.2 pūrvīr hi garbhaḥ śarado vavardhāpaśyaṃ jātaṃ yad asūta mātā
analyzed: pūrvīḥ hi garbhaḥ śaradaḥ vavardha apaśyam jātam yat asūta mātā

original: RV_05.002.03.1 hiraṇyadantaṃ śucivarṇam ārāt kṣetrād apaśyam āyudhā mimānam
analyzed: hiraṇya dantam śuci varṇam ārāt kṣetrāt apaśyam āyudhā mimānam

original: RV_05.002.03.2 dadāno asmā amṛtaṃ vipṛkvat kim mām anindrāḥ kṛṇavann anukthāḥ
analyzed: dadānaḥ asmai amṛtam vipṛkvat kim mām an indrāḥ kṛṇavan an ukthāḥ

original: RV_05.002.04.1 kṣetrād apaśyaṃ sanutaś carantaṃ sumad yūthaṃ na puru śobhamānam
analyzed: kṣetrāt apaśyam sanutas carantam sumat yūtham na puru śobhamānam

original: RV_05.002.04.2 na tā agṛbhrann ajaniṣṭa hi ṣaḥ paliknīr id yuvatayo bhavanti
analyzed: na tāḥ agṛbhran ajaniṣṭa hi saḥ paliknīḥ id yuvatayaḥ bhavanti

original: RV_05.002.05.1 ke me maryakaṃ vi yavanta gobhir na yeṣāṃ gopā araṇaś cid āsa
analyzed: ke me maryakam vi yavanta gobhiḥ na yeṣām gopāḥ araṇaḥ cit āsa

original: RV_05.002.05.2 ya īṃ jagṛbhur ava te sṛjantv ājāti paśva upa naś cikitvān
analyzed: ye īm jagṛbhuḥ ava te sṛjantu ājāti paśve upa naḥ cikitvān

original: RV_05.002.06.1 vasāṃ rājānaṃ vasatiṃ janānām arātayo ni dadhur martyeṣu
analyzed: vasām rājānam vasatim janānām arātayaḥ ni dadhuḥ martyeṣu

original: RV_05.002.06.2 brahmāṇy atrer ava taṃ sṛjantu ninditāro nindyāso bhavantu
analyzed: brahmāṇi atreḥ ava tam sṛjantu ninditāraḥ nindyāsaḥ bhavantu

original: RV_05.002.07.1 śunaś cic chepaṃ niditaṃ sahasrād yūpād amuñco aśamiṣṭa hi ṣaḥ
analyzed: śunaḥ cit śepam niditam sahasrāt yūpāt amuñcaḥ aśamiṣṭa hi saḥ

original: RV_05.002.07.2 evāsmad agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotaś cikitva iha tū niṣadya
analyzed: eva asmat agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotar cikitvaḥ iha tu niṣadya

original: RV_05.002.08.1 hṛṇīyamāno apa hi mad aiyeḥ pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca
analyzed: hṛṇīyamānaḥ apa hi mat aiyeḥ pra me devānām vrata pāḥ uvāca

original: RV_05.002.08.2 indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām
analyzed: indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa tena aham agne anuśiṣṭaḥ āgām

original: RV_05.002.09.1 vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā
analyzed: vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāti agniḥ āvis viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā

original: RV_05.002.09.2 prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe
analyzed: pra adevīḥ māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe

original: RV_05.002.10.1 uta svānāso divi ṣantv agnes tigmāyudhā rakṣase hantavā u
analyzed: uta svānāsaḥ divi ṣantu agneḥ tigma āyudhāḥ rakṣase hantavai u

original: RV_05.002.10.2 made cid asya pra rujanti bhāmā na varante paribādho adevīḥ
analyzed: made cit asya pra rujanti bhāmāḥ na varante paribādhaḥ adevīḥ

original: RV_05.002.11.1 etaṃ te stomaṃ tuvijāta vipro rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam
analyzed: etam te stomam tuvi jāta vipraḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣam

original: RV_05.002.11.2 yadīd agne prati tvaṃ deva haryāḥ svarvatīr apa enā jayema
analyzed: yadi id agne prati tvam deva haryāḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ enāḥ jayema

original: RV_05.002.12.1 tuvigrīvo vṛṣabho vāvṛdhāno 'śatrv aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ
analyzed: tuvi grīvaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ śatru aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ

original: RV_05.002.12.2 itīmam agnim amṛtā avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsad dhaviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat
analyzed: iti imam agnim amṛtāḥ avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat haviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_05.003.01.1 tvam agne varuṇo jāyase yat tvam mitro bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ
analyzed: tvam agne varuṇaḥ jāyase yat tvam mitraḥ bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ

original: RV_05.003.01.2 tve viśve sahasas putra devās tvam indro dāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: tve viśve sahasas putra devāḥ tvam indraḥ dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_05.003.02.1 tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnāṃ nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi
analyzed: tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnām nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi

original: RV_05.003.02.2 añjanti mitraṃ sudhitaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi
analyzed: añjanti mitram sudhitam na gobhiḥ yat dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi

original: RV_05.003.03.1 tava śriye maruto marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram
analyzed: tava śriye marutaḥ marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram

original: RV_05.003.03.2 padaṃ yad viṣṇor upamaṃ nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyaṃ nāma gonām
analyzed: padam yat viṣṇoḥ upamam nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyam nāma gonām

original: RV_05.003.04.1 tava śriyā sudṛśo deva devāḥ purū dadhānā amṛtaṃ sapanta
analyzed: tava śriyā sudṛśaḥ deva devāḥ purū dadhānāḥ amṛtam sapanta

original: RV_05.003.04.2 hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur daśasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ
analyzed: hotāram agnim manuṣaḥ ni ṣeduḥ daśasyantaḥ uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ

original: RV_05.003.05.1 na tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paro asti svadhāvaḥ
analyzed: na tvat hotā pūrvaḥ agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paraḥ asti svadhāvas

original: RV_05.003.05.2 viśaś ca yasyā atithir bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavad deva martān
analyzed: viśaḥ ca yasyāḥ atithiḥ bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavat deva martān

original: RV_05.003.06.1 vayam agne vanuyāma tvotā vasūyavo haviṣā budhyamānāḥ
analyzed: vayam agne vanuyāma tvotāḥ vasūyavaḥ haviṣā budhyamānāḥ

original: RV_05.003.06.2 vayaṃ samarye vidatheṣv ahnāṃ vayaṃ rāyā sahasas putra martān
analyzed: vayam samarye vidatheṣu ahnām vayam rāyā sahasas putra martān

original: RV_05.003.07.1 yo na āgo abhy eno bharāty adhīd agham aghaśaṃse dadhāta
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ āgaḥ abhi enaḥ bharāti adhi id agham agha śaṃse dadhāta

original: RV_05.003.07.2 jahī cikitvo abhiśastim etām agne yo no marcayati dvayena
analyzed: jahi cikitvaḥ abhiśastim etām agne yaḥ naḥ marcayati dvayena

original: RV_05.003.08.1 tvām asyā vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta havyaiḥ
analyzed: tvām asyāḥ vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta havyaiḥ

original: RV_05.003.08.2 saṃsthe yad agna īyase rayīṇāṃ devo martair vasubhir idhyamānaḥ
analyzed: saṃsthe yat agne īyase rayīṇām devaḥ martaiḥ vasubhiḥ idhyamānaḥ

original: RV_05.003.09.1 ava spṛdhi pitaraṃ yodhi vidvān putro yas te sahasaḥ sūna ūhe
analyzed: ava spṛdhi pitaram yodhi vidvān putraḥ yaḥ te sahasaḥ sūno ūhe

original: RV_05.003.09.2 kadā cikitvo abhi cakṣase no 'gne kadām ṛtacid yātayāse
analyzed: kadā cikitvaḥ abhi cakṣase naḥ gne ṛta cit yātayāse

original: RV_05.003.10.1 bhūri nāma vandamāno dadhāti pitā vaso yadi taj joṣayāse
analyzed: bhūri nāma vandamānaḥ dadhāti pitā vaso yadi tat joṣayāse

original: RV_05.003.10.2 kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agnir vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ
analyzed: kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agniḥ vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_05.003.11.1 tvam aṅga jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha viśvāny agne duritāti parṣi
analyzed: tvam aṅga jaritāram yaviṣṭha viśvāni agne duritā ati parṣi

original: RV_05.003.11.2 stenā adṛśran ripavo janāso 'jñātaketā vṛjinā abhūvan
analyzed: stenāḥ adṛśran ripavaḥ janāsaḥ jñāta ketā vṛjināḥ abhūvan

original: RV_05.003.12.1 ime yāmāsas tvadrig abhūvan vasave vā tad id āgo avāci
analyzed: ime yāmāsaḥ tvadrik abhūvan vasave vā tat id āgaḥ avāci

original: RV_05.003.12.2 nāhāyam agnir abhiśastaye no na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt
analyzed: na aha ayam agniḥ abhiśastaye naḥ na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt

original: RV_05.004.01.1 tvām agne vasupatiṃ vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan
analyzed: tvām agne vasu patim vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan

original: RV_05.004.01.2 tvayā vājaṃ vājayanto jayemābhi ṣyāma pṛtsutīr martyānām
analyzed: tvayā vājam vājayantaḥ jayema abhi syāma pṛtsutīḥ martyānām

original: RV_05.004.02.1 havyavāḷ agnir ajaraḥ pitā no vibhur vibhāvā sudṛśīko asme
analyzed: havyavāṭ agniḥ ajaraḥ pitā naḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā su dṛśīkaḥ asme

original: RV_05.004.02.2 sugārhapatyāḥ sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi
analyzed: su gārhapatyāḥ sam iṣaḥ didīhi asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi

original: RV_05.004.03.1 viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīṇāṃ śucim pāvakaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham agnim
analyzed: viśām kavim viśpatim mānuṣīṇām śucim pāvakam ghṛta pṛṣṭham agnim

original: RV_05.004.03.2 ni hotāraṃ viśvavidaṃ dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi
analyzed: ni hotāram viśva vidam dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi

original: RV_05.004.04.1 juṣasvāgna iḷayā sajoṣā yatamāno raśmibhiḥ sūryasya
analyzed: juṣasva agne iḷayā sajoṣāḥ yatamānaḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya

original: RV_05.004.04.2 juṣasva naḥ samidhaṃ jātaveda ā ca devān haviradyāya vakṣi
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ samidham jātavedaḥ ā ca devān haviḥ adyāya vakṣi

original: RV_05.004.05.1 juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ damūnāḥ atithiḥ duroṇe imam naḥ yajñam upa yāhi vidvān

original: RV_05.004.05.2 viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatyā śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni
analyzed: viśvāḥ agne abhiyujaḥ vihatya ā śatrūyatām ā bhara bhojanāni

original: RV_05.004.06.1 vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānas tanve svāyai
analyzed: vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānaḥ tanve svāyai

original: RV_05.004.06.2 piparṣi yat sahasas putra devānt so agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān
analyzed: piparṣi yat sahasas putra devān saḥ agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān

original: RV_05.004.07.1 vayaṃ te agna ukthair vidhema vayaṃ havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce
analyzed: vayam te agne ukthaiḥ vidhema vayam havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadra śoce

original: RV_05.004.07.2 asme rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ sam invāsme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi
analyzed: asme rayim viśva vāram sam inva asme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi

original: RV_05.004.08.1 asmākam agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam
analyzed: asmākam agne adhvaram juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam

original: RV_05.004.08.2 vayaṃ deveṣu sukṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā nas trivarūthena pāhi
analyzed: vayam deveṣu su kṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā naḥ tri varūthena pāhi

original: RV_05.004.09.1 viśvāni no durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhuṃ na nāvā duritāti parṣi
analyzed: viśvāni naḥ durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhum na nāvā duritā ati parṣi

original: RV_05.004.09.2 agne atrivan namasā gṛṇāno 'smākam bodhy avitā tanūnām
analyzed: agne atri vat namasā gṛṇānaḥ smākam bodhi avitā tanūnām

original: RV_05.004.10.1 yas tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamāno 'martyam martyo johavīmi
analyzed: yaḥ tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamānaḥ martyam martyaḥ johavīmi

original: RV_05.004.10.2 jātavedo yaśo asmāsu dhehi prajābhir agne amṛtatvam aśyām
analyzed: jātavedaḥ yaśaḥ asmāsu dhehi prajābhiḥ agne amṛta tvam aśyām

original: RV_05.004.11.1 yasmai tvaṃ sukṛte jātaveda ulokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam
analyzed: yasmai tvam su kṛte jātavedaḥ ulokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam

original: RV_05.004.11.2 aśvinaṃ sa putṛṇaṃ vīravantaṃ gomantaṃ rayiṃ naśate svasti
analyzed: aśvinam sa putṛṇam vīravantam gomantam rayim naśate svasti

original: RV_05.005.00.11 susamiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtaṃ tīvraṃ juhotana
analyzed: su samiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtam tīvram juhotana

original: RV_05.005.00.12 agnaye jātavedase
analyzed: agnaye jātavedase

original: RV_05.005.00.21 narāśaṃsaḥ suṣūdatīmaṃ yajñam adābhyaḥ
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ suṣūdati imam yajñam adābhyaḥ

original: RV_05.005.00.22 kavir hi madhuhastyaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ hi madhu hastyaḥ

original: RV_05.005.00.31 īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam
analyzed: īḍitaḥ agne ā vaha indram citram iha priyam

original: RV_05.005.00.32 sukhai rathebhir ūtaye
analyzed: sukhaiḥ rathebhiḥ ūtaye

original: RV_05.005.00.41 ūrṇamradā vi prathasvābhy arkā anūṣata
analyzed: ūrṇamradāḥ vi prathasva abhi arkāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_05.005.00.42 bhavā naḥ śubhra sātaye
analyzed: bhavā naḥ śubhra sātaye

original: RV_05.005.00.51 devīr dvāro vi śrayadhvaṃ suprāyaṇā na ūtaye
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ vi śrayadhvam su prāyaṇāḥ naḥ ūtaye

original: RV_05.005.00.52 pra-pra yajñam pṛṇītana
analyzed: pra pra yajñam pṛṇītana

original: RV_05.005.00.61 supratīke vayovṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā
analyzed: su pratīke vayaḥ vṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_05.005.00.62 doṣām uṣāsam īmahe
analyzed: doṣām uṣāsam īmahe

original: RV_05.005.00.71 vātasya patmann īḷitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ
analyzed: vātasya patman īḍitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ

original: RV_05.005.00.72 imaṃ no yajñam ā gatam
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam ā gatam

original: RV_05.005.00.81 iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ
analyzed: iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisraḥ devīḥ mayobhuvaḥ

original: RV_05.005.00.82 barhiḥ sīdantv asridhaḥ
analyzed: barhiḥ sīdantu asridhaḥ

original: RV_05.005.00.91 śivas tvaṣṭar ihā gahi vibhuḥ poṣa uta tmanā
analyzed: śivaḥ tvaṣṭar iha ā gahi vibhuḥ poṣaḥ uta tmanā

original: RV_05.005.00.92 yajñe-yajñe na ud ava
analyzed: yajñeyajñe naḥ ud ava

original: RV_05.005.01.01 yatra vettha vanaspate devānāṃ guhyā nāmāni
analyzed: yatra vettha vanaspate devānām guhyā nāmāni

original: RV_05.005.01.02 tatra havyāni gāmaya
analyzed: tatra havyāni gāmaya

original: RV_05.005.01.11 svāhāgnaye varuṇāya svāhendrāya marudbhyaḥ svāhā devebhyo haviḥ /
analyzed: svāhā agnaye varuṇāya svāhā indrāya marudbhyaḥ svāhā devebhyaḥ haviḥ

original: RV_05.006.01.1 agniṃ tam manye yo vasur astaṃ yaṃ yanti dhenavaḥ
analyzed: agnim tam manye yaḥ vasuḥ astam yam yanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_05.006.01.2 astam arvanta āśavo 'staṃ nityāso vājina iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: astam arvantaḥ āśavaḥ stam nityāsaḥ vājinaḥ iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.02.1 so agnir yo vasur gṛṇe saṃ yam āyanti dhenavaḥ
analyzed: saḥ agniḥ yaḥ vasuḥ gṛṇe sam yam āyanti dhenavaḥ

original: RV_05.006.02.2 sam arvanto raghudruvaḥ saṃ sujātāsaḥ sūraya iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: sam arvantaḥ raghudruvaḥ sam su jātāsaḥ sūrayaḥ iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.03.1 agnir hi vājinaṃ viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: agniḥ hi vājinam viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_05.006.03.2 agnī rāye svābhuvaṃ sa prīto yāti vāryam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: agniḥ rāye su ābhuvam sa prītaḥ yāti vāryam iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.04.1 ā te agna idhīmahi dyumantaṃ devājaram
analyzed: ā te agne idhīmahi dyumantam deva ajaram

original: RV_05.006.04.2 yad dha syā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavīṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: yat ha syā te panīyasī samidh dīdayati dyavi iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.05.1 ā te agna ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣas pate
analyzed: ā te agne ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣaḥ pate

original: RV_05.006.05.2 suścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyaṃ hūyata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: su ścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyam hūyate iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.06.1 pro tye agnayo 'gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam
analyzed: pra u tye agnayaḥ gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam

original: RV_05.006.06.2 te hinvire ta invire ta iṣaṇyanty ānuṣag iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: te hinvire te invire te iṣaṇyanti ānuṣak iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.07.1 tava tye agne arcayo mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ
analyzed: tava tye agne arcayaḥ mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ

original: RV_05.006.07.2 ye patvabhiḥ śaphānāṃ vrajā bhuranta gonām iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: ye patvabhiḥ śaphānām vrajāḥ bhuranta gonām iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.08.1 navā no agna ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ sukṣitīr iṣaḥ
analyzed: navāḥ naḥ agne ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ su kṣitīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_05.006.08.2 te syāma ya ānṛcus tvādūtāso dame-dama iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: te syāma ye ānṛcuḥ tvādūtāsaḥ damedame iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.09.1 ubhe suścandra sarpiṣo darvī śrīṇīṣa āsani
analyzed: ubhe su ścandra sarpiṣaḥ darvī śrīṇīṣe āsani

original: RV_05.006.09.2 uto na ut pupūryā uktheṣu śavasas pata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: uta u naḥ ud pupūryāḥ uktheṣu śavasaḥ pate iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.006.10.1 evāṃ agnim ajuryamur gīrbhir yajñebhir ānuṣak
analyzed: eva ām agnim gīrbhiḥ yajñebhiḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_05.006.10.2 dadhad asme suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: dadhat asme su vīryam uta tyad āśu aśvyam iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.007.01.1 sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcam iṣaṃ stomaṃ cāgnaye
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ sam vaḥ samyañcam iṣam stomam ca agnaye

original: RV_05.007.01.2 varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjo naptre sahasvate
analyzed: varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjaḥ naptre sahasvate

original: RV_05.007.02.1 kutrā cid yasya samṛtau raṇvā naro nṛṣadane
analyzed: kutra cit yasya samṛtau raṇvāḥ naraḥ nṛṣadane

original: RV_05.007.02.2 arhantaś cid yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ
analyzed: arhantaḥ cit yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ

original: RV_05.007.03.1 saṃ yad iṣo vanāmahe saṃ havyā mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: sam yat iṣaḥ vanāmahe sam havyā mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_05.007.03.2 uta dyumnasya śavasa ṛtasya raśmim ā dade
analyzed: uta dyumnasya śavasaḥ ṛtasya raśmim ā dade

original: RV_05.007.04.1 sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktaṃ cid dūra ā sate
analyzed: sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktam cit dūre ā sate

original: RV_05.007.04.2 pāvako yad vanaspatīn pra smā mināty ajaraḥ
analyzed: pāvakaḥ yat vanaspatīn pra smā mināti ajaraḥ

original: RV_05.007.05.1 ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati
analyzed: ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati

original: RV_05.007.05.2 abhīm aha svajenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭheva ruruhuḥ
analyzed: abhi īm aha sva jenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭhā iva ruruhuḥ

original: RV_05.007.06.1 yam martyaḥ puruspṛhaṃ vidad viśvasya dhāyase
analyzed: yam martyaḥ puruspṛham vidat viśvasya dhāyase

original: RV_05.007.06.2 pra svādanam pitūnām astatātiṃ cid āyave
analyzed: pra svādanam pitūnām astatātim cit āyave

original: RV_05.007.07.1 sa hi ṣmā dhanvākṣitaṃ dātā na dāty ā paśuḥ
analyzed: sa hi sma dhanva akṣitam dātā na dāti ā paśuḥ

original: RV_05.007.07.2 hiriśmaśruḥ śucidann ṛbhur anibhṛṣṭataviṣiḥ
analyzed: hiri śmaśruḥ śucidan ṛbhuḥ a nibhṛṣṭa taviṣiḥ

original: RV_05.007.08.1 śuciḥ ṣmā yasmā atrivat pra svadhitīva rīyate
analyzed: śuciḥ ṣmā yasmai atri vat pra svadhitī iva rīyate

original: RV_05.007.08.2 suṣūr asūta mātā krāṇā yad ānaśe bhagam
analyzed: suṣūḥ asūta mātā krāṇā yat ānaśe bhagam

original: RV_05.007.09.1 ā yas te sarpirāsute 'gne śam asti dhāyase
analyzed: ā yaḥ te sarpiḥ āsute gne śam asti dhāyase

original: RV_05.007.09.2 aiṣu dyumnam uta śrava ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ
analyzed: ā eṣu dyumnam uta śravaḥ ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ

original: RV_05.007.10.1 iti cin manyum adhrijas tvādātam ā paśuṃ dade
analyzed: iti cit manyum adhrijaḥ tvādātam ā paśum dade

original: RV_05.007.10.2 ād agne apṛṇato 'triḥ sāsahyād dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyān nṝn
analyzed: āt agne apṛṇataḥ tris sāsahyāt dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyāt nṝn

original: RV_05.008.01.1 tvām agna ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsa ūtaye sahaskṛta
analyzed: tvām agne ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsaḥ ūtaye sahaskṛta

original: RV_05.008.01.2 puruścandraṃ yajataṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ damūnasaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vareṇyam
analyzed: puru ścandram yajatam viśva dhāyasam damūnasam gṛhapatim vareṇyam

original: RV_05.008.02.1 tvām agne atithim pūrvyaṃ viśaḥ śociṣkeśaṃ gṛhapatiṃ ni ṣedire
analyzed: tvām agne atithim pūrvyam viśaḥ śociṣkeśam gṛhapatim ni sedire

original: RV_05.008.02.2 bṛhatketum pururūpaṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ suśarmāṇaṃ svavasaṃ jaradviṣam
analyzed: bṛhat ketum puru rūpam dhana spṛtam su śarmāṇam su avasam jaradviṣam

original: RV_05.008.03.1 tvām agne mānuṣīr īḷate viśo hotrāvidaṃ viviciṃ ratnadhātamam
analyzed: tvām agne mānuṣīḥ īḍate viśaḥ hotrā vidam vivicim ratna dhātamam

original: RV_05.008.03.2 guhā santaṃ subhaga viśvadarśataṃ tuviṣvaṇasaṃ suyajaṃ ghṛtaśriyam
analyzed: guhā santam subhaga viśva darśatam tuviṣvaṇasam suyajam ghṛta śriyam

original: RV_05.008.04.1 tvām agne dharṇasiṃ viśvadhā vayaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanto namasopa sedima
analyzed: tvām agne dharṇasim viśvadhā vayam gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ namasā upa sedima

original: RV_05.008.04.2 sa no juṣasva samidhāno aṅgiro devo martasya yaśasā sudītibhiḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ juṣasva samidhānaḥ aṅgiraḥ devaḥ martasya yaśasā su dītibhiḥ

original: RV_05.008.05.1 tvam agne pururūpo viśe-viśe vayo dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta
analyzed: tvam agne puru rūpaḥ viśeviśe vayaḥ dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta

original: RV_05.008.05.2 purūṇy annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya nādhṛṣe
analyzed: purūṇi annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya na ādhṛṣe

original: RV_05.008.06.1 tvām agne samidhānaṃ yaviṣṭhya devā dūtaṃ cakrire havyavāhanam
analyzed: tvām agne samidhānam yaviṣṭhya devāḥ dūtam cakrire havya vāhanam

original: RV_05.008.06.2 urujrayasaṃ ghṛtayonim āhutaṃ tveṣaṃ cakṣur dadhire codayanmati
analyzed: uru jrayasam ghṛta yonim āhutam tveṣam cakṣuḥ dadhire codayat mati

original: RV_05.008.07.1 tvām agne pradiva āhutaṃ ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ suṣamidhā sam īdhire
analyzed: tvām agne pradivaḥ āhutam ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ su samidhā sam īdhire

original: RV_05.008.07.2 sa vāvṛdhāna oṣadhībhir ukṣito 'bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi tiṣṭhase
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhānaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ ukṣitaḥ bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi tiṣṭhase

original: RV_05.009.01.1 tvām agne haviṣmanto devam martāsa īḷate
analyzed: tvām agne haviṣmantaḥ devam martāsaḥ īḍate

original: RV_05.009.01.2 manye tvā jātavedasaṃ sa havyā vakṣy ānuṣak
analyzed: manye tvā jātavedasam sa havyā vakṣi ānuṣak

original: RV_05.009.02.1 agnir hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_05.009.02.2 saṃ yajñāsaś caranti yaṃ saṃ vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: sam yajñāsaḥ caranti yam sam vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_05.009.03.1 uta sma yaṃ śiśuṃ yathā navaṃ janiṣṭāraṇī
analyzed: uta sma yam śiśum yathā navam janiṣṭa araṇī

original: RV_05.009.03.2 dhartāram mānuṣīṇāṃ viśām agniṃ svadhvaram
analyzed: dhartāram mānuṣīṇām viśām agnim su adhvaram

original: RV_05.009.04.1 uta sma durgṛbhīyase putro na hvāryāṇām
analyzed: uta sma durgṛbhīyase putraḥ na hvāryāṇām

original: RV_05.009.04.2 purū yo dagdhāsi vanāgne paśur na yavase
analyzed: purū yaḥ dagdhā asi vanā agne paśuḥ na yavase

original: RV_05.009.05.1 adha sma yasyārcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ
analyzed: adha sma yasya arcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ

original: RV_05.009.05.2 yad īm aha trito divy upa dhmāteva dhamati śiśīte dhmātarī yathā
analyzed: yat īm aha tritaḥ divi upa dhmātā iva dhamati śiśīte dhmātari yathā

original: RV_05.009.06.1 tavāham agna ūtibhir mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ
analyzed: tava aham agne ūtibhiḥ mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ

original: RV_05.009.06.2 dveṣoyuto na duritā turyāma martyānām
analyzed: dveṣoyutaḥ na duritā turyāma martyānām

original: RV_05.009.07.1 taṃ no agne abhī naro rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara
analyzed: tam naḥ agne abhi naraḥ rayim sahasvas ā bhara

original: RV_05.009.07.2 sa kṣepayat sa poṣayad bhuvad vājasya sātaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe
analyzed: sa kṣepayat sa poṣayat bhuvat vājasya sātaye uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_05.010.01.1 agna ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo
analyzed: agne ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo

original: RV_05.010.01.2 pra no rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām
analyzed: pra naḥ rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām

original: RV_05.010.02.1 tvaṃ no agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā

original: RV_05.010.02.2 tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitro na yajñiyaḥ
analyzed: tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitraḥ na yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_05.010.03.1 tvaṃ no agna eṣāṃ gayam puṣṭiṃ ca vardhaya
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne eṣām gayam puṣṭim ca vardhaya

original: RV_05.010.03.2 ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayo naro maghāny ānaśuḥ
analyzed: ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayaḥ naraḥ maghāni ānaśuḥ

original: RV_05.010.04.1 ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ
analyzed: ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ

original: RV_05.010.04.2 śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇo naro divaś cid yeṣām bṛhat sukīrtir bodhati tmanā
analyzed: śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ naraḥ divaḥ cit yeṣām bṛhat su kīrtiḥ bodhati tmanā

original: RV_05.010.05.1 tava tye agne arcayo bhrājanto yanti dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: tava tye agne arcayaḥ bhrājantaḥ yanti dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_05.010.05.2 parijmāno na vidyutaḥ svāno ratho na vājayuḥ
analyzed: parijmānaḥ na vidyutaḥ svānaḥ rathaḥ na vājayuḥ

original: RV_05.010.06.1 nū no agna ūtaye sabādhasaś ca rātaye
analyzed: nu naḥ agne ūtaye sabādhasaḥ ca rātaye

original: RV_05.010.06.2 asmākāsaś ca sūrayo viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi
analyzed: asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi

original: RV_05.010.07.1 tvaṃ no agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara

original: RV_05.010.07.2 hotar vibhvāsahaṃ rayiṃ stotṛbhya stavase ca na utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe
analyzed: hotar vibhvāsaham rayim stotṛbhya stavase ca naḥ uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_05.011.01.1 janasya gopā ajaniṣṭa jāgṛvir agniḥ sudakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase
analyzed: janasya gopāḥ ajaniṣṭa jāgṛviḥ agniḥ su dakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase

original: RV_05.011.01.2 ghṛtapratīko bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumad vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkaḥ bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumat vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ

original: RV_05.011.02.1 yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agniṃ naras triṣadhasthe sam īdhire
analyzed: yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agnim naraḥ triṣadhasthe sam īdhire

original: RV_05.011.02.2 indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ sa barhiṣi sīdan ni hotā yajathāya sukratuḥ
analyzed: indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham sa barhiṣi sīdat ni hotā yajathāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_05.011.03.1 asammṛṣṭo jāyase mātroḥ śucir mandraḥ kavir ud atiṣṭho vivasvataḥ
analyzed: a sammṛṣṭaḥ jāyase mātroḥ śuciḥ mandraḥ kaviḥ ud atiṣṭhaḥ vivasvataḥ

original: RV_05.011.03.2 ghṛtena tvāvardhayann agna āhuta dhūmas te ketur abhavad divi śritaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtena tvā avardhayan agne āhuta dhūmaḥ te ketuḥ abhavat divi śritaḥ

original: RV_05.011.04.1 agnir no yajñam upa vetu sādhuyāgniṃ naro vi bharante gṛhe-gṛhe
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ yajñam upa vetu sādhuyā agnim naraḥ vi bharante gṛhe gṛhe

original: RV_05.011.04.2 agnir dūto abhavad dhavyavāhano 'gniṃ vṛṇānā vṛṇate kavikratum
analyzed: agniḥ dūtaḥ abhavat havya vāhanaḥ gnim vṛṇānāḥ vṛṇate kavi kratum

original: RV_05.011.05.1 tubhyedam agne madhumattamaṃ vacas tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śaṃ hṛde
analyzed: tubhya idam agne madhumattamam vacaḥ tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śam hṛde

original: RV_05.011.05.2 tvāṃ giraḥ sindhum ivāvanīr mahīr ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca
analyzed: tvām giraḥ sindhum iva avanīḥ mahīḥ ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca

original: RV_05.011.06.1 tvām agne aṅgiraso guhā hitam anv avindañ chiśriyāṇaṃ vane vane
analyzed: tvām agne aṅgirasaḥ guhā hitam anu avindam śiśriyāṇam vane vane

original: RV_05.011.06.2 sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ saho mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasas putram aṅgiraḥ
analyzed: sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ sahaḥ mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasaḥ putram aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_05.012.01.1 prāgnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma
analyzed: pra agnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma

original: RV_05.012.01.2 ghṛtaṃ na yajña āsyQ supūtaṃ giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm
analyzed: ghṛtam na yajñe āsyam su pūtam giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm

original: RV_05.012.02.1 ṛtaṃ cikitva ṛtam ic cikiddhy ṛtasya dhārā anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ
analyzed: ṛtam cikitvaḥ ṛtam id cikiddhi ṛtasya dhārāḥ anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_05.012.02.2 nāhaṃ yātuṃ sahasā na dvayena ṛtaṃ sapāmy aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: na aham yātum sahasā na dvayena ṛtam sapāmi aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_05.012.03.1 kayā no agna ṛtayann ṛtena bhuvo navedā ucathasya navyaḥ
analyzed: kayā naḥ agne ṛtayan ṛtena bhuvaḥ navedāḥ ucathasya navyaḥ

original: RV_05.012.03.2 vedā me deva ṛtupā ṛtūnāṃ nāham patiṃ sanitur asya rāyaḥ
analyzed: vedā me devaḥ ṛtu pāḥ ṛtūnām na aham patim sanituḥ asya rāyaḥ

original: RV_05.012.04.1 ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ
analyzed: ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ

original: RV_05.012.04.2 ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ka āsato vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ
analyzed: ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ke āsataḥ vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ

original: RV_05.012.05.1 sakhāyas te viṣuṇā agna ete śivāsaḥ santo aśivā abhūvan
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ te viṣuṇāḥ agne ete śivāsaḥ santaḥ aśivāḥ abhūvan

original: RV_05.012.05.2 adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhir ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ
analyzed: adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhiḥ ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ

original: RV_05.012.06.1 yas te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭa ṛtaṃ sa pāty aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭe ṛtam sa pāti aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_05.012.06.2 tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthur ā sādhur etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ
analyzed: tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthuḥ ā sādhuḥ etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ

original: RV_05.013.01.1 arcantas tvā havāmahe 'rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi
analyzed: arcantaḥ tvā havāmahe rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: RV_05.013.01.2 agne arcanta ūtaye
analyzed: agne arcantaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_05.013.02.1 agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ
analyzed: agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ

original: RV_05.013.02.2 devasya draviṇasyavaḥ
analyzed: devasya draviṇasyavaḥ

original: RV_05.013.03.1 agnir juṣata no giro hotā yo mānuṣeṣv ā
analyzed: agniḥ juṣata naḥ giraḥ hotā yaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā

original: RV_05.013.03.2 sa yakṣad daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: sa yakṣat daivyam janam

original: RV_05.013.04.1 tvam agne saprathā asi juṣṭo hotā vareṇyaḥ
analyzed: tvam agne saprathāḥ asi juṣṭaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_05.013.04.2 tvayā yajñaṃ vi tanvate
analyzed: tvayā yajñam vi tanvate

original: RV_05.013.05.1 tvām agne vājasātamaṃ viprā vardhanti suṣṭutam
analyzed: tvām agne vāja sātamam viprāḥ vardhanti suṣṭutam

original: RV_05.013.05.2 sa no rāsva suvīryam
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_05.013.06.1 agne nemir arāṃ iva devāṃs tvam paribhūr asi
analyzed: agne nemiḥ arām iva devān tvam paribhūḥ asi

original: RV_05.013.06.2 ā rādhaś citram ṛñjase
analyzed: ā rādhaḥ citram ṛñjase

original: RV_05.014.01.1 agniṃ stomena bodhaya samidhāno amartyam
analyzed: agnim stomena bodhaya samidhānaḥ amartyam

original: RV_05.014.01.2 havyā deveṣu no dadhat
analyzed: havyā deveṣu naḥ dadhat

original: RV_05.014.02.1 tam adhvareṣv īḷate devam martā amartyam
analyzed: tam adhvareṣu īḍate devam martāḥ amartyam

original: RV_05.014.02.2 yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane
analyzed: yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane

original: RV_05.014.03.1 taṃ hi śaśvanta īḷate srucā devaṃ ghṛtaścutā
analyzed: tam hi śaśvantaḥ īḍate srucā devam ghṛtaścutā

original: RV_05.014.03.2 agniṃ havyāya voḷhave
analyzed: agnim havyāya voḷhave

original: RV_05.014.04.1 agnir jāto arocata ghnan dasyūñ jyotiṣā tamaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ jātaḥ arocata ghnan dasyūm jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_05.014.04.2 avindad gā apaḥ svaḥ
analyzed: avindat gāḥ apaḥ svar

original: RV_05.014.05.1 agnim īḷenyaṃ kaviṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ saparyata
analyzed: agnim īḍenyam kavim ghṛta pṛṣṭham saparyata

original: RV_05.014.05.2 vetu me śṛṇavad dhavam
analyzed: vetu me śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_05.014.06.1 agniṃ ghṛtena vāvṛdhu stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇim
analyzed: agnim ghṛtena vāvṛdhuḥ stomebhiḥ viśvacarṣaṇim

original: RV_05.014.06.2 svādhībhir vacasyubhiḥ
analyzed: su ādhībhiḥ vacasyubhiḥ

original: RV_05.015.00.11 pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya
analyzed: pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya

original: RV_05.015.00.12 ghṛtaprasatto asuraḥ suśevo rāyo dhartā dharuṇo vasvo agniḥ
analyzed: ghṛta prasattaḥ asuraḥ su śevaḥ rāyaḥ dhartā dharuṇaḥ vasvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_05.015.00.21 ṛtena ṛtaṃ dharuṇaṃ dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman
analyzed: ṛtena ṛtam dharuṇam dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman

original: RV_05.015.00.22 divo dharman dharuṇe seduṣo nññ jātair ajātāṃ abhi ye nanakṣuḥ
analyzed: divaḥ dharman dharuṇe seduṣaḥ nñm jātaiḥ a jātān abhi ye nanakṣuḥ

original: RV_05.015.00.31 aṅhoyuvas tanvas tanvate vi vayo mahad duṣṭaram pūrvyāya
analyzed: aṅhoyuvaḥ tanvaḥ tanvate vi vayaḥ mahat duṣṭaram pūrvyāya

original: RV_05.015.00.32 sa saṃvato navajātas tuturyāt siṅhaṃ na kruddham abhitaḥ pari ṣṭhuḥ
analyzed: sa saṃvataḥ nava jātaḥ tuturyāt siṅham na kruddham abhitas pari sthuḥ

original: RV_05.015.00.41 māteva yad bharase paprathāno janaṃ-janaṃ dhāyase cakṣase ca
analyzed: mātā iva yat bharase paprathānaḥ janaṃjanam dhāyase cakṣase ca

original: RV_05.015.00.42 vayo-vayo jarase yad dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpo jigāsi
analyzed: vayaḥ vayaḥ jarase yat dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpaḥ jigāsi

original: RV_05.015.00.51 vājo nu te śavasas pātv antam uruṃ doghaṃ dharuṇaṃ deva rāyaḥ
analyzed: vājaḥ nu te śavasaḥ pātu antam urum dogham dharuṇam deva rāyaḥ

original: RV_05.015.00.52 padaṃ na tāyur guhā dadhāno maho rāye citayann atrim aspaḥ
analyzed: padam na tāyuḥ guhā dadhānaḥ mahaḥ rāye citayan atrim aspaḥ

original: RV_05.016.01.1 bṛhad vayo hi bhānave 'rcā devāyāgnaye
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ hi bhānave rcā devāya agnaye

original: RV_05.016.01.2 yam mitraṃ na praśastibhir martāso dadhire puraḥ
analyzed: yam mitram na praśastibhiḥ martāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_05.016.02.1 sa hi dyubhir janānāṃ hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ
analyzed: sa hi dyubhiḥ janānām hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ

original: RV_05.016.02.2 vi havyam agnir ānuṣag bhago na vāram ṛṇvati
analyzed: vi havyam agniḥ ānuṣak bhagaḥ na vāram ṛṇvati

original: RV_05.016.03.1 asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddhaśociṣaḥ
analyzed: asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddha śociṣaḥ

original: RV_05.016.03.2 viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ
analyzed: viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ

original: RV_05.016.04.1 adhā hy agna eṣāṃ suvīryasya maṃhanā
analyzed: adhā hi agne eṣām su vīryasya maṃhanā

original: RV_05.016.04.2 tam id yahvaṃ na rodasī pari śravo babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: tam id yahvam na rodasī pari śravaḥ babhūvatuḥ

original: RV_05.016.05.1 nū na ehi vāryam agne gṛṇāna ā bhara
analyzed: nu naḥ ehi vāryam agne gṛṇānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.016.05.2 ye vayaṃ ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacotaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe
analyzed: ye vayam ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacā uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_05.017.01.1 ā yajñair deva martya itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye
analyzed: ā yajñaiḥ deva martyaḥ itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye

original: RV_05.017.01.2 agniṃ kṛte svadhvare pūrur īḷītāvase
analyzed: agnim kṛte su adhvare pūruḥ īḍīta avase

original: RV_05.017.02.1 asya hi svayaśastara āsā vidharman manyase
analyzed: asya hi sva yaśastaraḥ āsā vidharman manyase

original: RV_05.017.02.2 taṃ nākaṃ citraśociṣam mandram paro manīṣayā
analyzed: tam nākam citra śociṣam mandram paras manīṣayā

original: RV_05.017.03.1 asya vāsā u arciṣā ya āyukta tujā girā
analyzed: asya vā āsā u arciṣā yaḥ āyukta tujā girā

original: RV_05.017.03.2 divo na yasya retasā bṛhac chocanty arcayaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya retasā bṛhat śocanti arcayaḥ

original: RV_05.017.04.1 asya kratvā vicetaso dasmasya vasu ratha ā
analyzed: asya kratvā vicetasaḥ dasmasya vasu rathe ā

original: RV_05.017.04.2 adhā viśvāsu havyo 'gnir vikṣu pra śasyate
analyzed: adhā viśvāsu havyaḥ gniḥ vikṣu pra śasyate

original: RV_05.017.05.1 nū na id dhi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ
analyzed: nu naḥ id hi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_05.017.05.2 ūrjo napād abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaye uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_05.018.01.1 prātar agniḥ purupriyo viśa stavetātithiḥ
analyzed: prātar agniḥ puru priyaḥ viśaḥ staveta atithiḥ

original: RV_05.018.01.2 viśvāni yo amartyo havyā marteṣu raṇyati
analyzed: viśvāni yaḥ amartyaḥ havyā marteṣu raṇyati

original: RV_05.018.02.1 dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā
analyzed: dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā

original: RV_05.018.02.2 induṃ sa dhatta ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya
analyzed: indum sa dhatte ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya

original: RV_05.018.03.1 taṃ vo dīrghāyuśociṣaṃ girā huve maghonām
analyzed: tam vaḥ dīrgha āyu śociṣam girā huve maghonām

original: RV_05.018.03.2 ariṣṭo yeṣāṃ ratho vy aśvadāvann īyate
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ yeṣām rathaḥ vi aśva dāvan īyate

original: RV_05.018.04.1 citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitir āsann ukthā pānti ye
analyzed: citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitiḥ āsan ukthā pānti ye

original: RV_05.018.04.2 stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari
analyzed: stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari

original: RV_05.018.05.1 ye me pañcāśataṃ dadur aśvānāṃ sadhastuti
analyzed: ye me pañcāśatam daduḥ aśvānām sadhastuti

original: RV_05.018.05.2 dyumad agne mahi śravo bṛhat kṛdhi maghonāṃ nṛvad amṛta nṛṇām
analyzed: dyumat agne mahi śravaḥ bṛhat kṛdhi maghonām nṛvat amṛta nṛṇām

original: RV_05.019.01.1 abhy avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavrer vavriś ciketa
analyzed: abhi avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavreḥ vavriḥ ciketa

original: RV_05.019.01.2 upasthe mātur vi caṣṭe
analyzed: upasthe mātuḥ vi caṣṭe

original: RV_05.019.02.1 juhure vi citayanto 'nimiṣaṃ nṛmṇam pānti
analyzed: juhure vi citayantaḥ nimiṣam nṛmṇam pānti

original: RV_05.019.02.2 ā dṛḷhām puraṃ viviśuḥ
analyzed: ā dṛḷhām puram viviśuḥ

original: RV_05.019.03.1 ā śvaitreyasya jantavo dyumad vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: ā śvaitreyasya jantavaḥ dyumat vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_05.019.03.2 niṣkagrīvo bṛhaduktha enā madhvā na vājayuḥ
analyzed: niṣka grīvaḥ bṛhat ukthaḥ enā madhvā na vājayuḥ

original: RV_05.019.04.1 priyaṃ dugdhaṃ na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā
analyzed: priyam dugdham na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā

original: RV_05.019.04.2 gharmo na vājajaṭharo 'dabdhaḥ śaśvato dabhaḥ
analyzed: gharmaḥ na vāja jaṭharaḥ dabdhaḥ śaśvataḥ dabhaḥ

original: RV_05.019.05.1 krīḷan no raśma ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ
analyzed: krīḍan naḥ raśmaḥ ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ

original: RV_05.019.05.2 tā asya san dhṛṣajo na tigmāḥ susaṃśitā vakṣyo vakṣaṇesthāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ asya san dhṛṣajaḥ na tigmāḥ su saṃśitāḥ vakṣyaḥ vakṣaṇesthāḥ

original: RV_05.020.01.1 yam agne vājasātama tvaṃ cin manyase rayim
analyzed: yam agne vāja sātama tvam cit manyase rayim

original: RV_05.020.01.2 taṃ no gīrbhiḥ śravāyyaṃ devatrā panayā yujam
analyzed: tam naḥ gīrbhiḥ śravāyyam devatrā panaya yujam

original: RV_05.020.02.1 ye agne nerayanti te vṛddhā ugrasya śavasaḥ
analyzed: ye agne na īrayanti te vṛddhāḥ ugrasya śavasaḥ

original: RV_05.020.02.2 apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyavratasya saścire
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ apa hvaraḥ nyavratasya saścire

original: RV_05.020.03.1 hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe 'gne dakṣasya sādhanam
analyzed: hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe gne dakṣasya sādhanam

original: RV_05.020.03.2 yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ girā prayasvanto havāmahe
analyzed: yajñeṣu pūrvyam girā prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_05.020.04.1 itthā yathā ta ūtaye sahasāvan dive-dive
analyzed: itthā yathā te ūtaye sahasāvan dive dive

original: RV_05.020.04.2 rāya ṛtāya sukrato gobhiḥ ṣyāma sadhamādo vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ
analyzed: rāye ṛtāya su krato gobhiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ

original: RV_05.021.01.1 manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi
analyzed: manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi

original: RV_05.021.01.2 agne manuṣvad aṅgiro devān devayate yaja
analyzed: agne manuṣvat aṅgiraḥ devān devayate yaja

original: RV_05.021.02.1 tvaṃ hi mānuṣe jane 'gne suprīta idhyase
analyzed: tvam hi mānuṣe jane gne su prītaḥ idhyase

original: RV_05.021.02.2 srucas tvā yanty ānuṣak sujāta sarpirāsute
analyzed: srucaḥ tvā yanti ānuṣak su jāta sarpiḥ āsute

original: RV_05.021.03.1 tvāṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata
analyzed: tvām viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dūtam akrata

original: RV_05.021.03.2 saparyantas tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḷate
analyzed: saparyantaḥ tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḍate

original: RV_05.021.04.1 devaṃ vo devayajyayāgnim īḷīta martyaḥ
analyzed: devam vaḥ deva yajyayā agnim īḍīta martyaḥ

original: RV_05.021.04.2 samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihy ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ
analyzed: samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihi ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ

original: RV_05.022.01.1 pra viśvasāmann atrivad arcā pāvakaśociṣe
analyzed: pra viśvasāman atri vat arca pāvaka śociṣe

original: RV_05.022.01.2 yo adhvareṣv īḍyo hotā mandratamo viśi
analyzed: yaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ hotā mandratamaḥ viśi

original: RV_05.022.02.1 ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ dadhātā devam ṛtvijam
analyzed: ni agnim jātavedasam dadhāta devam ṛtvijam

original: RV_05.022.02.2 pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak adyā deva vyacastamaḥ

original: RV_05.022.03.1 cikitvinmanasaṃ tvā devam martāsa ūtaye
analyzed: cikitvinmanasam tvā devam martāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_05.022.03.2 vareṇyasya te 'vasa iyānāso amanmahi
analyzed: vareṇyasya te vaso iyānāsaḥ amanmahi

original: RV_05.022.04.1 agne cikiddhy asya na idaṃ vacaḥ sahasya
analyzed: agne cikiddhi asya naḥ idam vacaḥ sahasya

original: RV_05.022.04.2 taṃ tvā suśipra dampate stomair vardhanty atrayo gīrbhiḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā su śipra dampate stomaiḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ gīrbhiḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ

original: RV_05.023.01.1 agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim
analyzed: agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim

original: RV_05.023.01.2 viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhy ṛsā vājeṣu sāsahat
analyzed: viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi ṛsā vājeṣu sāsahat

original: RV_05.023.02.1 tam agne pṛtanāṣahaṃ rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara
analyzed: tam agne pṛtanāṣaham rayim sahasva ā bhara

original: RV_05.023.02.2 tvaṃ hi satyo adbhuto dātā vājasya gomataḥ
analyzed: tvam hi satyaḥ adbhutaḥ dātā vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_05.023.03.1 viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: viśve hi tvā sajoṣasaḥ janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_05.023.03.2 hotāraṃ sadmasu priyaṃ vyanti vāryā puru
analyzed: hotāram sadmasu priyam vyanti vāryā puru

original: RV_05.023.04.1 sa hi ṣmā viśvacarṣaṇir abhimāti saho dadhe
analyzed: sa hi sma viśvacarṣaṇiḥ abhimāti sahaḥ dadhe

original: RV_05.023.04.2 agna eṣu kṣayeṣv ā revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi
analyzed: agne eṣu kṣayeṣu ā revat naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi

original: RV_05.024.01.1 agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhavā varūthyaḥ
analyzed: agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ uta trātā śivaḥ bhava varūthyaḥ

original: RV_05.024.02.1 vasur agnir vasuśravā achā nakṣi dyumattamaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: vasuḥ agniḥ vasu śravāḥ achā nakṣi dyumattamam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_05.024.03.1 sa no bodhi śrudhī havam uruṣyā ṇo aghāyataḥ samasmāt
analyzed: sa naḥ bodhi śrudhi havam uruṣyā naḥ aghāyataḥ samasmāt

original: RV_05.024.04.1 taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā śociṣṭha dīdivas sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_05.025.00.11 achā vo agnim avase devaṃ gāsi sa no vasuḥ
analyzed: achā vaḥ agnim avase devam gāsi sa naḥ vasuḥ

original: RV_05.025.00.12 rāsat putra ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: rāsat putraḥ ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_05.025.00.21 sa hi satyo yam pūrve cid devāsaś cid yam īdhire
analyzed: sa hi satyaḥ yam pūrve cit devāsaḥ cit yam īdhire

original: RV_05.025.00.22 hotāram mandrajihvam it sudītibhir vibhāvasum
analyzed: hotāram mandra jihvam id su dītibhiḥ vibhāvasum

original: RV_05.025.00.31 sa no dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā
analyzed: sa naḥ dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā

original: RV_05.025.00.32 agne rāyo didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhir vareṇya
analyzed: agne rāyaḥ didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhiḥ vareṇya

original: RV_05.025.00.41 agnir deveṣu rājaty agnir marteṣv āviśan
analyzed: agniḥ deveṣu rājati agniḥ marteṣu āviśan

original: RV_05.025.00.42 agnir no havyavāhano 'gniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ havya vāhanaḥ gnim dhībhiḥ saparyata

original: RV_05.025.00.51 agnis tuviśravastamaṃ tuvibrahmāṇam uttamam
analyzed: agniḥ tuvi śravastamam tuvi brahmāṇam uttamam

original: RV_05.025.00.52 atūrtaṃ śrāvayatpatim putraṃ dadāti dāśuṣe
analyzed: a tūrtam śrāvayat patim putram dadāti dāśuṣe

original: RV_05.025.00.61 agnir dadāti satpatiṃ sāsāha yo yudhā nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: agniḥ dadāti sat patim sāsāha yaḥ yudhā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_05.025.00.62 agnir atyaṃ raghuṣyadaṃ jetāram aparājitam
analyzed: agniḥ atyam raghuṣyadam jetāram aparājitam

original: RV_05.025.00.71 yad vāhiṣṭhaṃ tad agnaye bṛhad arca vibhāvaso
analyzed: yat vāhiṣṭham tat agnaye bṛhat arca vibhāvaso

original: RV_05.025.00.72 mahiṣīva tvad rayis tvad vājā ud īrate
analyzed: mahiṣī iva tvat rayiḥ tvat vājāḥ ud īrate

original: RV_05.025.00.81 tava dyumanto arcayo grāvevocyate bṛhat
analyzed: tava dyumantaḥ arcayaḥ grāvā iva ucyate bṛhat

original: RV_05.025.00.82 uto te tanyatur yathā svāno arta tmanā divaḥ
analyzed: uta u te tanyatuḥ yathā svānaḥ arta tmanā divaḥ

original: RV_05.025.00.91 evāṃ agniṃ vasūyavaḥ sahasānaṃ vavandima
analyzed: eva ān agnim vasūyavaḥ sahasānam vavandima

original: RV_05.025.00.92 sa no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ parṣan nāveva sukratuḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ parṣat nāvā iva su kratuḥ

original: RV_05.026.01.1 agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā
analyzed: agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā

original: RV_05.026.01.2 ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_05.026.02.1 taṃ tvā ghṛtasnav īmahe citrabhāno svardṛśam
analyzed: tam tvā ghṛtasno īmahe citrabhāno svar dṛśam

original: RV_05.026.02.2 devāṃ ā vītaye vaha
analyzed: devān ā vītaye vaha

original: RV_05.026.03.1 vītihotraṃ tvā kave dyumantaṃ sam idhīmahi
analyzed: vītihotram tvā kave dyumantam sam idhīmahi

original: RV_05.026.03.2 agne bṛhantam adhvare
analyzed: agne bṛhantam adhvare

original: RV_05.026.04.1 agne viśvebhir ā gahi devebhir havyadātaye
analyzed: agne viśvebhiḥ ā gahi devebhiḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_05.026.04.2 hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_05.026.05.1 yajamānāya sunvata āgne suvīryaṃ vaha
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate ā agne su vīryam vaha

original: RV_05.026.05.2 devair ā satsi barhiṣi
analyzed: devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_05.026.06.1 samidhānaḥ sahasrajid agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi
analyzed: samidhānaḥ sahasra jit agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi

original: RV_05.026.06.2 devānāṃ dūta ukthyaḥ
analyzed: devānām dūtaḥ ukthyaḥ

original: RV_05.026.07.1 ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ hotravāhaṃ yaviṣṭhyam
analyzed: ni agnim jātavedasam hotra vāham yaviṣṭhyam

original: RV_05.026.07.2 dadhātā devam ṛtvijam
analyzed: dadhāta devam ṛtvijam

original: RV_05.026.08.1 pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak adyā deva vyacastamaḥ

original: RV_05.026.08.2 stṛṇīta barhir āsade
analyzed: stṛṇīta barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_05.026.09.1 edam maruto aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ
analyzed: ā idam marutaḥ aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ

original: RV_05.026.09.2 devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā
analyzed: devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā

original: RV_05.027.01.1 anasvantā satpatir māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭho asuro maghonaḥ
analyzed: anasvantā satpatiḥ māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭhaḥ asuraḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_05.027.01.2 traivṛṣṇo agne daśabhiḥ sahasrair vaiśvānara tryaruṇaś ciketa
analyzed: traivṛṣṇaḥ agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vaiśvānara tri aruṇaḥ ciketa

original: RV_05.027.02.1 yo me śatā ca viṃśatiṃ ca gonāṃ harī ca yuktā sudhurā dadāti
analyzed: yaḥ me śatā ca viṃśatim ca gonām harī ca yuktā su dhurā dadāti

original: RV_05.027.02.2 vaiśvānara suṣṭuto vāvṛdhāno 'gne yacha tryaruṇāya śarma
analyzed: vaiśvānara suṣṭutaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ gne yaccha tri aruṇāya śarma

original: RV_05.027.03.1 evā te agne sumatiṃ cakāno naviṣṭhāya navamaṃ trasadasyuḥ
analyzed: eva te agne sumatim cakānaḥ naviṣṭhāya navamam trasadasyuḥ

original: RV_05.027.03.2 yo me giras tuvijātasya pūrvīr yuktenābhi tryaruṇo gṛṇāti
analyzed: yaḥ me giraḥ tuvi jātasya pūrvīḥ yuktena abhi tri aruṇaḥ gṛṇāti

original: RV_05.027.04.1 yo ma iti pravocaty aśvamedhāya sūraye
analyzed: yaḥ me iti pravocati aśvamedhāya sūraye

original: RV_05.027.04.2 dadad ṛcā saniṃ yate dadan medhām ṛtāyate
analyzed: dadat ṛcā sanim yate dadat medhām ṛtāyate

original: RV_05.027.05.1 yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam uddharṣayanty ukṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam ud harṣayanti ukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_05.027.05.2 aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somā iva tryṛśiraḥ
analyzed: aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somāḥ iva tri ṛśiraḥ

original: RV_05.027.06.1 indrāgnī śatadāvny aśvamedhe suvīryam
analyzed: indra agnī śatadāvni aśvamedhe su vīryam

original: RV_05.027.06.2 kṣatraṃ dhārayatam bṛhad divi sūryam ivājaram
analyzed: kṣatram dhārayatam bṛhat divi sūryam iva ajaram

original: RV_05.028.01.1 samiddho agnir divi śocir aśret pratyaṅṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ divi śociḥ aśret pratyaṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti

original: RV_05.028.01.2 eti prācī viśvavārā namobhir devāṃ īḷānā haviṣā ghṛtācī
analyzed: eti prācī viśva vārā namobhiḥ devān īḍānā haviṣā ghṛtācī

original: RV_05.028.02.1 samidhyamāno amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantaṃ sacase svastaye
analyzed: samidhyamānaḥ amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantam sacase svastaye

original: RV_05.028.02.2 viśvaṃ sa dhatte draviṇaṃ yam invasy ātithyam agne ni ca dhatta it puraḥ
analyzed: viśvam sa dhatte draviṇam yam invasi ātithyam agne ni ca dhatte id puras

original: RV_05.028.03.1 agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu
analyzed: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāni uttamāni santu

original: RV_05.028.03.2 saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi
analyzed: sam jāspatyam suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭha mahāṃsi

original: RV_05.028.04.1 samiddhasya pramahaso 'gne vande tava śriyam
analyzed: samiddhasya pramahasaḥ gne vande tava śriyam

original: RV_05.028.04.2 vṛṣabho dyumnavāṃ asi sam adhvareṣv idhyase
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ dyumnavān asi sam adhvareṣu idhyase

original: RV_05.028.05.1 samiddho agna āhuta devān yakṣi svadhvara
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne āhuta devān yakṣi su adhvara

original: RV_05.028.05.2 tvaṃ hi havyavāḷ asi
analyzed: tvam hi havyavāṭ asi

original: RV_05.028.06.1 ā juhotā duvasyatāgnim prayaty adhvare
analyzed: ā juhota ā duvasyata agnim prayati adhvare

original: RV_05.028.06.2 vṛṇīdhvaṃ havyavāhanam
analyzed: vṛṇīdhvam havyavāhanam

original: RV_05.029.01.1 try aryamā manuṣo devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta
analyzed: trī aryamā manuṣaḥ devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta

original: RV_05.029.01.2 arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣās tvam eṣām ṛṣir indrāsi dhīraḥ
analyzed: arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ tvam eṣām ṛṣiḥ indra asi dhīraḥ

original: RV_05.029.02.1 anu yad īm maruto mandasānam ārcann indram papivāṃsaṃ sutasya
analyzed: anu yat īm marutaḥ mandasānam ārcan indram papivāṃsam sutasya

original: RV_05.029.02.2 ādatta vajram abhi yad ahiṃ hann apo yahvīr asṛjat sartavā u
analyzed: ādatta vajram abhi yat ahim han apaḥ yahvīḥ asṛjat sartavai u

original: RV_05.029.03.1 uta brahmāṇo maruto me asyendraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ
analyzed: uta brahmāṇaḥ marutaḥ me asya indraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ

original: RV_05.029.03.2 tad dhi havyam manuṣe gā avindad ahann ahim papivāṃ indro asya
analyzed: tat hi havyam manuṣe gāḥ avindat ahan ahim papivān indraḥ asya

original: RV_05.029.04.1 ād rodasī vitaraṃ vi ṣkabhāyat saṃvivyānaś cid bhiyase mṛgaṃ kaḥ
analyzed: āt rodasī vitaram vi skabhāyat saṃvivyānaḥ cit bhiyase mṛgam kaḥ

original: RV_05.029.04.2 jigartim indro apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavaṃ han
analyzed: jigartim indraḥ apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavam han

original: RV_05.029.05.1 adha kratvā maghavan tubhyaṃ devā anu viśve adaduḥ somapeyam
analyzed: adha kratvā maghavan tubhyam devāḥ anu viśve adaduḥ soma peyam

original: RV_05.029.05.2 yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puraḥ satīr uparā etaśe kaḥ
analyzed: yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puras satīḥ uparāḥ etaśe kaḥ

original: RV_05.029.06.1 nava yad asya navatiṃ ca bhogān sākaṃ vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat
analyzed: nava yat asya navatim ca bhogān sākam vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat

original: RV_05.029.06.2 arcantīndram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata dyām
analyzed: arcanti indram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata dyām

original: RV_05.029.07.1 sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agnir asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni
analyzed: sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agniḥ asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni

original: RV_05.029.07.2 trī sākam indro manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibad vṛtrahatyāya somam
analyzed: trī sākam indraḥ manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibat vṛtra hatyāya somam

original: RV_05.029.08.1 trī yac chatā mahiṣāṇām agho mās trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyāpāḥ
analyzed: trī yat śatā mahiṣāṇām aghaḥ māḥ trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyā apāḥ

original: RV_05.029.08.2 kāraṃ na viśve ahvanta devā bharam indrāya yad ahiṃ jaghāna
analyzed: kāram na viśve ahvanta devāḥ bharam indrāya yat ahim jaghāna

original: RV_05.029.09.1 uśanā yat sahasyair ayātaṃ gṛham indra jūjuvānebhir aśvaiḥ
analyzed: uśanā yat sahasyaiḥ ayātam gṛham indra jūjuvānebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_05.029.09.2 vanvāno atra sarathaṃ yayātha kutsena devair avanor ha śuṣṇam
analyzed: vanvānaḥ atra sa ratham yayātha kutsena devaiḥ avanoḥ ha śuṣṇam

original: RV_05.029.10.1 prānyac cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāyānyad varivo yātave 'kaḥ
analyzed: pra anyat cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāya anyat varivaḥ yātave kaḥ

original: RV_05.029.10.2 anāso dasyūṃr amṛṇo vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācaḥ
analyzed: an āsaḥ dasyūṃr amṛṇaḥ vadhena ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhra vācaḥ

original: RV_05.029.11.1 stomāsas tvā gaurivīter avardhann arandhayo vaidathināya piprum
analyzed: stomāsaḥ tvā gaurivīteḥ avardhan arandhayaḥ vaidathināya piprum

original: RV_05.029.11.2 ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīr apibaḥ somam asya
analyzed: ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīḥ apibaḥ somam asya

original: RV_05.029.12.1 navagvāsaḥ sutasomāsa indraṃ daśagvāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ
analyzed: navagvāsaḥ suta somāsaḥ indram daśagvāsaḥ abhī arcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_05.029.12.2 gavyaṃ cid ūrvam apidhānavantaṃ taṃ cin naraḥ śaśamānā apa vran
analyzed: gavyam cit ūrvam apidhānavantam tam cit naraḥ śaśamānāḥ apa vran

original: RV_05.029.13.1 katho nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryṛ maghavan yā cakartha
analyzed: kathā u nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryṛ maghavan yā cakartha

original: RV_05.029.13.2 yā co nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pred u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma
analyzed: yā ca u nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pra id u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma

original: RV_05.029.14.1 etā viśvā cakṛvāṃ indra bhūry aparīto januṣā vīryeṇa
analyzed: etā viśvā cakṛvān indra bhūri aparītaḥ januṣā vīryeṇa

original: RV_05.029.14.2 yā cin nu vajrin kṛṇavo dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyā asti tasyāḥ
analyzed: yā cit nu vajrin kṛṇavaḥ dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyāḥ asti tasyāḥ

original: RV_05.029.15.1 indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma
analyzed: indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma

original: RV_05.029.15.2 vastreva bhadrā sukṛtā vasūyū rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam
analyzed: vastrā iva bhadrā su kṛtā vasūyuḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣam

original: RV_05.030.01.1 kva sya vīraḥ ko apaśyad indraṃ sukharatham īyamānaṃ haribhyām
analyzed: kva sya vīraḥ kaḥ apaśyat indram sukha ratham īyamānam haribhyām

original: RV_05.030.01.2 yo rāyā vajrī sutasomam ichan tad oko gantā puruhūta ūtī
analyzed: yaḥ rāyā vajrī suta somam icchan tat okaḥ gantā puruhūtaḥ ūtī

original: RV_05.030.02.1 avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugraṃ nidhātur anv āyam ichan
analyzed: avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugram nidhātuḥ anu āyam ichan

original: RV_05.030.02.2 apṛcham anyāṃ uta te ma āhur indraṃ naro bubudhānā aśema
analyzed: apṛccham anyām uta te me āhuḥ indram naraḥ bubudhānāḥ aśema

original: RV_05.030.03.1 pra nu vayaṃ sute yā te kṛtānīndra bravāma yāni no jujoṣaḥ
analyzed: pra nu vayam sute yā te kṛtāni indra bravāma yāni naḥ jujoṣaḥ

original: RV_05.030.03.2 vedad avidvāñ chṛṇavac ca vidvān vahate 'yam maghavā sarvasenaḥ
analyzed: vedat a vidvān śṛṇavat ca vidvān vahate yam maghavā sarva senaḥ

original: RV_05.030.04.1 sthiram manaś cakṛṣe jāta indra veṣīd eko yudhaye bhūyasaś cit
analyzed: sthiram manaḥ cakṛṣe jātaḥ indra veṣi id ekaḥ yudhaye bhūyasaḥ cit

original: RV_05.030.04.2 aśmānaṃ cic chavasā didyuto vi vido gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām
analyzed: aśmānam cit śavasā didyutaḥ vi vidaḥ gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām

original: RV_05.030.05.1 paro yat tvam parama ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyaṃ nāma bibhrat
analyzed: paras yat tvam paramaḥ ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyam nāma bibhrat

original: RV_05.030.05.2 ataś cid indrād abhayanta devā viśvā apo ajayad dāsapatnīḥ
analyzed: atas cit indrāt abhayanta devāḥ viśvāḥ apaḥ ajayat dāsa patnīḥ

original: RV_05.030.06.1 tubhyed ete marutaḥ suśevā arcanty arkaṃ sunvanty andhaḥ
analyzed: tubhya id ete marutaḥ su śevāḥ arcanti arkam sunvanti andhaḥ

original: RV_05.030.06.2 ahim ohānam apa āśayānam pra māyābhir māyinaṃ sakṣad indraḥ
analyzed: ahim ohānam apaḥ āśayānam pra māyābhiḥ māyinam sakṣat indraḥ

original: RV_05.030.07.1 vi ṣū mṛdho januṣā dānam invann ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ
analyzed: vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ januṣā dānam invan ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ

original: RV_05.030.07.2 atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiro yad avartayo manave gātum ichan
analyzed: atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiraḥ yat avartayaḥ manave gātum ichan

original: RV_05.030.08.1 yujaṃ hi mām akṛthā ād id indra śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan
analyzed: yujam hi mām akṛthāḥ āt id indra śiraḥ dāsasya namuceḥ mathāyan

original: RV_05.030.08.2 aśmānaṃ cit svaryaṃ vartamānam pra cakriyeva rodasī marudbhyaḥ
analyzed: aśmānam cit svaryam vartamānam pra cakriyā iva rodasī marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_05.030.09.1 striyo hi dāsa āyudhāni cakre kim mā karann abalā asya senāḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ hi dāsaḥ āyudhāni cakre kim mā karan abalāḥ asya senāḥ

original: RV_05.030.09.2 antar hy akhyad ubhe asya dhene athopa praid yudhaye dasyum indraḥ
analyzed: antar hi akhyat ubhe asya dhene athā upa prait yudhaye dasyum indraḥ

original: RV_05.030.10.1 sam atra gāvo 'bhito 'navanteheha vatsair viyutā yad āsan
analyzed: sam atra gāvaḥ bhitas navanta iha iha vatsaiḥ viyutāḥ yat āsan

original: RV_05.030.10.2 saṃ tā indro asṛjad asya śākair yad īṃ somāsaḥ suṣutā amandan
analyzed: sam tāḥ indraḥ asṛjat asya śākaiḥ yat īm somāsaḥ suṣutāḥ amandan

original: RV_05.030.11.1 yad īṃ somā babhrudhūtā amandann aroravīd vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu
analyzed: yat īm somāḥ babhru dhūtāḥ amandan aroravīt vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu

original: RV_05.030.11.2 puraṃdaraḥ papivāṃ indro asya punar gavām adadād usriyāṇām
analyzed: puraṃdaraḥ papivān indraḥ asya punar gavām adadāt usriyāṇām

original: RV_05.030.12.1 bhadram idaṃ ruśamā agne akran gavāṃ catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā
analyzed: bhadram idam ruśamāḥ agne akran gavām catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā

original: RV_05.030.12.2 ṛṇaṃcayasya prayatā maghāni praty agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām
analyzed: ṛṇaṃcayasya prayatā maghāni prati agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām

original: RV_05.030.13.1 supeśasam māva sṛjanty astaṃ gavāṃ sahasrai ruśamāso agne
analyzed: supeśasam mā ava sṛjanti astam gavām sahasraiḥ ruśamāsaḥ agne

original: RV_05.030.13.2 tīvrā indram amamanduḥ sutāso 'ktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ
analyzed: tīvrāḥ indram amamanduḥ sutāsaḥ ktoḥ vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ

original: RV_05.030.14.1 auchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yām ṛṇaṃcaye rājani ruśamānām
analyzed: auchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yām ṛṇaṃcaye rājani ruśamānām

original: RV_05.030.14.2 atyo na vājī raghur ajyamāno babhruś catvāry asanat sahasrā
analyzed: atyaḥ na vājī raghuḥ ajyamānaḥ babhruḥ catvāri asanat sahasrā

original: RV_05.030.15.1 catuḥsahasraṃ gavyasya paśvaḥ praty agrabhīṣma ruśameṣv agne
analyzed: catur sahasram gavyasya paśvaḥ prati agrabhīṣma ruśameṣu agne

original: RV_05.030.15.2 gharmaś cit taptaḥ pravṛje ya āsīd ayasmayas taṃ v ādāma viprāḥ
analyzed: gharmaḥ cit taptaḥ pravṛje yaḥ āsīt ayasmayaḥ tam u ādāma viprāḥ

original: RV_05.031.01.1 indro rathāya pravataṃ kṛṇoti yam adhyasthān maghavā vājayantam
analyzed: indraḥ rathāya pravatam kṛṇoti yam adhyasthāt maghavā vājayantam

original: RV_05.031.01.2 yūtheva paśvo vy unoti gopā aṛiṣṭo yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan
analyzed: yūthā iva paśvaḥ vi unoti gopāḥ a ṛiṣṭaḥ yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan

original: RV_05.031.02.1 ā pra drava harivo mā vi venaḥ piśaṅgarāte abhi naḥ sacasva
analyzed: ā pra drava harivas mā vi venaḥ piśaṅga rāte abhi naḥ sacasva

original: RV_05.031.02.2 nahi tvad indra vasyo anyad asty amenāṃś cij janivataś cakartha
analyzed: nahi tvat indra vasyaḥ anyat asti amenān cit janivataḥ cakartha

original: RV_05.031.03.1 ud yat sahaḥ sahasa ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭa indra indriyāṇi viśvā
analyzed: ud yat sahaḥ sahasaḥ ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭe indraḥ indriyāṇi viśvā

original: RV_05.031.03.2 prācodayat sudughā vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamo 'vaḥ
analyzed: prācodayat sudughāḥ vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_05.031.04.1 anavas te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam
analyzed: anavaḥ te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam

original: RV_05.031.04.2 brahmāṇa indram mahayanto arkair avardhayann ahaye hantavā u
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ indram mahayantaḥ arkaiḥ avardhayan ahaye hantavai u

original: RV_05.031.05.1 vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇo arkam arcān indra grāvāṇo aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇaḥ arkam arcān indra grāvāṇaḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_05.031.05.2 anaśvāso ye pavayo 'rathā indreṣitā abhy avartanta dasyūn
analyzed: an aśvāsaḥ ye pavayaḥ rathāḥ indra iṣitāḥ abhī avartanta dasyūn

original: RV_05.031.06.1 pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha
analyzed: pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha

original: RV_05.031.06.2 śaktīvo yad vibharā rodasī ubhe jayann apo manave dānucitrāḥ
analyzed: śaktīvas yat vibharāḥ rodasī ubhe jayan apaḥ manave dānu citrāḥ

original: RV_05.031.07.1 tad in nu te karaṇaṃ dasma viprāhiṃ yad ghnann ojo atrāmimīthāḥ
analyzed: tat id nu te karaṇam dasma vipra ahim yat ghnan ojaḥ atra āmimīthāḥ

original: RV_05.031.07.2 śuṣṇasya cit pari māyā agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvaṃ yann apa dasyūṃr asedhaḥ
analyzed: śuṣṇasya cit pari māyāḥ agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvam yan apa dasyūṃr asedhaḥ

original: RV_05.031.08.1 tvam apo yadave turvaśāyāramayaḥ sudughāḥ pāra indra
analyzed: tvam apaḥ yadave turvaśāya aramayaḥ su dughāḥ pāre indra

original: RV_05.031.08.2 ugram ayātam avaho ha kutsaṃ saṃ ha yad vām uśanāranta devāḥ
analyzed: ugram ayātam avahaḥ ha kutsam sam ha yat vām uśanā aranta devāḥ

original: RV_05.031.09.1 indrākutsā vahamānā rathenā vām atyā api karṇe vahantu
analyzed: indrākutsā vahamānā rathena ā vām atyāḥ api karṇe vahantu

original: RV_05.031.09.2 niḥ ṣīm adbhyo dhamatho niḥ ṣadhasthān maghono hṛdo varathas tamāṃsi
analyzed: niḥ sīm adbhyaḥ dhamathaḥ niḥ sadhasthāt maghonaḥ hṛdaḥ varathaḥ tamāṃsi

original: RV_05.031.10.1 vātasya yuktān suyujaś cid aśvān kaviś cid eṣo ajagann avasyuḥ
analyzed: vātasya yuktān su yujaḥ cit aśvān kaviḥ cit eṣaḥ ajagan avasyuḥ

original: RV_05.031.10.2 viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāya indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan
analyzed: viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāyaḥ indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan

original: RV_05.031.11.1 sūraś cid ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvaṃ karad uparaṃ jūjuvāṃsam
analyzed: sūraḥ cit ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvam karat uparam jūjuvāṃsam

original: RV_05.031.11.2 bharac cakram etaśaḥ saṃ riṇāti puro dadhat saniṣyati kratuṃ naḥ
analyzed: bharat cakram etaśaḥ sam riṇāti puras dadhat saniṣyati kratum naḥ

original: RV_05.031.12.1 āyaṃ janā abhicakṣe jagāmendraḥ sakhāyaṃ sutasomam ichan
analyzed: ā ayam janāḥ abhicakṣe jagāma indraḥ sakhāyam suta somam ichan

original: RV_05.031.12.2 vadan grāvāva vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaś caranti
analyzed: vadan grāvā ava vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaḥ caranti

original: RV_05.031.13.1 ye cākananta cākananta nū te martā amṛta mo te aṃha āran
analyzed: ye cākananta cākananta nu te martāḥ amṛta mā u te aṃhaḥ āran

original: RV_05.031.13.2 vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehy ojo janeṣu yeṣu te syāma
analyzed: vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehi ojaḥ janeṣu yeṣu te syāma

original: RV_05.032.01.1 adardar utsam asṛjo vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānāṃ aramṇāḥ
analyzed: adardar utsam asṛjaḥ vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānām aramṇāḥ

original: RV_05.032.01.2 mahāntam indra parvataṃ vi yad vaḥ sṛjo vi dhārā ava dānavaṃ han
analyzed: mahāntam indra parvatam vi yat var sṛjaḥ vi dhārāḥ ava dānavam han

original: RV_05.032.02.1 tvam utsām ṛtubhir badbadhānāṃ araṃha ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin
analyzed: tvam utsām ṛtubhiḥ badbadhānām araṃhaḥ ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin

original: RV_05.032.02.2 ahiṃ cid ugra prayutaṃ śayānaṃ jaghanvāṃ indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ
analyzed: ahim cit ugra prayutam śayānam jaghanvān indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ

original: RV_05.032.03.1 tyasya cin mahato nir mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhir indraḥ
analyzed: tyasya cit mahataḥ niḥ mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhiḥ indraḥ

original: RV_05.032.03.2 ya eka id apratir manyamāna ād asmād anyo ajaniṣṭa tavyān
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id apratiḥ manyamānaḥ āt asmāt anyaḥ ajaniṣṭa tavyān

original: RV_05.032.04.1 tyaṃ cid eṣāṃ svadhayā madantam miho napātaṃ suvṛdhaṃ tamogām
analyzed: tyam cit eṣām svadhayā madantam mihaḥ napātam suvṛdham tamaḥ gām

original: RV_05.032.04.2 vṛṣaprabharmā dānavasya bhāmaṃ vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam
analyzed: vṛṣa prabharmā dānavasya bhāmam vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam

original: RV_05.032.05.1 tyaṃ cid asya kratubhir niṣattam amarmaṇo vidad id asya marma
analyzed: tyam cit asya kratubhiḥ niṣattam amarmaṇaḥ vidat id asya marma

original: RV_05.032.05.2 yad īṃ sukṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantaṃ tamasi harmye dhāḥ
analyzed: yat īm su kṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantam tamasi harmye dhāḥ

original: RV_05.032.06.1 tyaṃ cid itthā katpayaṃ śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam
analyzed: tyam cit itthā katpayam śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam

original: RV_05.032.06.2 taṃ cin mandāno vṛṣabhaḥ sutasyoccair indro apagūryā jaghāna
analyzed: tam cit mandānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ sutasya uccais indraḥ apagūrya jaghāna

original: RV_05.032.07.1 ud yad indro mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa saho apratītam
analyzed: ud yat indraḥ mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa sahaḥ apratītam

original: RV_05.032.07.2 yad īṃ vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantor adhamaṃ cakāra
analyzed: yat īm vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantoḥ adhamam cakāra

original: RV_05.032.08.1 tyaṃ cid arṇam madhupaṃ śayānam asinvaṃ vavram mahy ādad ugraḥ
analyzed: tyam cit arṇam madhupam śayānam asinvam vavram mahi ādat ugraḥ

original: RV_05.032.08.2 apādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācam
analyzed: a pādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhra vācam

original: RV_05.032.09.1 ko asya śuṣmaṃ taviṣīṃ varāta eko dhanā bharate apratītaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ asya śuṣmam taviṣīm varāte ekaḥ dhanā bharate apratītaḥ

original: RV_05.032.09.2 ime cid asya jrayaso nu devī indrasyaujaso bhiyasā jihāte
analyzed: ime cit asya jrayasaḥ nu devī indrasya ojasaḥ bhiyasā jihāte

original: RV_05.032.10.1 ny asmai devī svadhitir jihīta indrāya gātur uśatīva yeme
analyzed: ni asmai devī svadhitiḥ jihīte indrāya gātuḥ uśatī iva yeme

original: RV_05.032.10.2 saṃ yad ojo yuvate viśvam ābhir anu svadhāvne kṣitayo namanta
analyzed: sam yat ojaḥ yuvate viśvam ābhiḥ anu svadhāvne kṣitayaḥ namanta

original: RV_05.032.11.1 ekaṃ nu tvā satpatim pāñcajanyaṃ jātaṃ śṛṇomi yaśasaṃ janeṣu
analyzed: ekam nu tvā sat patim pāñcajanyam jātam śṛṇomi yaśasam janeṣu

original: RV_05.032.11.2 tam me jagṛbhra āśaso naviṣṭhaṃ doṣā vastor havamānāsa indram
analyzed: tam me jagṛbhre āśasaḥ naviṣṭham doṣā vastoḥ havamānāsaḥ indram

original: RV_05.032.12.1 evā hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyo dadataṃ śṛṇomi
analyzed: eva hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyaḥ dadatam śṛṇomi

original: RV_05.032.12.2 kiṃ te brahmāṇo gṛhate sakhāyo ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra
analyzed: kim te brahmāṇaḥ sakhāyaḥ ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra

original: RV_05.033.01.1 mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāyetthā tavase atavyān
analyzed: mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāya itthā tavase a tavyān

original: RV_05.033.01.2 yo asmai sumatiṃ vājasātau stuto jane samaryaś ciketa
analyzed: yaḥ asmai sumatim vājasātau stutaḥ jane samaryaḥ ciketa

original: RV_05.033.02.1 sa tvaṃ na indra dhiyasāno arkair harīṇāṃ vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra dhiyasānaḥ arkaiḥ harīṇām vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ

original: RV_05.033.02.2 yā itthā maghavann anu joṣaṃ vakṣo abhi prāryaḥ sakṣi janān
analyzed: yāḥ itthā maghavan anu joṣam vakṣaḥ abhi pra aryaḥ sakṣi janān

original: RV_05.033.03.1 na te ta indrābhy asmad ṛṣvāyuktāso abrahmatā yad asan
analyzed: na te te indra abhi asmat ṛṣvāḥ a yuktāsaḥ a brahma tā yat asan

original: RV_05.033.03.2 tiṣṭhā ratham adhi taṃ vajrahastā raśmiṃ deva yamase svaśvaḥ
analyzed: tiṣṭha ratham adhi tam vajra hasta ā raśmim deva yamase su aśvaḥ

original: RV_05.033.04.1 purū yat ta indra santy ukthā gave cakarthorvarāsu yudhyan
analyzed: purū yat te indra santi ukthā gave cakartha urvarāsu yudhyan

original: RV_05.033.04.2 tatakṣe sūryāya cid okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit
analyzed: tatakṣe sūryāya cit okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit

original: RV_05.033.05.1 vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca naraḥ śardho jajñānā yātāś ca rathāḥ
analyzed: vayam te te indra ye ca naraḥ śardhaḥ jajñānāḥ yātāḥ ca rathāḥ

original: RV_05.033.05.2 āsmāñ jagamyād ahiśuṣma satvā bhago na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ
analyzed: ā asmām jagamyāt ahi śuṣma satvā bhagaḥ na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ

original: RV_05.033.06.1 papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hy ojo nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamāno amartaḥ
analyzed: papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hi ojaḥ nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamānaḥ amartaḥ

original: RV_05.033.06.2 sa na enīṃ vasavāno rayiṃ dāḥ prārya stuṣe tuvimaghasya dānam
analyzed: sa naḥ enīm vasavānaḥ rayim dāḥ pra aryaḥ stuṣe tuvi maghasya dānam

original: RV_05.033.07.1 evā na indrotibhir ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn
analyzed: eva naḥ indra ūtibhiḥ ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn

original: RV_05.033.07.2 uta tvacaṃ dadato vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ
analyzed: uta tvacam dadataḥ vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ

original: RV_05.033.08.1 uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūres trasadasyor hiraṇino rarāṇāḥ
analyzed: uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūreḥ trasadasyoḥ hiraṇinaḥ rarāṇāḥ

original: RV_05.033.08.2 vahantu mā daśa śyetāso asya gairikṣitasya kratubhir nu saśce
analyzed: vahantu mā daśa śyetāsaḥ asya gairikṣitasya kratubhiḥ nu saśce

original: RV_05.033.09.1 uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāso vidathasya rātau
analyzed: uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāsaḥ vidathasya rātau

original: RV_05.033.09.2 sahasrā me cyavatāno dadāna ānūkam aryo vapuṣe nārcat
analyzed: sahasrā me cyavatānaḥ dadānaḥ ānūkam aryaḥ vapuṣe nā arcat

original: RV_05.033.10.1 uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭā lakṣmaṇyasya suruco yatānāḥ
analyzed: uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭāḥ lakṣmaṇyasya su rucaḥ yatānāḥ

original: RV_05.033.10.2 mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣer vrajaṃ na gāvaḥ prayatā api gman
analyzed: mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣeḥ vrajam na gāvaḥ prayatāḥ api gman

original: RV_05.034.01.1 ajātaśatrum ajarā svarvaty anu svadhāmitā dasmam īyate
analyzed: ajāta śatrum ajarā svarvatī anu svadhā amitā dasmam īyate

original: RV_05.034.01.2 sunotana pacata brahmavāhase puruṣṭutāya prataraṃ dadhātana
analyzed: sunotana pacata brahma vāhase puruṣṭutāya prataram dadhātana

original: RV_05.034.02.1 ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apipratāmandata maghavā madhvo andhasaḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apiprata amandata maghavā madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_05.034.02.2 yad īm mṛgāya hantave mahāvadhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭim uśanā vadhaṃ yamat
analyzed: yat īm mṛgāya hantave mahā vadhaḥ sahasra bhṛṣṭim uśanāḥ vadham yamat

original: RV_05.034.03.1 yo asmai ghraṃsa uta vā ya ūdhani somaṃ sunoti bhavati dyumāṃ aha
analyzed: yaḥ asmai ghraṃse uta vā yaḥ ūdhani somam sunoti bhavati dyumān aha

original: RV_05.034.03.2 apāpa śakras tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanūśubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ
analyzed: apa apa śakraḥ tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanū śubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ

original: RV_05.034.04.1 yasyāvadhīt pitaraṃ yasya mātaraṃ yasya śakro bhrātaraṃ nāta īṣate
analyzed: yasya avadhīt pitaram yasya mātaram yasya śakraḥ bhrātaram na atas īṣate

original: RV_05.034.04.2 vetīd v asya prayatā yataṃkaro na kilbiṣād īṣate vasva ākaraḥ
analyzed: veti id u asya prayatā yataṃkaraḥ na kilbiṣāt īṣate vasvaḥ ākaraḥ

original: RV_05.034.05.1 na pañcabhir daśabhir vaṣṭy ārabhaṃ nāsunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana
analyzed: na pañcabhiḥ daśabhiḥ vaṣṭi ārabham na a sunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana

original: RV_05.034.05.2 jināti ved amuyā hanti vā dhunir ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje
analyzed: jināti vā id amuyā hanti vā dhuniḥ ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje

original: RV_05.034.06.1 vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajo 'sunvato viṣuṇaḥ sunvato vṛdhaḥ
analyzed: vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajaḥ sunvataḥ viṣuṇaḥ sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_05.034.06.2 indro viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇo yathāvaśaṃ nayati dāsam āryaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇaḥ yathāvaśam nayati dāsam āryaḥ

original: RV_05.034.07.1 sam īm paṇer ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaraṃ vasu
analyzed: sam īm paṇeḥ ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaram vasu

original: RV_05.034.07.2 durge cana dhriyate viśva ā puru jano yo asya taviṣīm acukrudhat
analyzed: durge cana dhriyate viśvaḥ ā puru janaḥ yaḥ asya taviṣīm acukrudhat

original: RV_05.034.08.1 saṃ yaj janau sudhanau viśvaśardhasāv aved indro maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu
analyzed: sam yat janau su dhanau viśva śardhasau avet indraḥ maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu

original: RV_05.034.08.2 yujaṃ hy anyam akṛta pravepany ud īṃ gavyaṃ sṛjate satvabhir dhuniḥ
analyzed: yujam hi anyam akṛta pravepanī ud īm gavyam sṛjate satvabhiḥ dhuniḥ

original: RV_05.034.09.1 sahasrasām āgniveśiṃ gṛṇīṣe śatrim agna upamāṃ ketum aryaḥ
analyzed: sahasra sām āgniveśim gṛṇīṣe śatrim agne upamām ketum aryaḥ

original: RV_05.034.09.2 tasmā āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu
analyzed: tasmai āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu

original: RV_05.035.00.11 yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vasa indra kratuṣ ṭam ā bhara
analyzed: yaḥ te sādhiṣṭhaḥ vaso indra kratuḥ ṭam ā bhara

original: RV_05.035.00.12 asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sasniṃ vājeṣu duṣṭaram
analyzed: asmabhyam carṣaṇī saham sasnim vājeṣu duṣṭaram

original: RV_05.035.00.21 yad indra te catasro yac chūra santi tisraḥ
analyzed: yat indra te catasraḥ yat śūra santi tisraḥ

original: RV_05.035.00.22 yad vā pañca kṣitīnām avas tat su na ā bhara
analyzed: yat vā pañca kṣitīnām avaḥ tat su naḥ ā bhara

original: RV_05.035.00.31 ā te 'vo vareṇyaṃ vṛṣantamasya hūmahe
analyzed: ā te vaḥ vareṇyam vṛṣantamasya hūmahe

original: RV_05.035.00.32 vṛṣajūtir hi jajñiṣa ābhūbhir indra turvaṇiḥ
analyzed: vṛṣa jūtiḥ hi jajñiṣe ābhūbhiḥ indra turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_05.035.00.41 vṛṣā hy asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā hi asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ

original: RV_05.035.00.42 svakṣatraṃ te dhṛṣan manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam
analyzed: svakṣatram te dhṛṣat manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_05.035.00.51 tvaṃ tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivaḥ
analyzed: tvam tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivas

original: RV_05.035.00.52 sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasas pate
analyzed: sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_05.035.00.61 tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: tvām id vṛtra hantama janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_05.035.00.62 ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyaṃ havante vājasātaye
analyzed: ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyam havante vājasātaye

original: RV_05.035.00.71 asmākam indra duṣṭaram puroyāvānam ājiṣu
analyzed: asmākam indra duṣṭaram puras yāvānam ājiṣu

original: RV_05.035.00.72 sayāvānaṃ dhane-dhane vājayantam avā ratham
analyzed: sa yāvānam dhanedhane vājayantam ava ratham

original: RV_05.035.00.81 asmākam indrehi no ratham avā puraṃdhyā
analyzed: asmākam indra ihi naḥ ratham ava puraṃdhyā

original: RV_05.035.00.82 vayaṃ śaviṣṭha vāryaṃ divi śravo dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe
analyzed: vayam śaviṣṭha vāryam divi śravaḥ dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe

original: RV_05.036.01.1 sa ā gamad indro yo vasūnāṃ ciketad dātuṃ dāmano rayīṇām
analyzed: saḥ ā gamat indraḥ yaḥ vasūnām ciketat dātum dāmanaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_05.036.01.2 dhanvacaro na vaṃsagas tṛṣāṇaś cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum
analyzed: dhanva caraḥ na vaṃsagaḥ tṛṣāṇaḥ cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum

original: RV_05.036.02.1 ā te hanū harivaḥ śūra śipre ruhat somo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe
analyzed: ā te hanū harivas śūra śipre ruhat somaḥ na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe

original: RV_05.036.02.2 anu tvā rājann arvato na hinvan gīrbhir madema puruhūta viśve
analyzed: anu tvā rājan arvataḥ na hinvan gīrbhiḥ madema puruhūta viśve

original: RV_05.036.03.1 cakraṃ na vṛttam puruhūta vepate mano bhiyā me amater id adrivaḥ
analyzed: cakram na vṛttam puruhūta vepate manaḥ bhiyā me amateḥ id adrivas
