original: RV_05.036.03.2 rathād adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvin nu stoṣan maghavan purūvasuḥ
analyzed: rathāt adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvid nu stoṣat maghavan purūvasuḥ

original: RV_05.036.04.1 eṣa grāveva jaritā ta indreyarti vācam bṛhad āśuṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: eṣa grāvā iva jaritā te indra iyarti vācam bṛhat āśuṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_05.036.04.2 pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇid dharivo mā vi venaḥ
analyzed: pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇit harivas mā vi venaḥ

original: RV_05.036.05.1 vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhatu dyaur vṛṣā vṛṣabhyāṃ vahase haribhyām
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam vardhatu dyauḥ vṛṣā vṛṣabhyām vahase haribhyām

original: RV_05.036.05.2 sa no vṛṣā vṛṣarathaḥ suśipra vṛṣakrato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣā vṛṣa rathaḥ su śipra vṛṣa krato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ

original: RV_05.036.06.1 yo rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānāv adiṣṭa
analyzed: yaḥ rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānau adiṣṭa

original: RV_05.036.06.2 yūne sam asmai kṣitayo namantāṃ śrutarathāya maruto duvoyā
analyzed: yūne sam asmai kṣitayaḥ namantām śruta rathāya marutaḥ duvoyā

original: RV_05.037.01.1 sam bhānunā yatate sūryasyājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ
analyzed: sam bhānunā yatate sūryasya ājuhvānaḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ

original: RV_05.037.01.2 tasmā amṛdhrā uṣaso vy uchān ya indrāya sunavāmety āha
analyzed: tasmai amṛdhrāḥ uṣasaḥ vi uchān yaḥ indrāya sunavāma iti āha

original: RV_05.037.02.1 samiddhāgnir vanavat stīrṇabarhir yuktagrāvā sutasomo jarāte
analyzed: samiddha agniḥ vanavat stīrṇa barhiḥ yukta grāvā suta somaḥ jarāte

original: RV_05.037.02.2 grāvāṇo yasyeṣiraṃ vadanty ayad adhvaryur haviṣāva sindhum
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ yasya iṣiram vadanti ayat adhvaryuḥ haviṣā ava sindhum

original: RV_05.037.03.1 vadhūr iyam patim ichanty eti ya īṃ vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām
analyzed: vadhūḥ iyam patim icchantī eti yaḥ īm vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām

original: RV_05.037.03.2 āsya śravasyād ratha ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte
analyzed: ā asya śravasyāt rathaḥ ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte

original: RV_05.037.04.1 na sa rājā vyathate yasminn indras tīvraṃ somam pibati gosakhāyam
analyzed: na sa rājā vyathate yasmin indraḥ tīvram somam pibati go sakhāyam

original: RV_05.037.04.2 ā satvanair ajati hanti vṛtraṃ kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhago nāma puṣyan
analyzed: ā satvanaiḥ ajati hanti vṛtram kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhagaḥ nāma puṣyan

original: RV_05.037.05.1 puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāty ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī saṃ jayāti
analyzed: puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāti ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī sam jayāti

original: RV_05.037.05.2 priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti ya indrāya sutasomo dadāśat
analyzed: priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti yaḥ indrāya suta somaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_05.038.01.1 uroṣ ṭa indra rādhaso vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato
analyzed: uroḥ te indra rādhasaḥ vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato

original: RV_05.038.01.2 adhā no viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā sukṣatra maṃhaya
analyzed: adhā naḥ viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā su kṣatra maṃhaya

original: RV_05.038.02.1 yad īm indra śravāyyam iṣaṃ śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe
analyzed: yat īm indra śravāyyam iṣam śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe

original: RV_05.038.02.2 paprathe dīrghaśruttamaṃ hiraṇyavarṇa duṣṭaram
analyzed: paprathe dīrghaśruttamam hiraṇya varṇa duṣṭaram

original: RV_05.038.03.1 śuṣmāso ye te adrivo mehanā ketasāpaḥ
analyzed: śuṣmāsaḥ ye te adrivas mehanā ketasāpaḥ

original: RV_05.038.03.2 ubhā devāv abhiṣṭaye divaś ca gmaś ca rājathaḥ
analyzed: ubhā devau abhiṣṭaye divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca rājathaḥ

original: RV_05.038.04.1 uto no asya kasya cid dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan
analyzed: uta u naḥ asya kasya cit dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan

original: RV_05.038.04.2 asmabhyaṃ nṛmṇam ā bharāsmabhyaṃ nṛmaṇasyase
analyzed: asmabhyam nṛmṇam ā bhara asmabhyam nṛmaṇasyase

original: RV_05.038.05.1 nū ta ābhir abhiṣṭibhis tava śarmañ chatakrato
analyzed: nu te ābhiḥ abhiṣṭibhiḥ tava śarmam śatakrato

original: RV_05.038.05.2 indra syāma sugopāḥ śūra syāma sugopāḥ
analyzed: indra syāma su gopāḥ śūra syāma su gopāḥ

original: RV_05.039.01.1 yad indra citra mehanāsti tvādātam adrivaḥ
analyzed: yat indra citra mehanā asti tvādātam adrivas

original: RV_05.039.01.2 rādhas tan no vidadvasa ubhayāhasty ā bhara
analyzed: rādhaḥ tat naḥ vidadvaso ubhayāhasti ā bhara

original: RV_05.039.02.1 yan manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣaṃ tad ā bhara
analyzed: yat manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣam tat ā bhara

original: RV_05.039.02.2 vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane
analyzed: vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane

original: RV_05.039.03.1 yat te ditsu prarādhyam mano asti śrutam bṛhat
analyzed: yat te ditsu prarādhyam manaḥ asti śrutam bṛhat

original: RV_05.039.03.2 tena dṛḷhā cid adriva ā vājaṃ darṣi sātaye
analyzed: tena dṛḍhā cit adrivas ā vājam darṣi sātaye

original: RV_05.039.04.1 maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vo maghonāṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham vaḥ maghonām rājānam carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_05.039.04.2 indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhir jujuṣe giraḥ
analyzed: indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhiḥ jujuṣe giraḥ

original: RV_05.039.05.1 asmā it kāvyaṃ vaca uktham indrāya śaṃsyam
analyzed: asmai id kāvyam vacaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsyam

original: RV_05.039.05.2 tasmā u brahmavāhase giro vardhanty atrayo giraḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ
analyzed: tasmai u brahma vāhase giraḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ giraḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ

original: RV_05.040.01.1 ā yāhy adribhiḥ sutaṃ somaṃ somapate piba
analyzed: ā yāhi adribhiḥ sutam somam soma pate piba

original: RV_05.040.01.2 vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_05.040.02.1 vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ

original: RV_05.040.02.2 vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_05.040.03.1 vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_05.040.03.2 vṛṣann indra vṛṣabhir vṛtrahantama
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_05.040.04.1 ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhas turāṣāṭ chuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā
analyzed: ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ turāṣāh śuṣmī rājā vṛtra hā soma pāvā

original: RV_05.040.04.2 yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsad arvāṅ mādhyaṃdine savane matsad indraḥ
analyzed: yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsat arvāṅ mādhyaṃdine savane matsat indraḥ

original: RV_05.040.05.1 yat tvā sūrya svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ
analyzed: yat tvā sūrya svarbhānuḥ tamasā vidhyat āsuraḥ

original: RV_05.040.05.2 akṣetravid yathā mugdho bhuvanāny adīdhayuḥ
analyzed: a kṣetra vid yathā mugdhaḥ bhuvanāni adīdhayuḥ

original: RV_05.040.06.1 svarbhānor adha yad indra māyā avo divo vartamānā avāhan
analyzed: svarbhānoḥ adha yat indra māyāḥ avas divaḥ vartamānāḥ avāhan

original: RV_05.040.06.2 gūḷhaṃ sūryaṃ tamasāpavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇāvindad atriḥ
analyzed: gūḍham sūryam tamasā apavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇā avindat atriḥ

original: RV_05.040.07.1 mā mām imaṃ tava santam atra irasyā drugdho bhiyasā ni gārīt
analyzed: mā mām imam tava santam atra irasyā drugdhaḥ bhiyasā ni gārīt

original: RV_05.040.07.2 tvam mitro asi satyarādhās tau mehāvataṃ varuṇaś ca rājā
analyzed: tvam mitraḥ asi satya rādhāḥ tau mā iha āvatam varuṇaḥ ca rājā

original: RV_05.040.08.1 grāvṇo brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasopaśikṣan
analyzed: grāvṇaḥ brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasā upaśikṣan

original: RV_05.040.08.2 atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣur ādhāt svarbhānor apa māyā aghukṣat
analyzed: atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣuḥ ādhāt svarbhānoḥ apa māyāḥ aghukṣat

original: RV_05.040.09.1 yaṃ vai sūryaṃ svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ
analyzed: yam vai sūryam svarbhānuḥ tamasā vidhyat āsuraḥ

original: RV_05.040.09.2 atrayas tam anv avindan nahy anye aśaknuvan
analyzed: atrayaḥ tam anu avindan nahi anye aśaknuvan

original: RV_05.041.01.1 ko nu vām mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāyan divo vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de
analyzed: kaḥ nu vām mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāyan divaḥ vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de

original: RV_05.041.01.2 ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthāṃ no yajñāyate vā paśuṣo na vājān
analyzed: ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthām naḥ yajñāyate vā paśu sas na vājān

original: RV_05.041.02.1 te no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā maruto juṣanta
analyzed: te naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_05.041.02.2 namobhir vā ye dadhate suvṛktiṃ stomaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: namobhiḥ vā ye dadhate suvṛktim stomam rudrāya mīḍhuṣe sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_05.041.03.1 ā vāṃ yeṣṭhāśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau
analyzed: ā vām yeṣṭha aśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau

original: RV_05.041.03.2 uta vā divo asurāya manma prāndhāṃsīva yajyave bharadhvam
analyzed: uta vā divaḥ asurāya manma pra andhāṃsi iva yajyave bharadhvam

original: RV_05.041.04.1 pra sakṣaṇo divyaḥ kaṇvahotā trito divaḥ sajoṣā vāto agniḥ
analyzed: pra sakṣaṇaḥ divyaḥ kaṇva hotā tritaḥ divaḥ sajoṣāḥ vātaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_05.041.04.2 pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśvabhojā ājiṃ na jagmur āśvaśvatamāḥ
analyzed: pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśva bhojāḥ ājim na jagmuḥ āśvaśvatamāḥ

original: RV_05.041.05.1 pra vo rayiṃ yuktāśvam bharadhvaṃ rāya eṣe 'vase dadhīta dhīḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ rayim yukta aśvam bharadhvam rāyaḥ eṣe vase dadhīta dhīḥ

original: RV_05.041.05.2 suśeva evair auśijasya hotā ye va evā marutas turāṇām
analyzed: su śevaḥ evaiḥ auśijasya hotā ye vaḥ evā marutaḥ turāṇām

original: RV_05.041.06.1 pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ kṛṇudhvam pra devaṃ vipram panitāram arkaiḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ vāyum ratha yujam kṛṇudhvam pra devam vipram panitāram arkaiḥ

original: RV_05.041.06.2 iṣudhyava ṛtasāpaḥ puraṃdhīr vasvīr no atra patnīr ā dhiye dhuḥ
analyzed: iṣudhyavaḥ ṛtasāpaḥ puraṃdhīḥ vasvīḥ naḥ atra patnīḥ ā dhiye dhuḥ

original: RV_05.041.07.1 upa va eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaś citayadbhir arkaiḥ
analyzed: upa vaḥ eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaḥ citayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_05.041.07.2 uṣāsānaktā viduṣīva viśvam ā hā vahato martyāya yajñam
analyzed: uṣāsānaktā viduṣī iva viśvam ā hā vahataḥ martyāya yajñam

original: RV_05.041.08.1 abhi vo arce poṣyāvato nṝn vāstoṣ patiṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ rarāṇaḥ
analyzed: abhi vaḥ arce poṣyāvataḥ nṝn vāstoḥ patim tvaṣṭāram rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_05.041.08.2 dhanyā sajoṣā dhiṣaṇā namobhir vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāya eṣe
analyzed: dhanyā sajoṣāḥ dhiṣaṇā namobhiḥ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhīḥ rāyaḥ eṣe

original: RV_05.041.09.1 tuje nas tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavo ye vasavo na vīrāḥ
analyzed: tuje naḥ tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavaḥ ye vasavaḥ na vīrāḥ

original: RV_05.041.09.2 panita āptyo yajataḥ sadā no vardhān naḥ śaṃsaṃ naryo abhiṣṭau
analyzed: panitaḥ āptyaḥ yajataḥ sadā naḥ vardhāt naḥ śaṃsam naryaḥ abhiṣṭau

original: RV_05.041.10.1 vṛṣṇo astoṣi bhūmyasya garbhaṃ trito napātam apāṃ suvṛkti
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ astoṣi bhūmyasya garbham tritaḥ napātam apām suvṛkti

original: RV_05.041.10.2 gṛṇīte agnir etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśo ni riṇāti vanā
analyzed: gṛṇīte agniḥ etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśaḥ ni riṇāti vanā

original: RV_05.041.11.1 kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya
analyzed: kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya

original: RV_05.041.11.2 āpa oṣadhīr uta no 'vantu dyaur vanā girayo vṛkṣakeśāḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta naḥ vantu dyauḥ vanā girayaḥ vṛkṣa keśāḥ

original: RV_05.041.12.1 śṛṇotu na ūrjām patir giraḥ sa nabhas tarīyāṃ iṣiraḥ parijmā
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ ūrjām patiḥ giraḥ sa nabhaḥ tarīyān iṣiraḥ parijmā

original: RV_05.041.12.2 śṛṇvantv āpaḥ puro na śubhrāḥ pari sruco babṛhāṇasyādreḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantu āpaḥ puras na śubhrāḥ pari srucaḥ babṛhāṇasya adreḥ

original: RV_05.041.13.1 vidā cin nu mahānto ye va evā bravāma dasmā vāryaṃ dadhānāḥ
analyzed: vidā cit nu mahāntaḥ ye vaḥ evāḥ bravāma dasmāḥ vāryam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_05.041.13.2 vayaś cana subhva āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyataṃ vadhasnaiḥ
analyzed: vayaḥ cana su bhvaḥ āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyatam vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_05.041.14.1 ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmāpaś cāchā sumakhāya vocam
analyzed: ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmā apaḥ ca achā su makhāya vocam

original: RV_05.041.14.2 vardhantāṃ dyāvo giraś candrāgrā udā vardhantām abhiṣātā arṇāḥ
analyzed: vardhantām dyāvaḥ giraḥ candra agrāḥ udāḥ vardhantām abhiṣātāḥ arṇāḥ

original: RV_05.041.15.1 pade-pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiś ca
analyzed: pade pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiḥ ca

original: RV_05.041.15.2 siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhir ṛjuhasta ṛjuvaniḥ
analyzed: siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhiḥ ṛju hastaḥ ṛju vaniḥ

original: RV_05.041.16.1 kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn evayā maruto achoktau praśravaso maruto achoktau
analyzed: kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn eva yāḥ marutaḥ achoktau praśravasaḥ marutaḥ achoktau

original: RV_05.041.16.2 mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhād asmākam bhūd upamātivaniḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ riṣe dhāt asmākam bhūt upamāti vaniḥ

original: RV_05.041.17.1 iti cin nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāso vanate martyo va ā devāso vanate martyo vaḥ
analyzed: iti cit nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ ā devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_05.041.17.2 atrā śivāṃ tanvo dhāsim asyā jarāṃ cin me nirṛtir jagrasīta
analyzed: atrā śivām tanvaḥ dhāsim asyāḥ jarām cit me nirṛtiḥ jagrasīta

original: RV_05.041.18.1 tāṃ vo devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ
analyzed: tām vaḥ devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ

original: RV_05.041.18.2 sā naḥ sudānur mṛḷayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ
analyzed: sā naḥ sudānuḥ mṛḍayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_05.041.19.1 abhi na iḷā yūthasya mātā sman nadībhir urvaśī vā gṛṇātu
analyzed: abhi naḥ iḷā yūthasya mātā smat nadībhiḥ urvaśī vā gṛṇātu

original: RV_05.041.19.2 urvaśī vā bṛhaddivā gṛṇānābhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasyāyoḥ
analyzed: urvaśī vā bṛhat divā gṛṇānā abhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasya āyoḥ

original: RV_05.041.20.1 siṣaktu na ūrjavyasya puṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: siṣaktu naḥ ūrjavyasya puṣṭeḥ

original: RV_05.042.01.1 pra śaṃtamā varuṇaṃ dīdhitī gīr mitram bhagam aditiṃ nūnam aśyāḥ
analyzed: pra śaṃtamā varuṇam dīdhitī gīḥ mitram bhagam aditim nūnam aśyāḥ

original: RV_05.042.01.2 pṛṣadyoniḥ pañcahotā śṛṇotv atūrtapanthā asuro mayobhuḥ
analyzed: pṛṣat yoniḥ pañca hotā śṛṇotu a tūrta panthāḥ asuraḥ mayobhuḥ

original: RV_05.042.02.1 prati me stomam aditir jagṛbhyāt sūnuṃ na mātā hṛdyaṃ suśevam
analyzed: prati me stomam aditiḥ jagṛbhyāt sūnum na mātā hṛdyam su śevam

original: RV_05.042.02.2 brahma priyaṃ devahitaṃ yad asty aham mitre varuṇe yan mayobhu
analyzed: brahma priyam deva hitam yat asti aham mitre varuṇe yat mayobhu

original: RV_05.042.03.1 ud īraya kavitamaṃ kavīnām unattainam abhi madhvā ghṛtena
analyzed: ud īraya kavitamam kavīnām unatta enam abhi madhvā ghṛtena

original: RV_05.042.03.2 sa no vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti
analyzed: sa naḥ vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti

original: RV_05.042.04.1 sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivaḥ saṃ svasti
analyzed: sam indra naḥ manasā neṣi gobhiḥ sam sūribhiḥ harivas sam svasti

original: RV_05.042.04.2 sam brahmaṇā devahitaṃ yad asti saṃ devānāṃ sumatyā yajñiyānām
analyzed: sam brahmaṇā deva hitam yat asti sam devānām sumatyā yajñiyānām

original: RV_05.042.05.1 devo bhagaḥ savitā rāyo aṃśa indro vṛtrasya saṃjito dhanānām
analyzed: devaḥ bhagaḥ savitā rāyaḥ aṃśaḥ indraḥ vṛtrasya saṃjitaḥ dhanānām

original: RV_05.042.05.2 ṛbhukṣā vāja uta vā puraṃdhir avantu no amṛtāsas turāsaḥ
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ uta vā puraṃdhiḥ avantu naḥ amṛtāsaḥ turāsaḥ

original: RV_05.042.06.1 marutvato apratītasya jiṣṇor ajūryataḥ pra bravāmā kṛtāni
analyzed: marutvataḥ apratītasya jiṣṇoḥ a jūryataḥ pra bravāma kṛtāni

original: RV_05.042.06.2 na te pūrve maghavan nāparāso na vīryaṃ nūtanaḥ kaś canāpa
analyzed: na te pūrve maghavan na aparāsaḥ na vīryam nūtanaḥ kaḥ cana āpa

original: RV_05.042.07.1 upa stuhi prathamaṃ ratnadheyam bṛhaspatiṃ sanitāraṃ dhanānām
analyzed: upa stuhi prathamam ratna dheyam bṛhaspatim sanitāram dhanānām

original: RV_05.042.07.2 yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasur āgamaj johuvānam
analyzed: yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasuḥ āgamat johuvānam

original: RV_05.042.08.1 tavotibhiḥ sacamānā ariṣṭā bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: tava ūtibhiḥ sacamānāḥ ariṣṭāḥ bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_05.042.08.2 ye aśvadā uta vā santi godā ye vastradāḥ subhagās teṣu rāyaḥ
analyzed: ye aśva dāḥ uta vā santi go dāḥ ye vastra dāḥ subhagāḥ teṣu rāyaḥ

original: RV_05.042.09.1 visarmāṇaṃ kṛṇuhi vittam eṣāṃ ye bhuñjate apṛṇanto na ukthaiḥ
analyzed: visarmāṇam kṛṇuhi vittam eṣām ye bhuñjate apṛṇantaḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_05.042.09.2 apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahmadviṣaḥ sūryād yāvayasva
analyzed: apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahma dviṣaḥ sūryāt yāvayasva

original: RV_05.042.10.1 ya ohate rakṣaso devavītāv acakrebhis tam maruto ni yāta
analyzed: yaḥ ohate rakṣasaḥ deva vītau acakrebhiḥ tam marutaḥ ni yāta

original: RV_05.042.10.2 yo vaḥ śamīṃ śaśamānasya nindāt tuchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śamīm śaśamānasya nindāt tuchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ

original: RV_05.042.11.1 tam u ṣṭuhi yaḥ sviṣuḥ sudhanvā yo viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ su iṣuḥ su dhanvā yaḥ viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya

original: RV_05.042.11.2 yakṣvā mahe saumanasāya rudraṃ namobhir devam asuraṃ duvasya
analyzed: yakṣva mahe saumanasāya rudram namobhiḥ devam asuram duvasya

original: RV_05.042.12.1 damūnaso apaso ye suhastā vṛṣṇaḥ patnīr nadyo vibhvataṣṭāḥ
analyzed: damūnasaḥ apasaḥ ye su hastāḥ vṛṣṇaḥ patnīḥ nadyaḥ vibhva taṣṭāḥ

original: RV_05.042.12.2 sarasvatī bṛhaddivota rākā daśasyantīr varivasyantu śubhrāḥ
analyzed: sarasvatī bṛhat divā uta rākā daśasyantīḥ varivasyantu śubhrāḥ

original: RV_05.042.13.1 pra sū mahe suśaraṇāya medhāṃ giram bhare navyasīṃ jāyamānām
analyzed: pra su mahe su śaraṇāya medhām giram bhare navyasīm jāyamānām

original: RV_05.042.13.2 ya āhanā duhitur vakṣaṇāsu rūpā mināno akṛṇod idaṃ naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ āhanāḥ duhituḥ vakṣaṇāsu rūpā minānaḥ akṛṇot idam naḥ

original: RV_05.042.14.1 pra suṣṭuti stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiṃ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ
analyzed: pra suṣṭuti stanayantam ruvantam iḷaḥ patim jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ

original: RV_05.042.14.2 yo abdimāṃ udanimāṃ iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ abdimān udanimān iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_05.042.15.1 eṣa stomo mārutaṃ śardho achā rudrasya sūnūṃr yuvanyūṃr ud aśyāḥ
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ mārutam śardhaḥ achā rudrasya sūnūn yuvanyūn ud aśyāḥ

original: RV_05.042.15.2 kāmo rāye havate mā svasty upa stuhi pṛṣadaśvāṃ ayāsaḥ
analyzed: kāmaḥ rāye havate mā svasti upa stuhi pṛṣat aśvān ayāsaḥ

original: RV_05.042.16.1 praiṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāye aśyāḥ
analyzed: pra eṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣam vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ rāye aśyāḥ

original: RV_05.042.16.2 devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt
analyzed: devodevaḥ su havaḥ bhūtu mahyam mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt

original: RV_05.042.17.1 urau devā anibādhe syāma
analyzed: urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma

original: RV_05.042.18.1 sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_05.042.18.2 ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_05.043.01.1 ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇyarthā amardhantīr upa no yantu madhvā
analyzed: ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇi arthāḥ a mardhantīḥ upa naḥ yantu madhvā

original: RV_05.043.01.2 maho rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipro mayobhuvo jaritā johavīti
analyzed: mahaḥ rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipraḥ mayobhuvaḥ jaritā johavīti

original: RV_05.043.02.1 ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre
analyzed: ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre

original: RV_05.043.02.2 pitā mātā madhuvacāḥ suhastā bhare-bhare no yaśasāv aviṣṭām
analyzed: pitā mātā madhu vacāḥ su hastā bharebhare naḥ yaśasau aviṣṭām

original: RV_05.043.03.1 adhvaryavaś cakṛvāṃso madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ cakṛvāṃsaḥ madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram

original: RV_05.043.03.2 hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhy asya deva madhvo rarimā te madāya
analyzed: hotā iva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhi asya deva madhvaḥ rarimā te madāya

original: RV_05.043.04.1 daśa kṣipo yuñjate bāhū adriṃ somasya yā śamitārā suhastā
analyzed: daśa kṣipaḥ yuñjate bāhū adrim somasya yā śamitārā su hastā

original: RV_05.043.04.2 madhvo rasaṃ sugabhastir giriṣṭhāṃ caniścadad duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ
analyzed: madhvaḥ rasam su gabhastiḥ giriṣṭhām caniścadat duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ

original: RV_05.043.05.1 asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya
analyzed: asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya

original: RV_05.043.05.2 harī rathe sudhurā yoge arvāg indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ
analyzed: harī rathe su dhurā yoge arvāk indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_05.043.06.1 ā no mahīm aramatiṃ sajoṣā gnāṃ devīṃ namasā rātahavyām
analyzed: ā naḥ mahīm aramatim sajoṣāḥ gnām devīm namasā rāta havyām

original: RV_05.043.06.2 madhor madāya bṛhatīm ṛtajñām āgne vaha pathibhir devayānaiḥ
analyzed: madhoḥ madāya bṛhatīm ṛta jñām ā agne vaha pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_05.043.07.1 añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā vapāvantaṃ nāgninā tapantaḥ
analyzed: añjanti yam prathayantaḥ na viprāḥ vapāvantam na agninā tapantaḥ

original: RV_05.043.07.2 pitur na putra upasi preṣṭha ā gharmo agnim ṛtayann asādi
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ upasi preṣṭhaḥ ā gharmaḥ agnim ṛtayan asādi

original: RV_05.043.08.1 achā mahī bṛhatī śaṃtamā gīr dūto na gantv aśvinā huvadhyai
analyzed: achā mahī bṛhatī śaṃtamā gīḥ dūtaḥ na gantu aśvinā huvadhyai

original: RV_05.043.08.2 mayobhuvā sarathā yātam arvāg gantaṃ nidhiṃ dhuram āṇir na nābhim
analyzed: mayobhuvā sa rathā yātam arvāk gantam nidhim dhuram āṇiḥ na nābhim

original: RV_05.043.09.1 pra tavyaso namaüktiṃ turasyāham pūṣṇa uta vāyor adikṣi
analyzed: pra tavyasaḥ namaktim turasya aham pūṣṇaḥ uta vāyoḥ adikṣi

original: RV_05.043.09.2 yā rādhasā coditārā matīnāṃ yā vājasya draviṇodā uta tman
analyzed: yā rādhasā coditārā matīnām yā vājasya draviṇaḥ dā uta tman

original: RV_05.043.10.1 ā nāmabhir maruto vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhir jātavedo huvānaḥ
analyzed: ā nāmabhiḥ marutaḥ vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhiḥ jātavedaḥ huvānaḥ

original: RV_05.043.10.2 yajñaṃ giro jarituḥ suṣṭutiṃ ca viśve ganta maruto viśva ūtī
analyzed: yajñam giraḥ jarituḥ suṣṭutim ca viśve ganta marutaḥ viśve ūtī

original: RV_05.043.11.1 ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāt ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam

original: RV_05.043.11.2 havaṃ devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmāṃ no vācam uśatī śṛṇotu
analyzed: havam devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmām naḥ vācam uśatī śṛṇotu

original: RV_05.043.12.1 ā vedhasaṃ nīlapṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatiṃ sadane sādayadhvam
analyzed: ā vedhasam nīla pṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatim sadane sādayadhvam

original: RV_05.043.12.2 sādadyoniṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsaṃ hiraṇyavarṇam aruṣaṃ sapema
analyzed: sādadyonim dame ā dīdivāṃsam hiraṇya varṇam aruṣam sapema

original: RV_05.043.13.1 ā dharṇasir bṛhaddivo rarāṇo viśvebhir gantv omabhir huvānaḥ
analyzed: ā dharṇasiḥ bṛhat divaḥ rarāṇaḥ viśvebhiḥ gantu omabhiḥ huvānaḥ

original: RV_05.043.13.2 gnā vasāna oṣadhīr amṛdhras tridhātuśṛṅgo vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ
analyzed: gnāḥ vasānaḥ oṣadhīḥ amṛdhraḥ tri dhātu śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vayodhāḥ

original: RV_05.043.14.1 mātuṣ pade parame śukra āyor vipanyavo rāspirāso agman
analyzed: mātuṣ pade parame śukre āyoḥ vipanyavaḥ rāspirāsaḥ agman

original: RV_05.043.14.2 suśevyaṃ namasā rātahavyāḥ śiśum mṛjanty āyavo na vāse
analyzed: su śevyam namasā rāta havyāḥ śiśum mṛjanti āyavaḥ na vāse

original: RV_05.043.15.1 bṛhad vayo bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyājuro mithunāsaḥ sacanta
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyā juraḥ mithunāsaḥ sacanta

original: RV_05.043.15.2 devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt
analyzed: devodevaḥ su havaḥ bhūtu mahyam mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt

original: RV_05.043.16.1 urau devā anibādhe syāma
analyzed: urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma

original: RV_05.043.17.1 sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_05.043.17.2 ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_05.044.01.1 tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathemathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadaṃ svarvidam
analyzed: tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathā imathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadam svar vidam

original: RV_05.044.01.2 pratīcīnaṃ vṛjanaṃ dohase girāśuṃ jayantam anu yāsu vardhase
analyzed: pratīcīnam vṛjanam dohase girā āśum jayantam anu yāsu vardhase

original: RV_05.044.02.1 śriye sudṛśīr uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām acodate
analyzed: śriye su dṛśīḥ uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām a codate

original: RV_05.044.02.2 sugopā asi na dabhāya sukrato paro māyābhir ṛta āsa nāma te
analyzed: su gopāḥ asi na dabhāya sukrato paras māyābhiḥ ṛte āsa nāma te

original: RV_05.044.03.1 atyaṃ haviḥ sacate sac ca dhātu cāriṣṭagātuḥ sa hotā sahobhariḥ
analyzed: atyam haviḥ sacate sat ca dhātu ca ariṣṭa gātuḥ sa hotā sahaḥ bhariḥ

original: RV_05.044.03.2 prasarsrāṇo anu barhir vṛṣā śiśur madhye yuvājaro visruhā hitaḥ
analyzed: prasarsrāṇaḥ anu barhiḥ vṛṣā śiśuḥ madhye yuvā ajaraḥ visruhā hitaḥ

original: RV_05.044.04.1 pra va ete suyujo yāmann iṣṭaye nīcīr amuṣmai yamya ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ ete su yujaḥ yāman iṣṭaye nīcīḥ amuṣmai yamyaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_05.044.04.2 suyantubhiḥ sarvaśāsair abhīśubhiḥ krivir nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati
analyzed: suyantubhiḥ sarva śāsaiḥ abhīśubhiḥ kriviḥ nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati

original: RV_05.044.05.1 saṃjarbhurāṇas tarubhiḥ sutegṛbhaṃ vayākinaṃ cittagarbhāsu susvaruḥ
analyzed: saṃjarbhurāṇaḥ tarubhiḥ sutegṛbham vayākinam citta garbhāsu susvaruḥ

original: RV_05.044.05.2 dhāravākeṣv ṛjugātha śobhase vardhasva patnīr abhi jīvo adhvare
analyzed: dhāravākeṣu ṛju gātha śobhase vardhasva patnīḥ abhi jīvaḥ adhvare

original: RV_05.044.06.1 yādṛg eva dadṛśe tādṛg ucyate saṃ chāyayā dadhire sidhrayāpsv ā
analyzed: yādṛś eva dadṛśe tādṛś ucyate sam chāyayā dadhire sidhrayā apsu ā

original: RV_05.044.06.2 mahīm asmabhyam uruṣām uru jrayo bṛhat suvīram anapacyutaṃ sahaḥ
analyzed: mahīm asmabhyam uru sām uru jrayaḥ bṛhat su vīram an apacyutam sahaḥ

original: RV_05.044.07.1 vety agrur janivān vā ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: veti agruḥ janivān vai ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_05.044.07.2 ghraṃsaṃ rakṣantam pari viśvato gayam asmākaṃ śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ
analyzed: ghraṃsam rakṣantam pari viśvatas gayam asmākam śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ

original: RV_05.044.08.1 jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣisvaraṃ carati yāsu nāma te
analyzed: jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣi svaram carati yāsu nāma te

original: RV_05.044.08.2 yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidad ya u svayaṃ vahate so araṃ karat
analyzed: yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidat yaḥ u svayam vahate saḥ aram karat

original: RV_05.044.09.1 samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanaṃ yasminn āyatā
analyzed: samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanam yasmin āyatā

original: RV_05.044.09.2 atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matir vidyate pūtabandhanī
analyzed: atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matiḥ vidyate pūta bandhanī

original: RV_05.044.10.1 sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhir evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ
analyzed: sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhiḥ evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ

original: RV_05.044.10.2 avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭhaṃ vājaṃ viduṣā cid ardhyam
analyzed: avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭham vājam viduṣā cit ardhyam

original: RV_05.044.11.1 śyena āsām aditiḥ kakṣyo mado viśvavārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ
analyzed: śyenaḥ āsām aditiḥ kakṣyaḥ madaḥ viśva vārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_05.044.11.2 sam anyam-anyam arthayanty etave vidur viṣāṇam paripānam anti te
analyzed: sam anyam anyam arthayanti etave viduḥ viṣāṇam paripānam anti te

original: RV_05.044.12.1 sadāpṛṇo yajato vi dviṣo vadhīd bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavit taryo vaḥ sacā
analyzed: sadāpṛṇaḥ yajataḥ vi dviṣaḥ vadhīt bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavid taryaḥ vaḥ sacā

original: RV_05.044.12.2 ubhā sa varā praty eti bhāti ca yad īṃ gaṇam bhajate suprayāvabhiḥ
analyzed: ubhā sa varā prati eti bhāti ca yat īm gaṇam bhajate su prayāvabhiḥ

original: RV_05.044.13.1 sutambharo yajamānasya satpatir viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām udañcanaḥ
analyzed: sutambharaḥ yajamānasya sat patiḥ viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām

original: RV_05.044.13.2 bharad dhenū rasavac chiśriye payo 'nubruvāṇo adhy eti na svapan
analyzed: bharat dhenuḥ rasavat śiśriye payaḥ nubruvāṇaḥ adhi eti na svapan

original: RV_05.044.14.1 yo jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yo jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti
analyzed: yaḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yaḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti

original: RV_05.044.14.2 yo jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ

original: RV_05.044.15.1 agnir jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante 'gnir jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti
analyzed: agniḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante gniḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti

original: RV_05.044.15.2 agnir jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.11 vidā divo viṣyann adrim ukthair āyatyā uṣaso arcino guḥ
analyzed: vidā divaḥ viṣyan adrim ukthaiḥ āyatyāḥ uṣasaḥ arcinaḥ guḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.12 apāvṛta vrajinīr ut svar gād vi duro mānuṣīr deva āvaḥ
analyzed: apāvṛta vrajinīḥ ud svar gāt vi duraḥ mānuṣīḥ devaḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.21 vi sūryo amatiṃ na śriyaṃ sād orvād gavām mātā jānatī gāt
analyzed: vi sūryaḥ amatim na śriyam sāt ā ūrvāt gavām mātā jānatī gāt

original: RV_05.045.00.22 dhanvarṇaso nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇeva sumitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ
analyzed: dhanu arṇasaḥ nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇā iva su mitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.31 asmā ukthāya parvatasya garbho mahīnāṃ januṣe pūrvyāya
analyzed: asmai ukthāya parvatasya garbhaḥ mahīnām januṣe pūrvyāya

original: RV_05.045.00.32 vi parvato jihīta sādhata dyaur āvivāsanto dasayanta bhūma
analyzed: vi parvataḥ jihīta sādhata dyauḥ āvivāsantaḥ dasayanta bhūma

original: RV_05.045.00.41 sūktebhir vo vacobhir devajuṣṭair indrā nv agnī avase huvadhyai
analyzed: sūktebhiḥ vaḥ vacobhiḥ deva juṣṭaiḥ indrā nu agnī avase huvadhyai

original: RV_05.045.00.42 ukthebhir hi ṣmā kavayaḥ suyajñā āvivāsanto maruto yajanti
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ hi sma kavayaḥ su yajñāḥ āvivāsantaḥ marutaḥ yajanti

original: RV_05.045.00.51 eto nv adya sudhyo bhavāma pra duchunā minavāmā varīyaḥ
analyzed: nu adya sudhyaḥ bhavāma pra duchunāḥ minavāma varīyaḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.52 āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāmāyāma prāñco yajamānam acha
analyzed: āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāma āyāma prāñcaḥ yajamānam acha

original: RV_05.045.00.61 etā dhiyaṃ kṛṇavāmā sakhāyo 'pa yā mātām ṛṇuta vrajaṃ goḥ
analyzed: etā dhiyam kṛṇavāmā sakhāyau pa yā mātām ṛṇuta vrajam goḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.62 yayā manur viśiśipraṃ jigāya yayā vaṇig vaṅkur āpā purīṣam
analyzed: yayā manuḥ viśiśipram jigāya yayā vaṇij vaṅkuḥ āpa purīṣam

original: RV_05.045.00.71 anūnod atra hastayato adrir ārcan yena daśa māso navagvāḥ
analyzed: anūnot atra hasta yataḥ adriḥ ārcan yena daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.72 ṛtaṃ yatī saramā gā avindad viśvāni satyāṅgirāś cakāra
analyzed: ṛtam yatī saramā gāḥ avindat viśvāni satyā aṅgirāḥ cakāra

original: RV_05.045.00.81 viśve asyā vyuṣi māhināyāḥ saṃ yad gobhir aṅgiraso navanta
analyzed: viśve asyāḥ vyuṣi māhināyāḥ sam yat gobhiḥ aṅgirasaḥ navanta

original: RV_05.045.00.82 utsa āsām parame sadhastha ṛtasya pathā saramā vidad gāḥ
analyzed: utsaḥ āsām parame sadhasthe ṛtasya pathā saramā vidat gāḥ

original: RV_05.045.00.91 ā sūryo yātu saptāśvaḥ kṣetraṃ yad asyorviyā dīrghayāthe
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ yātu sapta aśvaḥ kṣetram yat asya urviyā dīrgha yāthe

original: RV_05.045.00.92 raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayad andho achā yuvā kavir dīdayad goṣu gachan
analyzed: raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayat andhaḥ achā yuvā kaviḥ dīdayat goṣu gachan

original: RV_05.045.01.01 ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇo 'yukta yad dharito vītapṛṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ aruhat śukram arṇaḥ yukta yat haritaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_05.045.01.02 udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrā āśṛṇvatīr āpo arvāg atiṣṭhan
analyzed: udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrāḥ āśṛṇvatīḥ āpaḥ arvāk atiṣṭhan

original: RV_05.045.01.11 dhiyaṃ vo apsu dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ yayātaran daśa māso navagvāḥ
analyzed: dhiyam vaḥ apsu dadhiṣe svarṣām yayā ataran daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_05.045.01.12 ayā dhiyā syāma devagopā ayā dhiyā tuturyāmāty aṃhaḥ
analyzed: ayā dhiyā syāma deva gopāḥ ayā dhiyā tuturyāma ati aṃhaḥ

original: RV_05.046.01.1 hayo na vidvāṃ ayuji svayaṃ dhuri tāṃ vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam
analyzed: hayaḥ na vidvān ayuji svayam dhuri tām vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam

original: RV_05.046.01.2 nāsyā vaśmi vimucaṃ nāvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraeta ṛju neṣati
analyzed: na asyāḥ vaśmi vimucam na āvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraetā ṛju neṣati

original: RV_05.046.02.1 agna indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta mārutota viṣṇo
analyzed: agne indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta māruta uta viṣṇo

original: RV_05.046.02.2 ubhā nāsatyā rudro adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta
analyzed: ubhā nāsatyā rudraḥ adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta

original: RV_05.046.03.1 indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāditiṃ svaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām marutaḥ parvatāṃ apaḥ
analyzed: indra agnī mitrāvaruṇā aditim svar pṛthivīm dyām marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ

original: RV_05.046.03.2 huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim bhagaṃ nu śaṃsaṃ savitāram ūtaye
analyzed: huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim bhagam nu śaṃsam savitāram ūtaye

original: RV_05.046.04.1 uta no viṣṇur uta vāto asridho draviṇodā uta somo mayas karat
analyzed: uta naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta vātaḥ asridhaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ uta somaḥ mayaḥ karat

original: RV_05.046.04.2 uta ṛbhava uta rāye no aśvinota tvaṣṭota vibhvānu maṃsate
analyzed: uta ṛbhavaḥ uta rāye naḥ aśvinā uta tvaṣṭā uta vibhvā anu maṃsate

original: RV_05.046.05.1 uta tyan no mārutaṃ śardha ā gamad divikṣayaṃ yajatam barhir āsade
analyzed: uta tyad naḥ mārutam śardhaḥ ā gamat divikṣayam yajatam barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_05.046.05.2 bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣota no yamad varūthyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣā uta naḥ yamat varūthyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_05.046.06.1 uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ suśastayaḥ sudītayo nadyas trāmaṇe bhuvan
analyzed: uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ su śastayaḥ su dītayaḥ nadyaḥ trāmaṇe bhuvan

original: RV_05.046.06.2 bhago vibhaktā śavasāvasā gamad uruvyacā aditiḥ śrotu me havam
analyzed: bhagaḥ vibhaktā śavasā avasā gamat uru vyacāḥ aditiḥ śrotu me havam

original: RV_05.046.07.1 devānām patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye
analyzed: devānām patnīḥ uśatīḥ avantu naḥ prāvantu naḥ tujaye vājasātaye

original: RV_05.046.07.2 yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yachata
analyzed: yāḥ pārthivāsaḥ yāḥ apām api vrate tāḥ naḥ devīḥ su havāḥ śarma yacchata

original: RV_05.046.08.1 uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ
analyzed: uta gnāḥ vyantu deva patnīḥ indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj

original: RV_05.046.08.2 ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām
analyzed: ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīḥ yaḥ ṛtuḥ janīnām

original: RV_05.047.01.1 prayuñjatī diva eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhitur bodhayantī
analyzed: prayuñjatī divaḥ eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhituḥ bodhayantī

original: RV_05.047.01.2 āvivāsantī yuvatir manīṣā pitṛbhya ā sadane johuvānā
analyzed: āvivāsantī yuvatiḥ manīṣā pitṛbhyaḥ ā sadane johuvānā

original: RV_05.047.02.1 ajirāsas tadapa īyamānā ātasthivāṃso amṛtasya nābhim
analyzed: ajirāsaḥ tad apaḥ īyamānāḥ ātasthivāṃsaḥ amṛtasya nābhim

original: RV_05.047.02.2 anantāsa uravo viśvataḥ sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ
analyzed: anantāsaḥ uravaḥ viśvatas sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ

original: RV_05.047.03.1 ukṣā samudro aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pitur ā viveśa
analyzed: ukṣā samudraḥ aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pituḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_05.047.03.2 madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmā vi cakrame rajasas pāty antau
analyzed: madhye divaḥ nihitaḥ pṛśniḥ aśmā vi cakrame rajasaḥ pāti antau

original: RV_05.047.04.1 catvāra īm bibhrati kṣemayanto daśa garbhaṃ carase dhāpayante
analyzed: catvāraḥ īm bibhrati kṣemayantaḥ daśa garbham carase dhāpayante

original: RV_05.047.04.2 tridhātavaḥ paramā asya gāvo divaś caranti pari sadyo antān
analyzed: tri dhātavaḥ paramāḥ asya gāvaḥ divaḥ caranti pari sadyas antān

original: RV_05.047.05.1 idaṃ vapur nivacanaṃ janāsaś caranti yan nadyas tasthur āpaḥ
analyzed: idam vapuḥ nivacanam janāsaḥ caranti yat nadyaḥ tasthuḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_05.047.05.2 dve yad īm bibhṛto mātur anye iheha jāte yamyṛ sabandhū
analyzed: dve yat īm bibhṛtaḥ mātuḥ anye iha iha jāte yamyṛ sabandhū

original: RV_05.047.06.1 vi tanvate dhiyo asmā apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaro vayanti
analyzed: vi tanvate dhiyaḥ asmai apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaraḥ vayanti

original: RV_05.047.06.2 upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇo modamānā divas pathā vadhvo yanty acha
analyzed: upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇaḥ modamānāḥ divaḥ pathā vadhvaḥ yanti acha

original: RV_05.047.07.1 tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam
analyzed: tat astu mitrāvaruṇā tat agne śam yos asmabhyam idam astu śastam

original: RV_05.047.07.2 aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya
analyzed: aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhām namaḥ dive bṛhate sādanāya

original: RV_05.048.01.1 kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya svayaśase mahe vayam
analyzed: kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya sva yaśase mahe vayam

original: RV_05.048.01.2 āmenyasya rajaso yad abhra āṃ apo vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī
analyzed: āmenyasya rajasaḥ yat abhre ām apaḥ vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī

original: RV_05.048.02.1 tā atnata vayunaṃ vīravakṣaṇaṃ samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ atnata vayunam vīra vakṣaṇam samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ

original: RV_05.048.02.2 apo apācīr aparā apejate pra pūrvābhis tirate devayur janaḥ
analyzed: apaḥ apācīḥ aparāḥ apejate pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate devayuḥ janaḥ

original: RV_05.048.03.1 ā grāvabhir ahanyebhir aktubhir variṣṭhaṃ vajram ā jigharti māyini
analyzed: ā grāvabhiḥ ahanyebhiḥ aktubhiḥ variṣṭham vajram ā jigharti māyini

original: RV_05.048.03.2 śataṃ vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayanto vi ca vartayann ahā
analyzed: śatam vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayantaḥ vi ca vartayan ahā

original: RV_05.048.04.1 tām asya rītim paraśor iva praty anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ
analyzed: tām asya rītim paraśoḥ iva prati anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ

original: RV_05.048.04.2 sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayaṃ ratnaṃ dadhāti bharahūtaye viśe
analyzed: sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayam ratnam dadhāti bhara hūtaye viśe

original: RV_05.048.05.1 sa jihvayā caturanīka ṛñjate cāru vasāno varuṇo yatann arim
analyzed: sa jihvayā catur anīkaḥ ṛñjate cāru vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ yatan arim

original: RV_05.048.05.2 na tasya vidma puruṣatvatā vayaṃ yato bhagaḥ savitā dāti vāryam
analyzed: na tasya vidma puruṣatva tā vayam yatas bhagaḥ savitā dāti vāryam

original: RV_05.049.01.1 devaṃ vo adya savitāram eṣe bhagaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ
analyzed: devam vaḥ adya savitāram eṣe bhagam ca ratnam vibhajantam āyoḥ

original: RV_05.049.01.2 ā vāṃ narā purubhujā vavṛtyāṃ dive-dive cid aśvinā sakhīyan
analyzed: ā vām narā puru bhujā vavṛtyām dive dive cit aśvinā sakhīyan

original: RV_05.049.02.1 prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktair devaṃ savitāraṃ duvasya
analyzed: prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktaiḥ devam savitāram duvasya

original: RV_05.049.02.2 upa bruvīta namasā vijānañ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ
analyzed: upa bruvīta namasā vijānam jyeṣṭham ca ratnam vibhajantam āyoḥ

original: RV_05.049.03.1 adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhago aditir vasta usraḥ
analyzed: adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhagaḥ aditiḥ vaste usraḥ

original: RV_05.049.03.2 indro viṣṇur varuṇo mitro agnir ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viṣṇuḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ

original: RV_05.049.04.1 tan no anarvā savitā varūthaṃ tat sindhava iṣayanto anu gman
analyzed: tat naḥ anarvā savitā varūtham tat sindhavaḥ iṣayantaḥ anu gman

original: RV_05.049.04.2 upa yad voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayo vājaratnāḥ
analyzed: upa yat voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayaḥ vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_05.049.05.1 pra ye vasubhya īvad ā namo dur ye mitre varuṇe sūktavācaḥ
analyzed: pra ye vasubhyaḥ īvat ā namaḥ duḥ ye mitre varuṇe sūkta vācaḥ

original: RV_05.049.05.2 avaitv abhvaṃ kṛṇutā varīyo divaspṛthivyor avasā madema
analyzed: avaitu abhvam kṛṇuta varīyaḥ divaspṛthivyoḥ avasā madema

original: RV_05.050.01.1 viśvo devasya netur marto vurīta sakhyam
analyzed: viśvaḥ devasya netuḥ martaḥ vurīta sakhyam

original: RV_05.050.01.2 viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase
analyzed: viśvaḥ rāyaḥ iṣudhyati dyumnam vṛṇīta puṣyase

original: RV_05.050.02.1 te te deva netar ye cemāṃ anuśase
analyzed: te te deva netar ye ca imām anuśase

original: RV_05.050.02.2 te rāyā te hy ṛpṛce sacemahi sacathyaìḥ
analyzed: te rāyā te hi ṛpṛce sacemahi sacathyaḥ

original: RV_05.050.03.1 ato na ā nñn atithīn ataḥ patnīr daśasyata
analyzed: atas naḥ ā atithīn atas patnīḥ daśasyata

original: RV_05.050.03.2 āre viśvam patheṣṭhāṃ dviṣo yuyotu yūyuviḥ
analyzed: āre viśvam patheṣṭhām dviṣaḥ yuyotu yūyuviḥ

original: RV_05.050.04.1 yatra vahnir abhihito dudravad droṇyaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: yatra vahniḥ abhihitaḥ dudravat droṇyaḥ paśuḥ

original: RV_05.050.04.2 nṛmaṇā vīrapastyo 'rṇā dhīreva sanitā
analyzed: nṛmaṇāḥ vīra pastyoḥ rṇā dhīrā iva sanitā

original: RV_05.050.05.1 eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śaṃ rayiḥ
analyzed: eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śam rayiḥ

original: RV_05.050.05.2 śaṃ rāye śaṃ svastaya iṣastuto manāmahe devastuto manāmahe
analyzed: śam rāye śam svastaye iṣa stutaḥ manāmahe deva stutaḥ manāmahe

original: RV_05.051.01.1 agne sutasya pītaye viśvair ūmebhir ā gahi
analyzed: agne sutasya pītaye viśvaiḥ ūmebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_05.051.01.2 devebhir havyadātaye
analyzed: devebhiḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_05.051.02.1 ṛtadhītaya ā gata satyadharmāṇo adhvaram
analyzed: ṛta dhītayaḥ ā gata satya dharmāṇaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_05.051.02.2 agneḥ pibata jihvayā
analyzed: agneḥ pibata jihvayā

original: RV_05.051.03.1 viprebhir vipra santya prātaryāvabhir ā gahi
analyzed: viprebhiḥ vipra santya prātaryāvabhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_05.051.03.2 devebhiḥ somapītaye
analyzed: devebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_05.051.04.1 ayaṃ somaś camū suto 'matre pari ṣicyate
analyzed: ayam somaḥ camū sutaḥ matre pari sicyate

original: RV_05.051.04.2 priya indrāya vāyave
analyzed: priyaḥ indrāya vāyave

original: RV_05.051.05.1 vāyav ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇo havyadātaye
analyzed: vāyo ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇaḥ havya dātaye

original: RV_05.051.05.2 pibā sutasyāndhaso abhi prayaḥ
analyzed: pibā sutasya andhasaḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_05.051.06.1 indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ sutānām pītim arhathaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ ca vāyo eṣām sutānām pītim arhathaḥ

original: RV_05.051.06.2 tāñ juṣethām arepasāv abhi prayaḥ
analyzed: tām juṣethām arepasau abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_05.051.07.1 sutā indrāya vāyave somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
analyzed: sutāḥ indrāya vāyave somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_05.051.07.2 nimnaṃ na yanti sindhavo 'bhi prayaḥ
analyzed: nimnam na yanti sindhavaḥ bhi prayaḥ

original: RV_05.051.08.1 sajūr viśvebhir devebhir aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ
analyzed: sajūs viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūs

original: RV_05.051.08.2 ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_05.051.09.1 sajūr mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ sajūḥ somena viṣṇunā
analyzed: sajūs mitrāvaruṇābhyām sajūs somena viṣṇunā

original: RV_05.051.09.2 ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_05.051.10.1 sajūr ādityair vasubhiḥ sajūr indreṇa vāyunā
analyzed: sajūs ādityaiḥ vasubhiḥ sajūs indreṇa vāyunā

original: RV_05.051.10.2 ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa
analyzed: ā yāhi agne atri vat sute raṇa

original: RV_05.051.11.1 svasti no mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devy aditir anarvaṇaḥ
analyzed: svasti naḥ mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devī aditiḥ anarvaṇaḥ

original: RV_05.051.11.2 svasti pūṣā asuro dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā
analyzed: svasti pūṣā asuraḥ dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā

original: RV_05.051.12.1 svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somaṃ svasti bhuvanasya yas patiḥ
analyzed: svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somam svasti bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_05.051.12.2 bṛhaspatiṃ sarvagaṇaṃ svastaye svastaya ādityāso bhavantu naḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatim sarva gaṇam svastaye svastaye ādityāsaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: RV_05.051.13.1 viśve devā no adyā svastaye vaiśvānaro vasur agniḥ svastaye
analyzed: viśve devāḥ naḥ adya svastaye vaiśvānaraḥ vasuḥ agniḥ svastaye

original: RV_05.051.13.2 devā avantv ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti no rudraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ avantu ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti naḥ rudraḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_05.051.14.1 svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati
analyzed: svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati

original: RV_05.051.14.2 svasti na indraś cāgniś ca svasti no adite kṛdhi
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ ca agniḥ ca svasti naḥ adite kṛdhi

original: RV_05.051.15.1 svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasāv iva
analyzed: svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasau iva

original: RV_05.051.15.2 punar dadatāghnatā jānatā saṃ gamemahi
analyzed: punar dadatā a ghnatā jānatā sam gamemahi

original: RV_05.052.01.1 pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyārcā marudbhir ṛkvabhiḥ
analyzed: pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyā arca marudbhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_05.052.01.2 ye adrogham anuṣvadhaṃ śravo madanti yajñiyāḥ
analyzed: ye adrogham anuṣvadham śravaḥ madanti yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_05.052.02.1 te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_05.052.02.2 te yāmann ā dhṛṣadvinas tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ
analyzed: te yāman ā dhṛṣadvinaḥ tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ

original: RV_05.052.03.1 te syandrāso nokṣaṇo 'ti ṣkandanti śarvarīḥ
analyzed: te syandrāsaḥ na ukṣaṇaḥ ti skandanti śarvarīḥ

original: RV_05.052.03.2 marutām adhā maho divi kṣamā ca manmahe
analyzed: marutām adhā mahaḥ divi kṣamā ca manmahe

original: RV_05.052.04.1 marutsu vo dadhīmahi stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: marutsu vaḥ dadhīmahi stomam yajñam ca dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_05.052.04.2 viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ
analyzed: viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_05.052.05.1 arhanto ye sudānavo naro asāmiśavasaḥ
analyzed: arhantaḥ ye sudānavaḥ naraḥ asāmi śavasaḥ

original: RV_05.052.05.2 pra yajñaṃ yajñiyebhyo divo arcā marudbhyaḥ
analyzed: pra yajñam yajñiyebhyaḥ divaḥ arca marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_05.052.06.1 ā rukmair ā yudhā nara ṛṣvā ṛṣṭīr asṛkṣata
analyzed: ā rukmaiḥ ā yudhā naraḥ ṛṣvāḥ ṛṣṭīḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_05.052.06.2 anv enāṃ aha vidyuto maruto jajjhatīr iva bhānur arta tmanā divaḥ
analyzed: anu enām aha vidyutaḥ marutaḥ jajjhatīḥ iva bhānuḥ arta tmanā divaḥ

original: RV_05.052.07.1 ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivā ya urāv antarikṣa ā
analyzed: ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivāḥ ye urau antarikṣe ā

original: RV_05.052.07.2 vṛjane vā nadīnāṃ sadhasthe vā maho divaḥ
analyzed: vṛjane vā nadīnām sadhasthe vā mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_05.052.08.1 śardho mārutam uc chaṃsa satyaśavasam ṛbhvasam
analyzed: śardhaḥ mārutam ud śaṃsa satya śavasam ṛbhvasam

original: RV_05.052.08.2 uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā
analyzed: uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā

original: RV_05.052.09.1 uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇā vasata śundhyavaḥ
analyzed: uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇāḥ vasata śundhyavaḥ

original: RV_05.052.09.2 uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanty ojasā
analyzed: uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanti ojasā

original: RV_05.052.10.1 āpathayo vipathayo 'ntaspathā anupathāḥ
analyzed: āpathayaḥ vipathayaḥ ntaspathāḥ anupathāḥ

original: RV_05.052.10.2 etebhir mahyaṃ nāmabhir yajñaṃ viṣṭāra ohate
analyzed: etebhiḥ mahyam nāmabhiḥ yajñam viṣṭāre ohate

original: RV_05.052.11.1 adhā naro ny ohate 'dhā niyuta ohate
analyzed: adhā naraḥ ni ohate dhāḥ niyutaḥ ohate

original: RV_05.052.11.2 adhā pārāvatā iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā
analyzed: adhā pārāvatāḥ iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā

original: RV_05.052.12.1 chandastubhaḥ kubhanyava utsam ā kīriṇo nṛtuḥ
analyzed: chanda stubhaḥ kubhanyavaḥ utsam ā kīriṇaḥ nṛtuḥ

original: RV_05.052.12.2 te me ke cin na tāyava ūmā āsan dṛśi tviṣe
analyzed: te me ke cit na tāyavaḥ ūmāḥ āsan dṛśi tviṣe

original: RV_05.052.13.1 ya ṛṣvā ṛṣṭividyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ
analyzed: ye ṛṣvāḥ ṛṣṭi vidyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ

original: RV_05.052.13.2 tam ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ namasyā ramayā girā
analyzed: tam ṛṣe mārutam gaṇam namasya ramaya girā

original: RV_05.052.14.1 acha ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ dānā mitraṃ na yoṣaṇā
analyzed: acha ṛṣe mārutam gaṇam dānā mitram na yoṣaṇā

original: RV_05.052.14.2 divo vā dhṛṣṇava ojasā stutā dhībhir iṣaṇyata
analyzed: divaḥ vā dhṛṣṇavaḥ ojasā stutāḥ dhībhiḥ iṣaṇyata

original: RV_05.052.15.1 nū manvāna eṣāṃ devāṃ achā na vakṣaṇā
analyzed: nu manvānaḥ eṣām devān achā na vakṣaṇā

original: RV_05.052.15.2 dānā saceta sūribhir yāmaśrutebhir añjibhiḥ
analyzed: dānā saceta sūribhiḥ yāma śrutebhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_05.052.16.1 pra ye me bandhveṣe gāṃ vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśniṃ vocanta mātaram
analyzed: pra ye me bandhu eṣe gām vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśnim vocanta mātaram

original: RV_05.052.16.2 adhā pitaram iṣmiṇaṃ rudraṃ vocanta śikvasaḥ
analyzed: adhā pitaram iṣmiṇam rudram vocanta śikvasaḥ

original: RV_05.052.17.1 sapta me sapta śākina ekam-ekā śatā daduḥ
analyzed: sapta me sapta śākinaḥ ekam ekā śatā daduḥ

original: RV_05.052.17.2 yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādho gavyam mṛje ni rādho aśvyam mṛje
analyzed: yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādhaḥ gavyam mṛje ni rādhaḥ aśvyam mṛje

original: RV_05.053.01.1 ko veda jānam eṣāṃ ko vā purā sumneṣv āsa marutām
analyzed: kaḥ veda jānam eṣām kaḥ vā purā sumneṣu āsa marutām

original: RV_05.053.01.2 yad yuyujre kilāsyaḥ
analyzed: yat yuyujre kilāsyaḥ

original: RV_05.053.02.1 aitān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ
analyzed: ā etān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ

original: RV_05.053.02.2 kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anv āpaya iḷābhir vṛṣṭayaḥ saha
analyzed: kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anu āpayaḥ iḷābhiḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ saha

original: RV_05.053.03.1 te ma āhur ya āyayur upa dyubhir vibhir made
analyzed: te me āhuḥ ye āyayuḥ upa dyubhiḥ vibhiḥ made

original: RV_05.053.03.2 naro maryā arepasa imān paśyann iti ṣṭuhi
analyzed: naraḥ maryāḥ arepasaḥ imān paśyan iti stuhi

original: RV_05.053.04.1 ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu svabhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu
analyzed: ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu sva bhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu

original: RV_05.053.04.2 śrāyā ratheṣu dhanvasu
analyzed: śrāyāḥ ratheṣu dhanvasu

original: RV_05.053.05.1 yuṣmākaṃ smā rathāṃ anu mude dadhe maruto jīradānavaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākam smā rathān anu mude dadhe marutaḥ jīra dānavaḥ

original: RV_05.053.05.2 vṛṣṭī dyāvo yatīr iva
analyzed: vṛṣṭī dyāvaḥ yatīḥ iva

original: RV_05.053.06.1 ā yaṃ naraḥ sudānavo dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ
analyzed: ā yam naraḥ sudānavaḥ dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ

original: RV_05.053.06.2 vi parjanyaṃ sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: vi parjanyam sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_05.053.07.1 tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasrur dhenavo yathā
analyzed: tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasruḥ dhenavaḥ yathā

original: RV_05.053.07.2 syannā aśvā ivādhvano vimocane vi yad vartanta enyaḥ
analyzed: syannāḥ aśvāḥ iva adhvanaḥ vimocane vi yat vartante enyaḥ

original: RV_05.053.08.1 ā yāta maruto diva āntarikṣād amād uta
analyzed: ā yāta marutaḥ divaḥ āntarikṣāt amāt uta

original: RV_05.053.08.2 māva sthāta parāvataḥ
analyzed: mā ava sthāta parāvataḥ

original: RV_05.053.09.1 mā vo rasānitabhā kubhā krumur mā vaḥ sindhur ni rīramat
analyzed: mā vaḥ rasā anitabhā kubhā krumuḥ mā vaḥ sindhuḥ ni rīramat

original: RV_05.053.09.2 mā vaḥ pari ṣṭhāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇy asme īt sumnam astu vaḥ
analyzed: mā vaḥ pari sthāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇī asme īd sumnam astu vaḥ

original: RV_05.053.10.1 taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ rathānāṃ tveṣaṃ gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām
analyzed: tam vaḥ śardham rathānām tveṣam gaṇam mārutam navyasīnām

original: RV_05.053.10.2 anu pra yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: anu pra yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_05.053.11.1 śardhaṃ-śardhaṃ va eṣāṃ vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhiḥ
analyzed: śardham śardham vaḥ eṣām vrātam vrātam gaṇam gaṇam su śastibhiḥ

original: RV_05.053.11.2 anu krāmema dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: anu krāmema dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_05.053.12.1 kasmā adya sujātāya rātahavyāya pra yayuḥ
analyzed: kasmai adya sujātāya rāta havyāya pra yayuḥ

original: RV_05.053.12.2 enā yāmena marutaḥ
analyzed: enā yāmena marutaḥ

original: RV_05.053.13.1 yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījaṃ vahadhve akṣitam
analyzed: yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījam vahadhve akṣitam

original: RV_05.053.13.2 asmabhyaṃ tad dhattana yad va īmahe rādho viśvāyu saubhagam
analyzed: asmabhyam tat dhattana yat vaḥ īmahe rādhaḥ viśvāyu saubhagam

original: RV_05.053.14.1 atīyāma nidas tiraḥ svastibhir hitvāvadyam arātīḥ
analyzed: atīyāma nidaḥ tiras svastibhiḥ hitvā avadyam arātīḥ

original: RV_05.053.14.2 vṛṣṭvī śaṃ yor āpa usri bheṣajaṃ syāma marutaḥ saha
analyzed: vṛṣṭvī śam yoḥ āpaḥ usri bheṣajam syāma marutaḥ saha

original: RV_05.053.15.1 sudevaḥ samahāsati suvīro naro marutaḥ sa martyaḥ
analyzed: su devaḥ samaha asati su vīraḥ naraḥ marutaḥ sa martyaḥ

original: RV_05.053.15.2 yaṃ trāyadhve syāma te
analyzed: yam trāyadhve syāma te

original: RV_05.053.16.1 stuhi bhojān stuvato asya yāmani raṇan gāvo na yavase
analyzed: stuhi bhojān stuvataḥ asya yāmani raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase

original: RV_05.053.16.2 yataḥ pūrvāṃ iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ
analyzed: yatas pūrvān iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ

original: RV_05.054.01.1 pra śardhāya mārutāya svabhānava imāṃ vācam anajā parvatacyute
analyzed: pra śardhāya mārutāya sva bhānave imām vācam anajā parvata cyute

original: RV_05.054.01.2 gharmastubhe diva ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumnaśravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata
analyzed: gharma stubhe divaḥ ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumna śravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata

original: RV_05.054.02.1 pra vo marutas taviṣā udanyavo vayovṛdho aśvayujaḥ parijrayaḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ marutaḥ taviṣāḥ udanyavaḥ vayaḥ vṛdhaḥ aśva yujaḥ parijrayaḥ

original: RV_05.054.02.2 saṃ vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranty āpo 'vanā parijrayaḥ
analyzed: sam vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranti āpaḥ vanā parijrayaḥ

original: RV_05.054.03.1 vidyunmahaso naro aśmadidyavo vātatviṣo marutaḥ parvatacyutaḥ
analyzed: vidyut mahasaḥ naraḥ aśma didyavaḥ vāta tviṣaḥ marutaḥ parvata cyutaḥ

original: RV_05.054.03.2 abdayā cin muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanayadamā rabhasā udojasaḥ
analyzed: abdayā cit muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanaya damāḥ rabhasāḥ udojasaḥ

original: RV_05.054.04.1 vy aktūn rudrā vy ahāni śikvaso vy antarikṣaṃ vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ
analyzed: vi aktūn rudrāḥ vi ahāni śikvasaḥ vi antarikṣam vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_05.054.04.2 vi yad ajrāṃ ajatha nāva īṃ yathā vi durgāṇi maruto nāha riṣyatha
analyzed: vi yat ajrām ajatha nāvaḥ īm yathā vi durgāṇi marutaḥ na aha riṣyatha

original: RV_05.054.05.1 tad vīryaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ tatāna sūryo na yojanam
analyzed: tat vīryam vaḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam dīrgham tatāna sūryaḥ na yojanam

original: RV_05.054.05.2 etā na yāme agṛbhītaśociṣo 'naśvadāṃ yan ny ayātanā girim
analyzed: etāḥ na yāme a gṛbhīta śociṣaḥ naśva dām yat ni ayātana girim

original: RV_05.054.06.1 abhrāji śardho maruto yad arṇasam moṣathā vṛkṣaṃ kapaneva vedhasaḥ
analyzed: abhrāji śardhaḥ marutaḥ yat arṇasam moṣatha vṛkṣam kapanā iva vedhasaḥ

original: RV_05.054.06.2 adha smā no aramatiṃ sajoṣasaś cakṣur iva yantam anu neṣathā sugam
analyzed: adha smā naḥ aramatim sajoṣasaḥ cakṣuḥ iva yantam anu neṣathāḥ sugam

original: RV_05.054.07.1 na sa jīyate maruto na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati
analyzed: na sa jīyate marutaḥ na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati

original: RV_05.054.07.2 nāsya rāya upa dasyanti notaya ṛṣiṃ vā yaṃ rājānaṃ vā suṣūdatha
analyzed: na asya rāyaḥ upa dasyanti na ūtayaḥ ṛṣim vā yam rājānam vā suṣūdatha

original: RV_05.054.08.1 niyutvanto grāmajito yathā naro 'ryamaṇo na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ
analyzed: niyutvantaḥ grāma jitaḥ yathā naraḥ ryamaṇaḥ na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ

original: RV_05.054.08.2 pinvanty utsaṃ yad ināso asvaran vy undanti pṛthivīm madhvo andhasā
analyzed: pinvanti utsam yat ināsaḥ asvaran vi undanti pṛthivīm madhvaḥ andhasā

original: RV_05.054.09.1 pravatvatīyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyaur bhavati prayadbhyaḥ
analyzed: pravatvatī iyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyauḥ bhavati prayadbhyaḥ

original: RV_05.054.09.2 pravatvatīḥ pathyṛ antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatā jīradānavaḥ
analyzed: pravatvatīḥ pathyṛ antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatāḥ jīra dānavaḥ

original: RV_05.054.10.1 yan marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrya udite madathā divo naraḥ
analyzed: yat marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrye udite madatha divaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_05.054.10.2 na vo 'śvāḥ śrathayantāha sisrataḥ sadyo asyādhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha
analyzed: na vaḥ śvās śrathayantā aha sisrataḥ sadyas asya adhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha

original: RV_05.054.11.1 aṃseṣu va ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu khādayo vakṣassu rukmā maruto rathe śubhaḥ
analyzed: aṃseṣu vaḥ ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu kha ādayaḥ vakṣassu rukmāḥ marutaḥ rathe śubhaḥ

original: RV_05.054.11.2 agnibhrājaso vidyuto gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatā hiraṇyayīḥ
analyzed: agni bhrājasaḥ vidyutaḥ gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatāḥ hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_05.054.12.1 taṃ nākam aryo agṛbhītaśociṣaṃ ruśat pippalam maruto vi dhūnutha
analyzed: tam nākam aryaḥ a gṛbhīta śociṣam ruśat pippalam marutaḥ vi dhūnutha

original: RV_05.054.12.2 sam acyanta vṛjanātitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣaṃ vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ
analyzed: sam acyanta vṛjanā atitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣam vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ

original: RV_05.054.13.1 yuṣmādattasya maruto vicetaso rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ
analyzed: yuṣmādattasya marutaḥ vicetasaḥ rāyaḥ syāma rathyaḥ vayasvataḥ

original: RV_05.054.13.2 na yo yuchati tiṣyo yathā divo 'sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam
analyzed: na yaḥ yuchati tiṣyaḥ yathā divaḥ sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_05.054.14.1 yūyaṃ rayim maruta spārhavīraṃ yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāmavipram
analyzed: yūyam rayim marutaḥ spārha vīram yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāma vipram

original: RV_05.054.14.2 yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājaṃ yūyaṃ dhattha rājānaṃ śruṣṭimantam
analyzed: yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājam yūyam dhattha rājānam śruṣṭimantam

original: RV_05.054.15.1 tad vo yāmi draviṇaṃ sadyaūtayo yenā svar ṇa tatanāma nṝṃr abhi
analyzed: tat vaḥ yāmi draviṇam sadyaūtayaḥ yena svar na tatanāma nṝn abhi

original: RV_05.054.15.2 idaṃ su me maruto haryatā vaco yasya tarema tarasā śataṃ himāḥ
analyzed: idam su me marutaḥ haryata vacaḥ yasya tarema tarasā śatam himāḥ

original: RV_05.055.00.11 prayajyavo maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayo bṛhad vayo dadhire rukmavakṣasaḥ
analyzed: prayajyavaḥ marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ bṛhat vayaḥ dadhire rukma vakṣasaḥ

original: RV_05.055.00.12 īyante aśvaiḥ suyamebhir āśubhiḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: īyante aśvaiḥ su yamebhiḥ āśubhiḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.21 svayaṃ dadhidhve taviṣīṃ yathā vida bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatha
analyzed: svayam dadhidhve taviṣīm yathā vida bṛhat mahāntaḥ urviyā vi rājatha

original: RV_05.055.00.22 utāntarikṣam mamire vy ojasā śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: uta antarikṣam mamire vi ojasā śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.31 sākaṃ jātāḥ subhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cid ā prataraṃ vāvṛdhur naraḥ
analyzed: sākam jātāḥ su bhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cit ā prataram vāvṛdhuḥ naraḥ

original: RV_05.055.00.32 virokiṇaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: virokiṇaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.41 ābhūṣeṇyaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ didṛkṣeṇyaṃ sūryasyeva cakṣaṇam
analyzed: ābhūṣeṇyam vaḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam didṛkṣeṇyam sūryasya iva cakṣaṇam

original: RV_05.055.00.42 uto asmāṃ amṛtatve dadhātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: uta u asmām amṛta tve dadhātana śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.51 ud īrayathā marutaḥ samudrato yūyaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ varṣayathā purīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: ud īrayatha marutaḥ samudrataḥ yūyam vṛṣṭim varṣayatha purīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_05.055.00.52 na vo dasrā upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: na vaḥ dasrāḥ upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.61 yad aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ hiraṇyayān praty atkāṃ amugdhvam
analyzed: yat aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam hiraṇyayān prati atkām amugdhvam

original: RV_05.055.00.62 viśvā it spṛdho maruto vy asyatha śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: viśvāḥ id spṛdhaḥ marutaḥ vi asyatha śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.71 na parvatā na nadyo varanta vo yatrācidhvam maruto gachathed u tat
analyzed: na parvatāḥ na nadyaḥ varanta vaḥ yatra acidhvam marutaḥ gachatha id u tat

original: RV_05.055.00.72 uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthanā pari śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthana pari śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.81 yat pūrvyam maruto yac ca nūtanaṃ yad udyate vasavo yac ca śasyate
analyzed: yat pūrvyam marutaḥ yat ca nūtanam yat udyate vasavaḥ yat ca śasyate

original: RV_05.055.00.82 viśvasya tasya bhavathā navedasaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: viśvasya tasya bhavatha navedasaḥ śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.00.91 mṛḷata no maruto mā vadhiṣṭanāsmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yantana
analyzed: mṛḍata naḥ marutaḥ mā vadhiṣṭana asmabhyam śarma bahulam vi yantana

original: RV_05.055.00.92 adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
analyzed: adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubham yātām anu rathāḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_05.055.01.01 yūyam asmān nayata vasyo achā nir aṃhatibhyo maruto gṛṇānāḥ
analyzed: yūyam asmān nayata vasyaḥ achā niḥ aṃhatibhyaḥ marutaḥ gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_05.055.01.02 juṣadhvaṃ no havyadātiṃ yajatrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām
analyzed: juṣadhvam naḥ havya dātim yajatrāḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_05.056.01.1 agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭaṃ rukmebhir añjibhiḥ
analyzed: agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭam rukmebhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_05.056.01.2 viśo adya marutām ava hvaye divaś cid rocanād adhi
analyzed: viśaḥ adya marutām ava hvaye divaḥ cit rocanāt adhi

original: RV_05.056.02.1 yathā cin manyase hṛdā tad in me jagmur āśasaḥ
analyzed: yathā cit manyase hṛdā tat id me jagmuḥ āśasaḥ

original: RV_05.056.02.2 ye te nediṣṭhaṃ havanāny āgaman tān vardha bhīmasaṃdṛśaḥ
analyzed: ye te nediṣṭham havanāni āgaman tān vardha bhīma saṃdṛśaḥ

original: RV_05.056.03.1 mīḷhuṣmatīva pṛthivī parāhatā madanty ety asmad ā
analyzed: mīḷhuṣmatī iva pṛthivī parāhatā madantī eti asmat ā

original: RV_05.056.03.2 ṛkṣo na vo marutaḥ śimīvāṃ amo dudhro gaur iva bhīmayuḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣaḥ na vaḥ marutaḥ śimīvān amaḥ dudhraḥ gauḥ iva bhīmayuḥ

original: RV_05.056.04.1 ni ye riṇanty ojasā vṛthā gāvo na durdhuraḥ
analyzed: ni ye riṇanti ojasā vṛthā gāvaḥ na durdhuraḥ

original: RV_05.056.04.2 aśmānaṃ cit svaryam parvataṃ girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ
analyzed: aśmānam cit svaryam parvatam girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_05.056.05.1 ut tiṣṭha nūnam eṣāṃ stomaiḥ samukṣitānām
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha nūnam eṣām stomaiḥ samukṣitānām

original: RV_05.056.05.2 marutām purutamam apūrvyaṃ gavāṃ sargam iva hvaye
analyzed: marutām purutamam apūrvyam gavām sargam iva hvaye

original: RV_05.056.06.1 yuṅgdhvaṃ hy aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvaṃ ratheṣu rohitaḥ
analyzed: yuṅgdhvam hi aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvam ratheṣu rohitaḥ

original: RV_05.056.06.2 yuṅgdhvaṃ harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave
analyzed: yuṅgdhvam harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave

original: RV_05.056.07.1 uta sya vājy aruṣas tuviṣvaṇir iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ
analyzed: uta sya vājī aruṣaḥ tuviṣvaṇiḥ iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ

original: RV_05.056.07.2 mā vo yāmeṣu marutaś ciraṃ karat pra taṃ ratheṣu codata
analyzed: mā vaḥ yāmeṣu marutaḥ ciram karat pra tam ratheṣu codata

original: RV_05.056.08.1 rathaṃ nu mārutaṃ vayaṃ śravasyum ā huvāmahe
analyzed: ratham nu mārutam vayam śravasyum ā huvāmahe

original: RV_05.056.08.2 ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī
analyzed: ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī

original: RV_05.056.09.1 taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ ratheśubhaṃ tveṣam panasyum ā huve
analyzed: tam vaḥ śardham ratheśubham tveṣam panasyum ā huve

original: RV_05.056.09.2 yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḷhuṣī
analyzed: yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḍhuṣī

original: RV_05.057.01.1 ā rudrāsa indravantaḥ sajoṣaso hiraṇyarathāḥ suvitāya gantana
analyzed: ā rudrāsaḥ indravantaḥ sajoṣasaḥ hiraṇya rathāḥ suvitāya gantana

original: RV_05.057.01.2 iyaṃ vo asmat prati haryate matis tṛṣṇaje na diva utsā udanyave
analyzed: iyam vaḥ asmat prati haryate matiḥ tṛṣṇaje na divaḥ utsāḥ udanyave

original: RV_05.057.02.1 vāśīmanta ṛṣṭimanto manīṣiṇaḥ sudhanvāna iṣumanto niṣaṅgiṇaḥ
analyzed: vāśīmantaḥ ṛṣṭimantaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ su dhanvānaḥ iṣumantaḥ niṣaṅgiṇaḥ

original: RV_05.057.02.2 svaśvā stha surathāḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ svāyudhā maruto yāthanā śubham
analyzed: su aśvāḥ stha su rathāḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ su āyudhāḥ marutaḥ yāthana śubham

original: RV_05.057.03.1 dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vo vanā jihate yāmano bhiyā
analyzed: dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vaḥ vanā jihate yāmanaḥ bhiyā

original: RV_05.057.03.2 kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhe yad ugrāḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam
analyzed: kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśni mātaraḥ śubhe yat ugrāḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam

original: RV_05.057.04.1 vātatviṣo maruto varṣanirṇijo yamā iva susadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ
analyzed: vāta tviṣaḥ marutaḥ varṣa nirṇijaḥ yamāḥ iva su sadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ

original: RV_05.057.04.2 piśaṅgāśvā aruṇāśvā arepasaḥ pratvakṣaso mahinā dyaur ivoravaḥ
analyzed: piśaṅga aśvāḥ aruṇa aśvāḥ arepasaḥ pratvakṣasaḥ mahinā dyauḥ iva uravaḥ

original: RV_05.057.05.1 purudrapsā añjimantaḥ sudānavas tveṣasaṃdṛśo anavabhrarādhasaḥ
analyzed: puru drapsāḥ añjimantaḥ sudānavaḥ tveṣa saṃdṛśaḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ

original: RV_05.057.05.2 sujātāso januṣā rukmavakṣaso divo arkā amṛtaṃ nāma bhejire
analyzed: su jātāsaḥ januṣā rukma vakṣasaḥ divaḥ arkāḥ amṛtam nāma bhejire

original: RV_05.057.06.1 ṛṣṭayo vo maruto aṃsayor adhi saha ojo bāhvor vo balaṃ hitam
analyzed: ṛṣṭayaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ aṃsayoḥ adhi sahaḥ ojaḥ bāhvoḥ vaḥ balam hitam

original: RV_05.057.06.2 nṛmṇā śīrṣasv āyudhā ratheṣu vo viśvā vaḥ śrīr adhi tanūṣu pipiśe
analyzed: nṛmṇā śīrṣasu āyudhā ratheṣu vaḥ viśvā vaḥ śrīḥ adhi tanūṣu pipiśe

original: RV_05.057.07.1 gomad aśvāvad rathavat suvīraṃ candravad rādho maruto dadā naḥ
analyzed: gomat aśvāvat rathavat su vīram candravat rādhaḥ marutaḥ dada naḥ

original: RV_05.057.07.2 praśastiṃ naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāso bhakṣīya vo 'vaso daivyasya
analyzed: praśastim naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāsaḥ bhakṣīya vaḥ vaso daivyasya

original: RV_05.057.08.1 haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: haye naraḥ marutaḥ mṛḍata naḥ tuvīmaghāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_05.057.08.2 satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ bṛhat girayaḥ bṛhat ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_05.058.01.1 tam u nūnaṃ taviṣīmantam eṣāṃ stuṣe gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām
analyzed: tam u nūnam taviṣīmantam eṣām stuṣe gaṇam mārutam navyasīnām

original: RV_05.058.01.2 ya āśvaśvā amavad vahanta uteśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ
analyzed: ye āśu aśvāḥ amavat vahante uta īśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ

original: RV_05.058.02.1 tveṣaṃ gaṇaṃ tavasaṃ khādihastaṃ dhunivratam māyinaṃ dātivāram
analyzed: tveṣam gaṇam tavasam khādi hastam dhuni vratam māyinam dāti vāram

original: RV_05.058.02.2 mayobhuvo ye amitā mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvirādhaso nṝn
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ ye amitāḥ mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvi rādhasaḥ nṝn

original: RV_05.058.03.1 ā vo yantūdavāhāso adya vṛṣṭiṃ ye viśve maruto junanti
analyzed: ā vaḥ yantu uda vāhāsaḥ adya vṛṣṭim ye viśve marutaḥ junanti

original: RV_05.058.03.2 ayaṃ yo agnir marutaḥ samiddha etaṃ juṣadhvaṃ kavayo yuvānaḥ
analyzed: ayam yaḥ agniḥ marutaḥ samiddhaḥ etam juṣadhvam kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ

original: RV_05.058.04.1 yūyaṃ rājānam iryaṃ janāya vibhvataṣṭaṃ janayathā yajatrāḥ
analyzed: yūyam rājānam iryam janāya vibhva taṣṭam janayatha yajatrāḥ

original: RV_05.058.04.2 yuṣmad eti muṣṭihā bāhujūto yuṣmad sadaśvo marutaḥ suvīraḥ
analyzed: yuṣmat eti muṣṭi hā bāhu jūtaḥ yuṣmat sat aśvaḥ marutaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_05.058.05.1 arā ived acaramā aheva pra-pra jāyante akavā mahobhiḥ
analyzed: arāḥ iva id a caramāḥ aha iva pra pra jāyante akavāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_05.058.05.2 pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ
analyzed: pṛśneḥ putrāḥ upamāsaḥ rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_05.058.06.1 yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhir aśvair vīḷupavibhir maruto rathebhiḥ
analyzed: yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhiḥ aśvaiḥ vīḍu pavibhiḥ marutaḥ rathebhiḥ

original: RV_05.058.06.2 kṣodanta āpo riṇate vanāny avosriyo vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ
analyzed: kṣodante āpaḥ riṇate vanāni ava usriyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ

original: RV_05.058.07.1 prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cid eṣām bharteva garbhaṃ svam ic chavo dhuḥ
analyzed: prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cit eṣām bhartā iva garbham svam id śavaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_05.058.07.2 vātān hy aśvān dhury ṛyuyujre varṣaṃ svedaṃ cakrire rudriyāsaḥ
analyzed: vātān hi aśvān dhuri ṛyuyujre varṣam svedam cakrire rudriyāsaḥ

original: RV_05.058.08.1 haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: haye naraḥ marutaḥ mṛḍata naḥ tuvīmaghāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_05.058.08.2 satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: satya śrutaḥ kavayaḥ yuvānaḥ bṛhat girayaḥ bṛhat ukṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_05.059.01.1 pra va spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane 'rcā dive pra pṛthivyā ṛtam bhare
analyzed: pra vaḥ spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane rcā dive pra pṛthivyai ṛtam bhare

original: RV_05.059.01.2 ukṣante aśvān taruṣanta ā rajo 'nu svam bhānuṃ śrathayante arṇavaiḥ
analyzed: ukṣante aśvān ā rajaḥ nu svam bhānum śrathayante arṇavaiḥ

original: RV_05.059.02.1 amād eṣām bhiyasā bhūmir ejati naur na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathir yatī
analyzed: amāt eṣām bhiyasā bhūmiḥ ejati nauḥ na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathiḥ yatī

original: RV_05.059.02.2 dūredṛśo ye citayanta emabhir antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ
analyzed: dūredṛśaḥ ye citayante emabhiḥ antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ

original: RV_05.059.03.1 gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamaṃ sūryo na cakṣū rajaso visarjane
analyzed: gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamam sūryaḥ na cakṣuḥ rajasaḥ visarjane

original: RV_05.059.03.2 atyā iva subhvaś cārava sthana maryā iva śriyase cetathā naraḥ
analyzed: atyāḥ iva su bhvaḥ cāravaḥ sthana maryāḥ iva śriyase cetathā naraḥ

original: RV_05.059.04.1 ko vo mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kas kāvyā marutaḥ ko ha pauṃsyā
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kaḥ kāvyā marutaḥ kaḥ ha pauṃsyā

original: RV_05.059.04.2 yūyaṃ ha bhūmiṃ kiraṇaṃ na rejatha pra yad bharadhve suvitāya dāvane
analyzed: yūyam ha bhūmim kiraṇam na rejatha pra yat bharadhve suvitāya dāvane

original: RV_05.059.05.1 aśvā ived aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrā iva prayudhaḥ prota yuyudhuḥ
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva id aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrāḥ iva prayudhaḥ pra uta yuyudhuḥ

original: RV_05.059.05.2 maryā iva suvṛdho vāvṛdhur naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti vṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: maryāḥ iva suvṛdhaḥ vāvṛdhuḥ naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_05.059.06.1 te ajyeṣṭhā akaniṣṭhāsa udbhido 'madhyamāso mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: te a jyeṣṭhāḥ a kaniṣṭhāsaḥ udbhidaḥ madhyamāsaḥ mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_05.059.06.2 sujātāso januṣā pṛśnimātaro divo maryā ā no achā jigātana
analyzed: su jātāsaḥ januṣā pṛśni mātaraḥ divaḥ maryāḥ ā naḥ achā jigātana

original: RV_05.059.07.1 vayo na ye śreṇīḥ paptur ojasāntān divo bṛhataḥ sānunas pari
analyzed: vayaḥ na ye śreṇīḥ paptuḥ ojasā antān divaḥ bṛhataḥ sānunaḥ pari

original: RV_05.059.07.2 aśvāsa eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūṃr acucyavuḥ
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūn acucyavuḥ

original: RV_05.059.08.1 mimātu dyaur aditir vītaye naḥ saṃ dānucitrā uṣaso yatantām
analyzed: mimātu dyauḥ aditiḥ vītaye naḥ sam dānu citrāḥ uṣasaḥ yatantām

original: RV_05.059.08.2 ācucyavur divyaṃ kośam eta ṛṣe rudrasya maruto gṛṇānāḥ
analyzed: ācucyavuḥ divyam kośam ete ṛṣe rudrasya marutaḥ gṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_05.060.01.1 īḷe agniṃ svavasaṃ namobhir iha prasatto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ
analyzed: īḍe agnim su avasam namobhiḥ iha prasattaḥ vi cayat kṛtam naḥ

original: RV_05.060.01.2 rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇin marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām
analyzed: rathaiḥ iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇit marutām stomam ṛdhyām

original: RV_05.060.02.1 ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrā maruto ratheṣu
analyzed: ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrāḥ marutaḥ ratheṣu

original: RV_05.060.02.2 vanā cid ugrā jihate ni vo bhiyā pṛthivī cid rejate parvataś cit
analyzed: vanā cit ugrā jihate ni vaḥ bhiyā pṛthivī cit rejate parvataḥ cit

original: RV_05.060.03.1 parvataś cin mahi vṛddho bibhāya divaś cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ
analyzed: parvataḥ cit mahi vṛddhaḥ bibhāya divaḥ cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ

original: RV_05.060.03.2 yat krīḷatha maruta ṛṣṭimanta āpa iva sadhryañco dhavadhve
analyzed: yat krīḍatha marutaḥ ṛṣṭimantaḥ āpaḥ iva sadhryañcaḥ dhavadhve

original: RV_05.060.04.1 varā ived raivatāso hiraṇyair abhi svadhābhis tanvaḥ pipiśre
analyzed: varāḥ iva id raivatāsaḥ hiraṇyaiḥ abhi svadhābhiḥ tanvaḥ pipiśre

original: RV_05.060.04.2 śriye śreyāṃsas tavaso ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu
analyzed: śriye śreyāṃsaḥ tavasaḥ ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu

original: RV_05.060.05.1 ajyeṣṭhāso akaniṣṭhāsa ete sam bhrātaro vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya
analyzed: a jyeṣṭhāsaḥ a kaniṣṭhāsaḥ ete sam bhrātaraḥ vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya

original: RV_05.060.05.2 yuvā pitā svapā rudra eṣāṃ sudughā pṛśniḥ sudinā marudbhyaḥ
analyzed: yuvā pitā su apāḥ rudraḥ eṣām su dughā pṛśniḥ su dinā marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_05.060.06.1 yad uttame maruto madhyame vā yad vāvame subhagāso divi ṣṭha
analyzed: yat uttame marutaḥ madhyame vā yat vā avame subhagāsaḥ divi ṣṭha

original: RV_05.060.06.2 ato no rudrā uta vā nv asyāgne vittād dhaviṣo yad yajāma
analyzed: atas naḥ rudrāḥ uta vā nu asya agne vittāt haviṣaḥ yat yajāma

original: RV_05.060.07.1 agniś ca yan maruto viśvavedaso divo vahadhva uttarād adhi ṣṇubhiḥ
analyzed: agniḥ ca yat marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ divaḥ vahadhve uttarāt adhi snubhiḥ

original: RV_05.060.07.2 te mandasānā dhunayo riśādaso vāmaṃ dhatta yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: te mandasānāḥ dhunayaḥ riśādasaḥ vāmam dhatta yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_05.060.08.1 agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhir ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasāno gaṇaśribhiḥ
analyzed: agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasānaḥ gaṇa śribhiḥ

original: RV_05.060.08.2 pāvakebhir viśvaminvebhir āyubhir vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā sajūḥ
analyzed: pāvakebhiḥ viśvaminvebhiḥ āyubhiḥ vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā sajūs

original: RV_05.061.01.1 ke ṣṭhā naraḥ śreṣṭhatamā ya eka-eka āyaya
analyzed: ke stha naraḥ śreṣṭhatamāḥ ye eka ekaḥ āyaya

original: RV_05.061.01.2 paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ
analyzed: paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ

original: RV_05.061.02.1 kva vo 'śvāḥ kvṛbhīśavaḥ kathaṃ śeka kathā yaya
analyzed: kva vaḥ śvās kva ṛbhīśavaḥ katham śeka kathā yaya

original: RV_05.061.02.2 pṛṣṭhe sado nasor yamaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe sadaḥ nasoḥ yamaḥ

original: RV_05.061.03.1 jaghane coda eṣāṃ vi sakthāni naro yamuḥ
analyzed: jaghane codaḥ eṣām vi sakthāni naraḥ yamuḥ

original: RV_05.061.03.2 putrakṛthe na janayaḥ
analyzed: putrakṛthe na janayaḥ

original: RV_05.061.04.1 parā vīrāsa etana maryāso bhadrajānayaḥ
analyzed: parā vīrāsaḥ etana maryāsaḥ bhadra jānayaḥ

original: RV_05.061.04.2 agnitapo yathāsatha
analyzed: agni tapaḥ yathā asatha

original: RV_05.061.05.1 sanat sāśvyam paśum uta gavyaṃ śatāvayam
analyzed: sanat sā aśvyam paśum uta gavyam śatāvayam

original: RV_05.061.05.2 śyāvāśvastutāya yā dor vīrāyopabarbṛhat
analyzed: śyāvāśva stutāya yā doḥ vīrāya upabarbṛhat

original: RV_05.061.06.1 uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃso bhavati vasyasī
analyzed: uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃsaḥ bhavati vasyasī

original: RV_05.061.06.2 adevatrād arādhasaḥ
analyzed: adevatrāt arādhasaḥ

original: RV_05.061.07.1 vi yā jānāti jasuriṃ vi tṛṣyantaṃ vi kāminam
analyzed: vi yā jānāti jasurim vi tṛṣyantam vi kāminam

original: RV_05.061.07.2 devatrā kṛṇute manaḥ
analyzed: devatrā kṛṇute manaḥ

original: RV_05.061.08.1 uta ghā nemo astutaḥ pumāṃ iti bruve paṇiḥ
analyzed: uta ghā nemaḥ a stutaḥ pumān iti bruve paṇiḥ

original: RV_05.061.08.2 sa vairadeya it samaḥ
analyzed: sa vaira deye id samaḥ

original: RV_05.061.09.1 uta me 'rapad yuvatir mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim
analyzed: uta me rapat yuvatiḥ mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim

original: RV_05.061.09.2 vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematur viprāya dīrghayaśase
analyzed: vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematuḥ viprāya dīrgha yaśase

original: RV_05.061.10.1 yo me dhenūnāṃ śataṃ vaidadaśvir yathā dadat
analyzed: yaḥ me dhenūnām śatam vaidadaśviḥ yathā dadat

original: RV_05.061.10.2 taranta iva maṃhanā
analyzed: tarantaḥ iva maṃhanā

original: RV_05.061.11.1 ya īṃ vahanta āśubhiḥ pibanto madiram madhu
analyzed: ye īm vahante āśubhiḥ pibantaḥ madiram madhu

original: RV_05.061.11.2 atra śravāṃsi dadhire
analyzed: atra śravāṃsi dadhire

original: RV_05.061.12.1 yeṣāṃ śriyādhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣv ā
analyzed: yeṣām śriyā adhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣu ā

original: RV_05.061.12.2 divi rukma ivopari
analyzed: divi rukmaḥ iva upari

original: RV_05.061.13.1 yuvā sa māruto gaṇas tveṣaratho anedyaḥ
analyzed: yuvā sa mārutaḥ gaṇaḥ tveṣa rathaḥ anedyaḥ

original: RV_05.061.13.2 śubhaṃyāvāpratiṣkutaḥ
analyzed: śubhaṃyāvā apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_05.061.14.1 ko veda nūnam eṣāṃ yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ veda nūnam eṣām yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_05.061.14.2 ṛtajātā arepasaḥ
analyzed: ṛta jātāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_05.061.15.1 yūyam martaṃ vipanyavaḥ praṇetāra itthā dhiyā
analyzed: yūyam martam vipanyavaḥ praṇetāraḥ itthā dhiyā

original: RV_05.061.15.2 śrotāro yāmahūtiṣu
analyzed: śrotāraḥ yāma hūtiṣu

original: RV_05.061.16.1 te no vasūni kāmyā puruścandrā riśādasaḥ
analyzed: te naḥ vasūni kāmyā puru ścandrā riśādasaḥ

original: RV_05.061.16.2 ā yajñiyāso vavṛttana
analyzed: ā yajñiyāsaḥ vavṛttana

original: RV_05.061.17.1 etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha
analyzed: etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha

original: RV_05.061.17.2 giro devi rathīr iva
analyzed: giraḥ devi rathīḥ iva

original: RV_05.061.18.1 uta me vocatād iti sutasome rathavītau
analyzed: uta me vocatāt iti suta some rathavītau

original: RV_05.061.18.2 na kāmo apa veti me
analyzed: na kāmaḥ apa veti me

original: RV_05.061.19.1 eṣa kṣeti rathavītir maghavā gomatīr anu
analyzed: eṣa kṣeti rathavītiḥ maghavā gomatīḥ anu

original: RV_05.061.19.2 parvateṣv apaśritaḥ
analyzed: parvateṣu apaśritaḥ

original: RV_05.062.01.1 ṛtena ṛtam apihitaṃ dhruvaṃ vāṃ sūryasya yatra vimucanty aśvān
analyzed: ṛtena ṛtam apihitam dhruvam vām sūryasya yatra vimucanti aśvān

original: RV_05.062.01.2 daśa śatā saha tasthus tad ekaṃ devānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vapuṣām apaśyam
analyzed: daśa śatā saha tasthuḥ tat ekam devānām śreṣṭham vapuṣām apaśyam

original: RV_05.062.02.1 tat su vām mitrāvaruṇā mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīr ahabhir duduhre
analyzed: tat su vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīḥ ahabhiḥ duduhre

original: RV_05.062.02.2 viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenā anu vām ekaḥ pavir ā vavarta
