analyzed: viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenāḥ anu vām ekaḥ paviḥ ā vavarta

original: RV_05.062.03.1 adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitrarājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ
analyzed: adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitra rājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ

original: RV_05.062.03.2 vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvataṃ gā ava vṛṣṭiṃ sṛjataṃ jīradānū
analyzed: vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvatam gāḥ ava vṛṣṭim sṛjatam jīra dānū

original: RV_05.062.04.1 ā vām aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahantu yataraśmaya upa yantv arvāk
analyzed: ā vām aśvāsaḥ su yujaḥ vahantu yata raśmayaḥ upa yantu arvāk

original: RV_05.062.04.2 ghṛtasya nirṇig anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti
analyzed: ghṛtasya nirṇij anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti

original: RV_05.062.05.1 anu śrutām amatiṃ vardhad urvīm barhir iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā
analyzed: anu śrutām amatim vardhat urvīm barhiḥ iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_05.062.05.2 namasvantā dhṛtadakṣādhi garte mitrāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ
analyzed: namasvantā dhṛtadakṣā adhi garte mitrā āsāthe varuṇā iḷāsu antar

original: RV_05.062.06.1 akravihastā sukṛte paraspā yaṃ trāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ
analyzed: a kravi hastā su kṛte paraspā yam trāsāthe varuṇā iḷāsu antar

original: RV_05.062.06.2 rājānā kṣatram ahṛṇīyamānā sahasrasthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau
analyzed: rājānā kṣatram a hṛṇīyamānā sahasra sthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau

original: RV_05.062.07.1 hiraṇyanirṇig ayo asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divy aśvājanīva
analyzed: hiraṇya nirṇij ayaḥ asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divi aśvājanī iva

original: RV_05.062.07.2 bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvo adhigartyasya
analyzed: bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvaḥ adhigartyasya

original: RV_05.062.08.1 hiraṇyarūpam uṣaso vyuṣṭāv ayasthūṇam uditā sūryasya
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpam uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau aya sthūṇam uditā sūryasya

original: RV_05.062.08.2 ā rohatho varuṇa mitra gartam ataś cakṣāthe aditiṃ ditiṃ ca
analyzed: ā rohathaḥ varuṇa mitra gartam atas cakṣāthe aditim ditim ca

original: RV_05.062.09.1 yad baṃhiṣṭhaṃ nātividhe sudānū achidraṃ śarma bhuvanasya gopā
analyzed: yat baṃhiṣṭham na atividhe sudānū achidram śarma bhuvanasya gopā

original: RV_05.062.09.2 tena no mitrāvaruṇāv aviṣṭaṃ siṣāsanto jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma
analyzed: tena naḥ mitrāvaruṇau aviṣṭam siṣāsantaḥ jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma

original: RV_05.063.01.1 ṛtasya gopāv adhi tiṣṭhatho rathaṃ satyadharmāṇā parame vyomani
analyzed: ṛtasya gopau adhi tiṣṭhathaḥ ratham satya dharmāṇā parame vyomani

original: RV_05.063.01.2 yam atra mitrāvaruṇāvatho yuvaṃ tasmai vṛṣṭir madhumat pinvate divaḥ
analyzed: yam atra mitrāvaruṇau avathaḥ yuvam tasmai vṛṣṭiḥ madhumat pinvate divaḥ

original: RV_05.063.02.1 samrājāv asya bhuvanasya rājatho mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svardṛśā
analyzed: samrājau asya bhuvanasya rājathaḥ mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svar dṛśā

original: RV_05.063.02.2 vṛṣṭiṃ vāṃ rādho amṛtatvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṭim vām rādhaḥ amṛta tvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ

original: RV_05.063.03.1 samrājā ugrā vṛṣabhā divas patī pṛthivyā mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī
analyzed: samrājau ugrā vṛṣabhā divaḥ patī pṛthivyāḥ mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī

original: RV_05.063.03.2 citrebhir abhrair upa tiṣṭhatho ravaṃ dyāṃ varṣayatho asurasya māyayā
analyzed: citrebhiḥ abhraiḥ upa tiṣṭhathaḥ ravam dyām varṣayathaḥ asurasya māyayā

original: RV_05.063.04.1 māyā vām mitrāvaruṇā divi śritā sūryo jyotiś carati citram āyudham
analyzed: māyā vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ divi śritā sūryaḥ jyotiḥ carati citram āyudham

original: RV_05.063.04.2 tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhatho divi parjanya drapsā madhumanta īrate
analyzed: tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhathaḥ divi parjanya drapsāḥ madhumantaḥ īrate

original: RV_05.063.05.1 rathaṃ yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukhaṃ śūro na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: ratham yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukham śūraḥ na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_05.063.05.2 rajāṃsi citrā vi caranti tanyavo divaḥ samrājā payasā na ukṣatam
analyzed: rajāṃsi citrāḥ vi caranti tanyavaḥ divaḥ samrājā payasā naḥ ukṣatam

original: RV_05.063.06.1 vācaṃ su mitrāvaruṇāv irāvatīm parjanyaś citrāṃ vadati tviṣīmatīm
analyzed: vācam su mitrāvaruṇau irāvatīm parjanyaḥ citrām vadati tviṣīmatīm

original: RV_05.063.06.2 abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyāṃ varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam
analyzed: abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyām varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam

original: RV_05.063.07.1 dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā
analyzed: dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā

original: RV_05.063.07.2 ṛtena viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhattho divi citryaṃ ratham
analyzed: ṛtena viśvam bhuvanam vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhatthaḥ divi citryam ratham

original: RV_05.064.01.1 varuṇaṃ vo riśādasam ṛcā mitraṃ havāmahe
analyzed: varuṇam vaḥ riśādasam ṛcā mitram havāmahe

original: RV_05.064.01.2 pari vrajeva bāhvor jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram
analyzed: pari vrajā iva bāhvoḥ jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram

original: RV_05.064.02.1 tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmā arcate
analyzed: tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmai arcate

original: RV_05.064.02.2 śevaṃ hi jāryaṃ vāṃ viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve
analyzed: śevam hi jāryam vām viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve

original: RV_05.064.03.1 yan nūnam aśyāṃ gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā
analyzed: yat nūnam aśyām gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā

original: RV_05.064.03.2 asya priyasya śarmaṇy ahiṃsānasya saścire
analyzed: asya priyasya śarmaṇi a hiṃsānasya saścire

original: RV_05.064.04.1 yuvābhyām mitrāvaruṇopamaṃ dheyām ṛcā
analyzed: yuvābhyām mitrāvaruṇā upamam dheyām ṛcā

original: RV_05.064.04.2 yad dha kṣaye maghonāṃ stotṇāṃ ca spūrdhase
analyzed: yat ha kṣaye maghonām stotṇām ca spūrdhase

original: RV_05.064.05.1 ā no mitra sudītibhir varuṇaś ca sadhastha ā
analyzed: ā naḥ mitra su dītibhiḥ varuṇaḥ ca sadhasthe ā

original: RV_05.064.05.2 sve kṣaye maghonāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca vṛdhase
analyzed: sve kṣaye maghonām sakhīnām ca vṛdhase

original: RV_05.064.06.1 yuvaṃ no yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhac ca bibhṛthaḥ
analyzed: yuvam naḥ yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhat ca bibhṛthaḥ

original: RV_05.064.06.2 uru ṇo vājasātaye kṛtaṃ rāye svastaye
analyzed: uru naḥ vājasātaye kṛtam rāye svastaye

original: RV_05.064.07.1 uchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi
analyzed: uchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi

original: RV_05.064.07.2 sutaṃ somaṃ na hastibhir ā paḍbhir dhāvataṃ narā bibhratāv arcanānasam
analyzed: sutam somam na hastibhiḥ ā paḍbhiḥ dhāvatam narā bibhratau arcanānasam

original: RV_05.065.00.11 yaś ciketa sa sukratur devatrā sa bravītu naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ciketa sa su kratuḥ devatrā sa bravītu naḥ

original: RV_05.065.00.12 varuṇo yasya darśato mitro vā vanate giraḥ
analyzed: varuṇaḥ yasya darśataḥ mitraḥ vā vanate giraḥ

original: RV_05.065.00.21 tā hi śreṣṭhavarcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā
analyzed: tā hi śreṣṭha varcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā

original: RV_05.065.00.22 tā satpatī ṛtāvṛdha ṛtāvānā jane-jane
analyzed: tā sat patī ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtāvānā janejane

original: RV_05.065.00.31 tā vām iyāno 'vase pūrvā upa bruve sacā
analyzed: tā vām iyānaḥ vase pūrvau upa bruve sacā

original: RV_05.065.00.32 svaśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājāṃ abhi pra dāvane
analyzed: su aśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājām abhi pra dāvane

original: RV_05.065.00.41 mitro aṃhoś cid ād uru kṣayāya gātuṃ vanate
analyzed: mitraḥ aṃhoḥ cit āt uru kṣayāya gātum vanate

original: RV_05.065.00.42 mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatir asti vidhataḥ
analyzed: mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatiḥ asti vidhataḥ

original: RV_05.065.00.51 vayam mitrasyāvasi syāma saprathastame
analyzed: vayam mitrasya avasi syāma saprathastame

original: RV_05.065.00.52 anehasas tvotayaḥ satrā varuṇaśeṣasaḥ
analyzed: anehasaḥ tvotayaḥ satrā varuṇa śeṣasaḥ

original: RV_05.065.00.61 yuvam mitremaṃ janaṃ yatathaḥ saṃ ca nayathaḥ
analyzed: yuvam mitrā imam janam yatathaḥ sam ca nayathaḥ

original: RV_05.065.00.62 mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mo asmākam ṛṣīṇāṃ gopīthe na uruṣyatam
analyzed: mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mā u asmākam ṛṣīṇām gopīthe naḥ uruṣyatam

original: RV_05.066.01.1 ā cikitāna sukratū devau marta riśādasā
analyzed: ā cikitāna su kratū devau marta riśādasā

original: RV_05.066.01.2 varuṇāya ṛtapeśase dadhīta prayase mahe
analyzed: varuṇāya ṛta peśase dadhīta prayase mahe

original: RV_05.066.02.1 tā hi kṣatram avihrutaṃ samyag asuryam āśāte
analyzed: tā hi kṣatram a vihrutam samyak asuryam āśāte

original: RV_05.066.02.2 adha vrateva mānuṣaṃ svar ṇa dhāyi darśatam
analyzed: adha vratā iva mānuṣam svar na dhāyi darśatam

original: RV_05.066.03.1 tā vām eṣe rathānām urvīṃ gavyūtim eṣām
analyzed: tā vām rathānām urvīm gavyūtim eṣām

original: RV_05.066.03.2 rātahavyasya suṣṭutiṃ dadhṛk stomair manāmahe
analyzed: rāta havyasya suṣṭutim dadhṛṣ stomaiḥ manāmahe

original: RV_05.066.04.1 adhā hi kāvyā yuvaṃ dakṣasya pūrbhir adbhutā
analyzed: adhā hi kāvyā yuvam dakṣasya pūrbhiḥ adbhutā

original: RV_05.066.04.2 ni ketunā janānāṃ cikethe pūtadakṣasā
analyzed: ni ketunā janānām cikethe pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_05.066.05.1 tad ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhac chravaeṣa ṛṣīṇām
analyzed: tat ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhat śravaḥ eṣaḥ ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_05.066.05.2 jrayasānāv aram pṛthv ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ
analyzed: jrayasānau aram pṛthu ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_05.066.06.1 ā yad vām īyacakṣasā mitra vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ
analyzed: ā yat vām mitra vayam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_05.066.06.2 vyaciṣṭhe bahupāyye yatemahi svarājye
analyzed: vyaciṣṭhe bahu pāyye yatemahi sva rājye

original: RV_05.067.01.1 baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat
analyzed: baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat

original: RV_05.067.01.2 varuṇa mitrāryaman varṣiṣṭhaṃ kṣatram āśāthe
analyzed: varuṇa mitra aryaman varṣiṣṭham kṣatram āśāthe

original: RV_05.067.02.1 ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ
analyzed: ā yat yonim hiraṇyayam varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ

original: RV_05.067.02.2 dhartārā carṣaṇīnāṃ yantaṃ sumnaṃ riśādasā
analyzed: dhartārā carṣaṇīnām yantam sumnam riśādasā

original: RV_05.067.03.1 viśve hi viśvavedaso varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: viśve hi viśva vedasaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_05.067.03.2 vratā padeva saścire pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ
analyzed: vratā padā iva saścire pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_05.067.04.1 te hi satyā ṛtaspṛśa ṛtāvāno jane-jane
analyzed: te hi satyāḥ ṛta spṛśaḥ ṛtāvānaḥ janejane

original: RV_05.067.04.2 sunīthāsaḥ sudānavo 'ṃhoś cid urucakrayaḥ
analyzed: su nīthāsaḥ sudānavaḥ ṃhoḥ cit uru cakrayaḥ

original: RV_05.067.05.1 ko nu vām mitrāstuto varuṇo vā tanūnām
analyzed: kaḥ nu vām mitrāstutaḥ varuṇaḥ vā tanūnām

original: RV_05.067.05.2 tat su vām eṣate matir atribhya eṣate matiḥ
analyzed: tat su vām eṣate matiḥ atribhyaḥ eṣate matiḥ

original: RV_05.068.01.1 pra vo mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā
analyzed: pra vaḥ mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā

original: RV_05.068.01.2 mahikṣatrāv ṛtam bṛhat
analyzed: mahi kṣatrau ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_05.068.02.1 samrājā yā ghṛtayonī mitraś cobhā varuṇaś ca
analyzed: samrājā yā ghṛta yonī mitraḥ ca ubhā varuṇaḥ ca

original: RV_05.068.02.2 devā deveṣu praśastā
analyzed: devā deveṣu praśastā

original: RV_05.068.03.1 tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya maho rāyo divyasya
analyzed: tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya mahaḥ rāyaḥ divyasya

original: RV_05.068.03.2 mahi vāṃ kṣatraṃ deveṣu
analyzed: mahi vām kṣatram deveṣu

original: RV_05.068.04.1 ṛtam ṛtena sapanteṣiraṃ dakṣam āśāte
analyzed: ṛtam ṛtena sapantā iṣiram dakṣam āśāte

original: RV_05.068.04.2 adruhā devau vardhete
analyzed: adruhā devau vardhete

original: RV_05.068.05.1 vṛṣṭidyāvā rītyṛpeṣas patī dānumatyāḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṭi dyāvā rīti ṛpā iṣaḥ patī dānumatyāḥ

original: RV_05.068.05.2 bṛhantaṃ gartam āśāte
analyzed: bṛhantam gartam āśāte

original: RV_05.069.01.1 trī rocanā varuṇa trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayatho rajāṃsi
analyzed: trī rocanā varuṇa trīn uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayathaḥ rajāṃsi

original: RV_05.069.01.2 vāvṛdhānāv amatiṃ kṣatriyasyānu vrataṃ rakṣamāṇāv ajuryam
analyzed: vāvṛdhānau amatim kṣatriyasya anu vratam rakṣamāṇau ajuryam

original: RV_05.069.02.1 irāvatīr varuṇa dhenavo vām madhumad vāṃ sindhavo mitra duhre
analyzed: irāvatīḥ varuṇa dhenavaḥ vām madhumat vām sindhavaḥ mitra duhre

original: RV_05.069.02.2 trayas tasthur vṛṣabhāsas tisṛṇāṃ dhiṣaṇānāṃ retodhā vi dyumantaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ tasthuḥ vṛṣabhāsaḥ tisṛṇām dhiṣaṇānām retaḥ dhāḥ vi dyumantaḥ

original: RV_05.069.03.1 prātar devīm aditiṃ johavīmi madhyaṃdina uditā sūryasya
analyzed: prātar devīm aditim johavīmi madhyaṃdine uditā sūryasya

original: RV_05.069.03.2 rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatāteḷe tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ
analyzed: rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatātā īḍe tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_05.069.04.1 yā dhartārā rajaso rocanasyotādityā divyā pārthivasya
analyzed: yā dhartārā rajasaḥ rocanasya uta ādityā divyā pārthivasya

original: RV_05.069.04.2 na vāṃ devā amṛtā ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi
analyzed: na vām devāḥ amṛtāḥ ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi

original: RV_05.070.01.1 purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa
analyzed: purūruṇā cit hi asti avaḥ nūnam vām varuṇa

original: RV_05.070.01.2 mitra vaṃsi vāṃ sumatim
analyzed: mitra vaṃsi vām sumatim

original: RV_05.070.02.1 tā vāṃ samyag adruhvāṇeṣam aśyāma dhāyase
analyzed: tā vām samyak adruhvāṇā iṣam aśyāma dhāyase

original: RV_05.070.02.2 vayaṃ te rudrā syāma
analyzed: vayam te rudrā syāma

original: RV_05.070.03.1 pātaṃ no rudrā pāyubhir uta trāyethāṃ sutrātrā
analyzed: pātam naḥ rudrā pāyubhiḥ uta trāyethām su trātrā

original: RV_05.070.03.2 turyāma dasyūn tanūbhiḥ
analyzed: turyāma dasyūn tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_05.070.04.1 mā kasyādbhutakratū yakṣam bhujemā tanūbhiḥ
analyzed: mā kasya adbhuta kratū yakṣam bhujema tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_05.070.04.2 mā śeṣasā mā tanasā
analyzed: mā śeṣasā mā tanasā

original: RV_05.071.01.1 ā no gantaṃ riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā

original: RV_05.071.01.2 upemaṃ cārum adhvaram
analyzed: upa imam cārum adhvaram

original: RV_05.071.02.1 viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ
analyzed: viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ

original: RV_05.071.02.2 īśānā pipyataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: īśānā pipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_05.071.03.1 upa naḥ sutam ā gataṃ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ
analyzed: upa naḥ sutam ā gatam varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ

original: RV_05.071.03.2 asya somasya pītaye
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_05.072.01.1 ā mitre varuṇe vayaṃ gīrbhir juhumo atrivat
analyzed: ā mitre varuṇe vayam gīrbhiḥ juhumaḥ atri vat

original: RV_05.072.01.2 ni barhiṣi sadataṃ somapītaye
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatam soma pītaye

original: RV_05.072.02.1 vratena stho dhruvakṣemā dharmaṇā yātayajjanā
analyzed: vratena sthaḥ dhruva kṣemā dharmaṇā yātayat janā

original: RV_05.072.02.2 ni barhiṣi sadataṃ somapītaye
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatam soma pītaye

original: RV_05.072.03.1 mitraś ca no varuṇaś ca juṣetāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye
analyzed: mitraḥ ca naḥ varuṇaḥ ca juṣetām yajñam iṣṭaye

original: RV_05.072.03.2 ni barhiṣi sadatāṃ somapītaye
analyzed: ni barhiṣi sadatām soma pītaye

original: RV_05.073.01.1 yad adya sthaḥ parāvati yad arvāvaty aśvinā
analyzed: yat adya sthaḥ parāvati yat arvāvati aśvinā

original: RV_05.073.01.2 yad vā purū purubhujā yad antarikṣa ā gatam
analyzed: yat vā purū puru bhujā yat antarikṣe ā gatam

original: RV_05.073.02.1 iha tyā purubhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā
analyzed: iha tyā puru bhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā

original: RV_05.073.02.2 varasyā yāmy adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje
analyzed: varasyā yāmi adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje

original: RV_05.073.03.1 īrmānyad vapuṣe vapuś cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ
analyzed: īrmānyat vapuṣe vapuḥ cakram rathasya yemathuḥ

original: RV_05.073.03.2 pary anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ
analyzed: pari anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ

original: RV_05.073.04.1 tad ū ṣu vām enā kṛtaṃ viśvā yad vām anu ṣṭave
analyzed: tat u su vām enā kṛtam viśvā yat vām anu stave

original: RV_05.073.04.2 nānā jātāv arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ
analyzed: nānā jātau arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ

original: RV_05.073.05.1 ā yad vāṃ sūryā rathaṃ tiṣṭhad raghuṣyadaṃ sadā
analyzed: ā yat vām sūryā ratham tiṣṭhat raghuṣyadam sadā

original: RV_05.073.05.2 pari vām aruṣā vayo ghṛṇā varanta ātapaḥ
analyzed: pari vām aruṣāḥ vayaḥ ghṛṇāḥ varante ātapaḥ

original: RV_05.073.06.1 yuvor atriś ciketati narā sumnena cetasā
analyzed: yuvoḥ atriḥ ciketati narā sumnena cetasā

original: RV_05.073.06.2 gharmaṃ yad vām arepasaṃ nāsatyāsnā bhuraṇyati
analyzed: gharmam yat vām arepasam nāsatya asnā bhuraṇyati

original: RV_05.073.07.1 ugro vāṃ kakuho yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ
analyzed: ugraḥ vām kakuhaḥ yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ

original: RV_05.073.07.2 yad vāṃ daṃsobhir aśvinātrir narāvavartati
analyzed: yat vām daṃsobhiḥ aśvinā atriḥ narā avavartati

original: RV_05.073.08.1 madhva ū ṣu madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī
analyzed: madhvaḥ u su madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī

original: RV_05.073.08.2 yat samudrāti parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣo bharanta vām
analyzed: yat samudra ati parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣaḥ bharanta vām

original: RV_05.073.09.1 satyam id vā u aśvinā yuvām āhur mayobhuvā
analyzed: satyam id vai u aśvinā yuvām āhuḥ mayobhuvā

original: RV_05.073.09.2 tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāmann ā mṛḷayattamā
analyzed: tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāman ā mṛḍayattamā

original: RV_05.073.10.1 imā brahmāṇi vardhanāśvibhyāṃ santu śaṃtamā
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi vardhana aśvibhyām santu śaṃtamā

original: RV_05.073.10.2 yā takṣāma rathāṃ ivāvocāma bṛhan namaḥ
analyzed: yā takṣāma rathān iva avocāma bṛhat namaḥ

original: RV_05.074.01.1 kūṣṭho devāv aśvinādyā divo manāvasū
analyzed: devau aśvinā adyā divaḥ manāvasū

original: RV_05.074.01.2 tac chravatho vṛṣaṇvasū atrir vām ā vivāsati
analyzed: tat śravathaḥ vṛṣaṇvasū atriḥ vām ā vivāsati

original: RV_05.074.02.1 kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā
analyzed: kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā

original: RV_05.074.02.2 kasminn ā yatatho jane ko vāṃ nadīnāṃ sacā
analyzed: kasmin ā yatathaḥ jane kaḥ vām nadīnām sacā

original: RV_05.074.03.1 kaṃ yāthaḥ kaṃ ha gachathaḥ kam achā yuñjāthe ratham
analyzed: kam yāthaḥ kam ha gacchathaḥ kam achā yuñjāthe ratham

original: RV_05.074.03.2 kasya brahmāṇi raṇyatho vayaṃ vām uśmasīṣṭaye
analyzed: kasya brahmāṇi raṇyathaḥ vayam vām uśmasi iṣṭaye

original: RV_05.074.04.1 pauraṃ cid dhy udaprutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ
analyzed: pauram cit hi uda prutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_05.074.04.2 yad īṃ gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhas pade
analyzed: yat īm gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhaḥ pade

original: RV_05.074.05.1 pra cyavānāj jujuruṣo vavrim atkaṃ na muñcathaḥ
analyzed: pra cyavānāt jujuruṣaḥ vavrim atkam na muñcathaḥ

original: RV_05.074.05.2 yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ
analyzed: yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ

original: RV_05.074.06.1 asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vāṃ saṃdṛśi śriye
analyzed: asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vām saṃdṛśi śriye

original: RV_05.074.06.2 nū śrutam ma ā gatam avobhir vājinīvasū
analyzed: nu śrutam me ā gatam avobhiḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_05.074.07.1 ko vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām
analyzed: kaḥ vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām

original: RV_05.074.07.2 ko vipro vipravāhasā ko yajñair vājinīvasū
analyzed: kaḥ vipraḥ vipra vāhasā kaḥ yajñaiḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_05.074.08.1 ā vāṃ ratho rathānāṃ yeṣṭho yātv aśvinā
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ rathānām yeṣṭhaḥ yātu aśvinā

original: RV_05.074.08.2 purū cid asmayus tira āṅgūṣo martyeṣv ā
analyzed: purū cit asmayuḥ tiras āṅgūṣaḥ martyeṣu ā

original: RV_05.074.09.1 śam ū ṣu vām madhūyuvāsmākam astu carkṛtiḥ
analyzed: śam u su vām madhūyuvā asmākam astu carkṛtiḥ

original: RV_05.074.09.2 arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyeneva dīyatam
analyzed: arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyenā iva dīyatam

original: RV_05.074.10.1 aśvinā yad dha karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam
analyzed: aśvinā yat ha karhi cit śuśrūyātam imam havam

original: RV_05.074.10.2 vasvīr ū ṣu vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ
analyzed: vasvīḥ u su vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ

original: RV_05.075.00.11 prati priyatamaṃ rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vasuvāhanam
analyzed: prati priyatamam ratham vṛṣaṇam vasu vāhanam

original: RV_05.075.00.12 stotā vām aśvināv ṛṣi stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: stotā vām aśvinau ṛṣiḥ stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.21 atyāyātam aśvinā tiro viśvā ahaṃ sanā
analyzed: atyāyātam aśvinā tiras viśvāḥ aham

original: RV_05.075.00.22 dasrā hiraṇyavartanī suṣumnā sindhuvāhasā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī suṣumnā sindhu vāhasā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.31 ā no ratnāni bibhratāv aśvinā gachataṃ yuvam
analyzed: ā naḥ ratnāni bibhratau aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_05.075.00.32 rudrā hiraṇyavartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: rudrā hiraṇya vartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.41 suṣṭubho vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcy āhitā
analyzed: suṣṭubhaḥ vām vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcī āhitā

original: RV_05.075.00.42 uta vāṃ kakuho mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: uta vām kakuhaḥ mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.51 bodhinmanasā rathyeṣirā havanaśrutā
analyzed: bodhinmanasā rathyā iṣirā havana śrutā

original: RV_05.075.00.52 vibhiś cyavānam aśvinā ni yātho advayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: vibhiḥ cyavānam aśvinā ni yāthaḥ a dvayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.61 ā vāṃ narā manoyujo 'śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ
analyzed: ā vām narā manaḥ yujaḥ śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ

original: RV_05.075.00.62 vayo vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhir aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: vayaḥ vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhiḥ aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.71 aśvināv eha gachataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam
analyzed: aśvinau ā iha gacchatam nāsatyā mā vi venatam

original: RV_05.075.00.72 tiraś cid aryayā pari vartir yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: tiras cit aryayā pari vartiḥ yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.81 asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāraṃ śubhas patī
analyzed: asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāram śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_05.075.00.82 avasyum aśvinā yuvaṃ gṛṇantam upa bhūṣatho mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: avasyum aśvinā yuvam gṛṇantam upa bhūṣathaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.075.00.91 abhūd uṣā ruśatpaśur āgnir adhāyy ṛtviyaḥ
analyzed: abhūt uṣāḥ ruśat paśuḥ ā agniḥ adhāyi ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_05.075.00.92 ayoji vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ratho dasrāv amartyo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam
analyzed: ayoji vām vṛṣaṇvasū rathaḥ dasrau amartyaḥ mādhvī mama śrutam havam

original: RV_05.076.01.1 ā bhāty agnir uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇāṃ devayā vāco asthuḥ
analyzed: ā bhāti agniḥ uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇām deva yāḥ vācaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_05.076.01.2 arvāñcā nūnaṃ rathyeha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam acha
analyzed: arvāñcā nūnam rathyā iha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam acha

original: RV_05.076.02.1 na saṃskṛtam pra mimīto gamiṣṭhānti nūnam aśvinopastuteha
analyzed: na saṃskṛtam pra mimītaḥ gamiṣṭhā anti nūnam aśvinā upastutā iha

original: RV_05.076.02.2 divābhipitve 'vasāgamiṣṭhā praty avartiṃ dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā
analyzed: divā abhipitve vasa āgamiṣṭhā prati avartim dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā

original: RV_05.076.03.1 utā yātaṃ saṃgave prātar ahno madhyaṃdina uditā sūryasya
analyzed: uta ā yātam saṃgave prātar ahnaḥ madhyaṃdine uditā sūryasya

original: RV_05.076.03.2 divā naktam avasā śaṃtamena nedānīm pītir aśvinā tatāna
analyzed: divā naktam avasā śaṃtamena nā idānīm pītiḥ aśvinā tatāna

original: RV_05.076.04.1 idaṃ hi vām pradivi sthānam oka ime gṛhā aśvinedaṃ duroṇam
analyzed: idam hi vām pradivi sthānam okaḥ ime gṛhāḥ aśvinā idam duroṇam

original: RV_05.076.04.2 ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ādbhyo yātam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāt ā adbhyaḥ yātam iṣam ūrjam vahantā

original: RV_05.076.05.1 sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_05.076.05.2 ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_05.077.01.1 prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrād araruṣaḥ pibātaḥ
analyzed: prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrāt a raruṣaḥ pibātaḥ

original: RV_05.077.01.2 prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ
analyzed: prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ

original: RV_05.077.02.1 prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti devayā ajuṣṭam
analyzed: prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti deva yāḥ a juṣṭam

original: RV_05.077.02.2 utānyo asmad yajate vi cāvaḥ pūrvaḥ-pūrvo yajamāno vanīyān
analyzed: uta anyaḥ asmat yajate vi ca avaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ yajamānaḥ vanīyān

original: RV_05.077.03.1 hiraṇyatvaṅ madhuvarṇo ghṛtasnuḥ pṛkṣo vahann ā ratho vartate vām
analyzed: hiraṇya tvac madhu varṇaḥ ghṛta snuḥ pṛkṣaḥ vahan ā rathaḥ vartate vām

original: RV_05.077.03.2 manojavā aśvinā vātaraṃhā yenātiyātho duritāni viśvā
analyzed: manaḥ javāḥ aśvinā vāta raṃhāḥ yena atiyāthaḥ duritāni viśvā

original: RV_05.077.04.1 yo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nāsatyābhyāṃ viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvo rarate vibhāge
analyzed: yaḥ bhūyiṣṭham nāsatyābhyām viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvaḥ rarate vibhāge

original: RV_05.077.04.2 sa tokam asya pīparac chamībhir anūrdhvabhāsaḥ sadam it tuturyāt
analyzed: sa tokam asya pīparat śamībhiḥ an ūrdhva bhāsaḥ sadam id tuturyāt

original: RV_05.077.05.1 sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema
analyzed: sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā su praṇītī gamema

original: RV_05.077.05.2 ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni

original: RV_05.078.01.1 aśvināv eha gachataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam
analyzed: aśvinau ā iha gacchatam nāsatyā mā vi venatam

original: RV_05.078.01.2 haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_05.078.02.1 aśvinā hariṇāv iva gaurāv ivānu yavasam
analyzed: aśvinā hariṇau iva gaurau iva anu yavasam

original: RV_05.078.02.2 haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_05.078.03.1 aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye
analyzed: aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethām yajñam iṣṭaye

original: RV_05.078.03.2 haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa
analyzed: haṃsau iva patatam ā sutām upa

original: RV_05.078.04.1 atrir yad vām avarohann ṛbīsam ajohavīn nādhamāneva yoṣā
analyzed: atriḥ yat vām avarohan ṛbīsam ajohavīt nādhamānā iva yoṣā

original: RV_05.078.04.2 śyenasya cij javasā nūtanenāgachatam aśvinā śaṃtamena
analyzed: śyenasya cit javasā nūtanena agacchatam aśvinā śaṃtamena

original: RV_05.078.05.1 vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyā iva
analyzed: vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyāḥ iva

original: RV_05.078.05.2 śrutam me aśvinā havaṃ saptavadhriṃ ca muñcatam
analyzed: śrutam me aśvinā havam saptavadhrim ca muñcatam

original: RV_05.078.06.1 bhītāya nādhamānāya ṛṣaye saptavadhraye
analyzed: bhītāya nādhamānāya ṛṣaye saptavadhraye

original: RV_05.078.06.2 māyābhir aśvinā yuvaṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃ ca vi cācathaḥ
analyzed: māyābhiḥ aśvinā yuvam vṛkṣam sam ca vi ca acathaḥ

original: RV_05.078.07.1 yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīṃ samiṅgayati sarvataḥ
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīm samiṅgayati sarvatas

original: RV_05.078.07.2 evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ
analyzed: eva te garbhaḥ ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ

original: RV_05.078.08.1 yathā vāto yathā vanaṃ yathā samudra ejati
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ yathā vanam yathā samudraḥ ejati

original: RV_05.078.08.2 evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sahāvehi jarāyuṇā
analyzed: eva tvam daśamāsya saha avehi jarāyuṇā

original: RV_05.078.09.1 daśa māsāñ chaśayānaḥ kumāro adhi mātari
analyzed: daśa māsām śaśayānaḥ kumāraḥ adhi mātari

original: RV_05.078.09.2 niraitu jīvo akṣato jīvo jīvantyā adhi
analyzed: niraitu jīvaḥ a kṣataḥ jīvaḥ jīvantyāḥ adhi

original: RV_05.079.01.1 mahe no adya bodhayoṣo rāye divitmatī
analyzed: mahe naḥ adya bodhaya uṣaḥ rāye divitmatī

original: RV_05.079.01.2 yathā cin no abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: yathā cit naḥ abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.02.1 yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vy aucho duhitar divaḥ
analyzed: yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vi auchaḥ duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_05.079.02.2 sā vy ucha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: sā vi ucha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.03.1 sā no adyābharadvasur vy uchā duhitar divaḥ
analyzed: sā naḥ adyā ābharat vasuḥ vi ucha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_05.079.03.2 yo vy auchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: yaḥ vi auchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.04.1 abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomair gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ
analyzed: abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomaiḥ gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_05.079.04.2 maghair maghoni suśriyo dāmanvantaḥ surātayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: maghaiḥ maghoni su śriyaḥ dāmanvantaḥ su rātayaḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.05.1 yac cid dhi te gaṇā ime chadayanti maghattaye
analyzed: yat cit hi te gaṇāḥ ime chadayanti maghattaye

original: RV_05.079.05.2 pari cid vaṣṭayo dadhur dadato rādho ahrayaṃ sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: pari cit vaṣṭayaḥ dadataḥ rādhaḥ ahrayam su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.06.1 aiṣu dhā vīravad yaśa uṣo maghoni sūriṣu
analyzed: ā eṣu dhāḥ vīravat yaśaḥ uṣaḥ maghoni sūriṣu

original: RV_05.079.06.2 ye no rādhāṃsy ahrayā maghavāno arāsata sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: ye naḥ rādhāṃsi ahrayā maghavānaḥ arāsata su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.07.1 tebhyo dyumnam bṛhad yaśa uṣo maghony ā vaha
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ uṣaḥ maghoni ā vaha

original: RV_05.079.07.2 ye no rādhāṃsy aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: ye naḥ rādhāṃsi aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.08.1 uta no gomatīr iṣa ā vahā duhitar divaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ ā vaha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_05.079.08.2 sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhir arcibhiḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhiḥ arcibhiḥ su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.09.1 vy uchā duhitar divo mā ciraṃ tanuthā apaḥ
analyzed: vi ucha duhitar divaḥ mā ciram tanuthāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_05.079.09.2 net tvā stenaṃ yathā ripuṃ tapāti sūro arciṣā sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: na id tvā stenam yathā ripum tapāti sūraḥ arciṣā su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.079.10.1 etāvad ved uṣas tvam bhūyo vā dātum arhasi
analyzed: etāvat vā id uṣaḥ tvam bhūyas vā dātum arhasi

original: RV_05.079.10.2 yā stotṛbhyo vibhāvary uchantī na pramīyase sujāte aśvasūnṛte
analyzed: yā stotṛbhyaḥ vibhāvarī uchantī na pramīyase su jāte aśva sūnṛte

original: RV_05.080.01.1 dyutadyāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsuṃ vibhātīm
analyzed: dyutat yāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsum vibhātīm

original: RV_05.080.01.2 devīm uṣasaṃ svar āvahantīm prati viprāso matibhir jarante
analyzed: devīm uṣasam svar āvahantīm prati viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ jarante

original: RV_05.080.02.1 eṣā janaṃ darśatā bodhayantī sugān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāty agre
analyzed: eṣā janam darśatā bodhayantī su gān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāti agre

original: RV_05.080.02.2 bṛhadrathā bṛhatī viśvaminvoṣā jyotir yachaty agre ahnām
analyzed: bṛhat rathā bṛhatī viśvaminvā uṣāḥ jyotiḥ yacchati agre ahnām

original: RV_05.080.03.1 eṣā gobhir aruṇebhir yujānāsredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre
analyzed: eṣā gobhiḥ aruṇebhiḥ yujānā a sredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre

original: RV_05.080.03.2 patho radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśvavārā vi bhāti
analyzed: pathaḥ radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśva vārā vi bhāti

original: RV_05.080.04.1 eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhā āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt
analyzed: eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhāḥ āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt

original: RV_05.080.04.2 ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anu eti sādhu prajānatī iva na diśaḥ mināti

original: RV_05.080.05.1 eṣā śubhrā na tanvo vidānordhveva snātī dṛśaye no asthāt
analyzed: eṣā śubhrā na tanvaḥ vidānā ūrdhvā iva snātī dṛśaye naḥ asthāt

original: RV_05.080.05.2 apa dveṣo bādhamānā tamāṃsy uṣā divo duhitā jyotiṣāgāt
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ bādhamānā tamāṃsi uṣāḥ divaḥ duhitā jyotiṣā āgāt

original: RV_05.080.06.1 eṣā pratīcī duhitā divo nṝn yoṣeva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ
analyzed: eṣā pratīcī duhitā divaḥ nṝn yoṣā iva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ

original: RV_05.080.06.2 vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotir yuvatiḥ pūrvathākaḥ
analyzed: vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotiḥ yuvatiḥ pūrvathā akaḥ

original: RV_05.081.01.1 yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: yuñjate manaḥ uta yuñjate dhiyaḥ viprāḥ viprasya bṛhataḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: RV_05.081.01.2 vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ
analyzed: vi hotrā dadhe vayunā vid ekaḥ id mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ

original: RV_05.081.02.1 viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade catuṣpade
analyzed: viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīt bhadram dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_05.081.02.2 vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso vi rājati
analyzed: vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyaḥ nu prayāṇam uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_05.081.03.1 yasya prayāṇam anv anya id yayur devā devasya mahimānam ojasā
analyzed: yasya prayāṇam anu anye id yayuḥ devāḥ devasya mahimānam ojasā

original: RV_05.081.03.2 yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśo rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā
analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni vimame saḥ etaśaḥ rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā

original: RV_05.081.04.1 uta yāsi savitas trīṇi rocanota sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi
analyzed: uta yāsi savitar trīṇi rocanā uta sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi

original: RV_05.081.04.2 uta rātrīm ubhayataḥ parīyasa uta mitro bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: uta rātrīm ubhayatas parīyase uta mitraḥ bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_05.081.04.1 uteśiṣe prasavasya tvam eka id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ
analyzed: uta īśiṣe prasavasya tvam ekaḥ id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_05.081.04.2 utedaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājasi śyāvāśvas te savita stomam ānaśe
analyzed: uta idam viśvam bhuvanam vi rājasi śyāvāśvaḥ te savitaḥ stomam ānaśe

original: RV_05.082.01.1 tat savitur vṛṇīmahe vayaṃ devasya bhojanam
analyzed: tat savituḥ vṛṇīmahe vayam devasya bhojanam

original: RV_05.082.01.2 śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadhātamaṃ turam bhagasya dhīmahi
analyzed: śreṣṭham sarva dhātamam turam bhagasya dhīmahi

original: RV_05.082.02.1 asya hi svayaśastaraṃ savituḥ kac cana priyam
analyzed: asya hi sva yaśastaram savituḥ kad cana priyam

original: RV_05.082.02.2 na minanti svarājyam
analyzed: na minanti sva rājyam

original: RV_05.082.03.1 sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ
analyzed: sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ

original: RV_05.082.03.2 tam bhāgaṃ citram īmahe
analyzed: tam bhāgam citram īmahe

original: RV_05.082.04.1 adyā no deva savitaḥ prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam
analyzed: adyā naḥ deva savitar prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam

original: RV_05.082.04.2 parā duṣvapnyaṃ suva
analyzed: parā duṣvapnyam suva

original: RV_05.082.05.1 viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva
analyzed: viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva

original: RV_05.082.05.2 yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva
analyzed: yat bhadram tat naḥ ā suva

original: RV_05.082.06.1 anāgaso aditaye devasya savituḥ save
analyzed: anāgasaḥ aditaye devasya savituḥ save

original: RV_05.082.06.2 viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi
analyzed: viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_05.082.07.1 ā viśvadevaṃ satpatiṃ sūktair adyā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: ā viśva devam sat patim sūktaiḥ adya vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_05.082.07.2 satyasavaṃ savitāram
analyzed: satya savam savitāram

original: RV_05.082.08.1 ya ime ubhe ahanī pura ety aprayuchan
analyzed: yaḥ ime ubhe ahanī puras eti aprayuchan

original: RV_05.082.08.2 svādhīr devaḥ savitā
analyzed: svādhīḥ devaḥ savitā

original: RV_05.082.09.1 ya imā viśvā jātāny āśrāvayati ślokena
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā jātāni āśrāvayati ślokena

original: RV_05.082.09.2 pra ca suvāti savitā
analyzed: pra ca suvāti savitā

original: RV_05.083.01.1 achā vada tavasaṃ gīrbhir ābhi stuhi parjanyaṃ namasā vivāsa
analyzed: achā vada tavasam gīrbhiḥ ābhiḥ stuhi parjanyam namasā vivāsa

original: RV_05.083.01.2 kanikradad vṛṣabho jīradānū reto dadhāty oṣadhīṣu garbham
analyzed: kanikradat vṛṣabhaḥ jīra dānuḥ retaḥ dadhāti oṣadhīṣu garbham

original: RV_05.083.02.1 vi vṛkṣān hanty uta hanti rakṣaso viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam mahāvadhāt
analyzed: vi vṛkṣān hanti uta hanti rakṣasaḥ viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam mahā vadhāt

original: RV_05.083.02.2 utānāgā īṣate vṛṣṇyāvato yat parjanya stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: uta anāgāḥ īṣate vṛṣṇyāvataḥ yat parjanyaḥ stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_05.083.03.1 rathīva kaśayāśvāṃ abhikṣipann āvir dūtān kṛṇute varṣyṛṃ aha
analyzed: rathī iva kaśayā aśvām abhikṣipan āvis dūtān kṛṇute varṣyṛm aha

original: RV_05.083.03.2 dūrāt siṃhasya stanathā ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyaṃ nabhaḥ
analyzed: dūrāt siṃhasya stanathau ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyam nabhaḥ

original: RV_05.083.04.1 pra vātā vānti patayanti vidyuta ud oṣadhīr jihate pinvate svaḥ
analyzed: pra vātāḥ vānti patayanti vidyutaḥ ud oṣadhīḥ jihate pinvate svar

original: RV_05.083.04.2 irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīṃ retasāvati
analyzed: irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm retasā avati

original: RV_05.083.05.1 yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavaj jarbhurīti
analyzed: yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavat jarbhurīti

original: RV_05.083.05.2 yasya vrata oṣadhīr viśvarūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma yacha
analyzed: yasya vrate oṣadhīḥ viśva rūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha

original: RV_05.083.06.1 divo no vṛṣṭim maruto rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇo aśvasya dhārāḥ
analyzed: divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya dhārāḥ

original: RV_05.083.06.2 arvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ
analyzed: arvāṅ etena stanayitnunā ihi apaḥ niṣiñcan asuraḥ pitā naḥ

original: RV_05.083.07.1 abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhā udanvatā pari dīyā rathena
analyzed: abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhāḥ udanvatā pari dīya rathena

original: RV_05.083.07.2 dṛtiṃ su karṣa viṣitaṃ nyañcaṃ samā bhavantūdvato nipādāḥ
analyzed: dṛtim su karṣa viṣitam nyañcam samāḥ bhavantu udvataḥ nipādāḥ

original: RV_05.083.08.1 mahāntaṃ kośam ud acā ni ṣiñca syandantāṃ kulyā viṣitāḥ purastāt
analyzed: mahāntam kośam ud aca ni siñca syandantām kulyāḥ viṣitāḥ purastāt

original: RV_05.083.08.2 ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vy undhi suprapāṇam bhavatv aghnyābhyaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vi undhi su prapāṇam bhavatu aghnyābhyaḥ

original: RV_05.083.09.1 yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_05.083.09.2 pratīdaṃ viśvam modate yat kiṃ ca pṛthivyām adhi
analyzed: prati idam viśvam modate yat kim ca pṛthivyām adhi

original: RV_05.083.10.1 avarṣīr varṣam ud u ṣū gṛbhāyākar dhanvāny atyetavā u
analyzed: avarṣīḥ varṣam ud u su gṛbhāya akaḥ dhanvāni atyetavai u

original: RV_05.083.10.2 ajījana oṣadhīr bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyo 'vido manīṣām
analyzed: ajījanaḥ oṣadhīḥ bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyaḥ vidaḥ manīṣām

original: RV_05.084.01.1 baḷ itthā parvatānāṃ khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi
analyzed: baḷ itthā parvatānām khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi

original: RV_05.084.01.2 pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini
analyzed: pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini

original: RV_05.084.02.1 stomāsas tvā vicāriṇi prati ṣṭobhanty aktubhiḥ
analyzed: stomāsaḥ tvā vicāriṇi prati stobhanti aktubhiḥ

original: RV_05.084.02.2 pra yā vājaṃ na heṣantam perum asyasy arjuni
analyzed: pra yā vājam na heṣantam perum asyasi arjuni

original: RV_05.084.03.1 dṛḷhā cid yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣy ojasā
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣi ojasā

original: RV_05.084.03.2 yat te abhrasya vidyuto divo varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: yat te abhrasya vidyutaḥ divaḥ varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_05.085.00.11 pra samrāje bṛhad arcā gabhīram brahma priyaṃ varuṇāya śrutāya
analyzed: pra samrāje bṛhat arcā gabhīram brahma priyam varuṇāya śrutāya

original: RV_05.085.00.12 vi yo jaghāna śamiteva carmopastire pṛthivīṃ sūryāya
analyzed: vi yaḥ jaghāna śamitā iva carma upastire pṛthivīm sūryāya

original: RV_05.085.00.21 vaneṣu vy antarikṣaṃ tatāna vājam arvatsu paya usriyāsu
analyzed: vaneṣu vi antarikṣam tatāna vājam arvatsu payaḥ usriyāsu

original: RV_05.085.00.22 hṛtsu kratuṃ varuṇo apsv agniṃ divi sūryam adadhāt somam adrau
analyzed: hṛtsu kratum varuṇaḥ apsu agnim divi sūryam adadhāt somam adrau

original: RV_05.085.00.31 nīcīnabāraṃ varuṇaḥ kavandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam
analyzed: nīcīna bāram varuṇaḥ kabandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_05.085.00.32 tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir vy unatti bhūma
analyzed: tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavam na vṛṣṭiḥ vi unatti bhūma

original: RV_05.085.00.41 unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yadā dugdhaṃ varuṇo vaṣṭy ād it
analyzed: unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyām yadā dugdham varuṇaḥ vaṣṭi āt id

original: RV_05.085.00.42 sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsas taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ
analyzed: sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsaḥ taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ

original: RV_05.085.00.51 imām ū ṣv ṛsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyāṃ varuṇasya pra vocam
analyzed: imām u su ṛsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyām varuṇasya pra vocam

original: RV_05.085.00.52 māneneva tasthivāṃ antarikṣe vi yo mame pṛthivīṃ sūryeṇa
analyzed: mānena iva tasthivān antarikṣe vi yaḥ mame pṛthivīm sūryeṇa

original: RV_05.085.00.61 imām ū nu kavitamasya māyām mahīṃ devasya nakir ā dadharṣa
analyzed: imām u nu kavitamasya māyām mahīm devasya nakir ā dadharṣa

original: RV_05.085.00.62 ekaṃ yad udnā na pṛṇanty enīr āsiñcantīr avanayaḥ samudram
analyzed: ekam yat udnā na pṛṇanti enīḥ āsiñcantīḥ avanayaḥ samudram

original: RV_05.085.00.71 aryamyaṃ varuṇa mitryaṃ vā sakhāyaṃ vā sadam id bhrātaraṃ vā
analyzed: aryamyam varuṇa mitryam vā sakhāyam vā sadam id bhrātaram vā

original: RV_05.085.00.72 veśaṃ vā nityaṃ varuṇāraṇaṃ vā yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā śiśrathas tat
analyzed: veśam vā nityam varuṇa araṇam vā yat sīm āgaḥ cakṛma śiśrathaḥ tat

original: RV_05.085.00.81 kitavāso yad riripur na dīvi yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma
analyzed: kitavāsaḥ yat riripuḥ na dīvi yat vā gha satyam uta yat na vidma

original: RV_05.085.00.82 sarvā tā vi ṣya śithireva devādhā te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ
analyzed: sarvā tā vi sya śithirā iva deva adha te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ

original: RV_05.086.01.1 indrāgnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam
analyzed: indra agnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam

original: RV_05.086.01.2 dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīr iva tritaḥ
analyzed: dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīḥ iva tritaḥ

original: RV_05.086.02.1 yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā
analyzed: yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā

original: RV_05.086.02.2 yā pañca carṣaṇīr abhṝndrāgnī tā havāmahe
analyzed: yā pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhṛ indra agnī tā havāmahe

original: RV_05.086.03.1 tayor id amavac chavas tigmā didyun maghonoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ id amavat śavaḥ tigmā didyut maghonoḥ

original: RV_05.086.03.2 prati druṇā gabhastyor gavāṃ vṛtraghna eṣate
analyzed: prati druṇā gabhastyoḥ gavām vṛtra ghne eṣate

original: RV_05.086.04.1 tā vām eṣe rathānām indrāgnī havāmahe
analyzed: tā vām eṣe rathānām indra agnī havāmahe

original: RV_05.086.04.2 patī turasya rādhaso vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā
analyzed: patī turasya rādhasaḥ vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā

original: RV_05.086.05.1 tā vṛdhantāv anu dyūn martāya devāv adabhā
analyzed: tā vṛdhantau anu dyūn martāya devau adabhā

original: RV_05.086.05.2 arhantā cit puro dadhe 'ṃśeva devāv arvate
analyzed: arhantā cit puras dadhe ṃśā iva devau arvate

original: RV_05.086.06.1 evendrāgnibhyām ahāvi havyaṃ śūṣyaṃ ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adribhiḥ
analyzed: eva indra agnibhyām ahāvi havyam śūṣyam ghṛtam na pūtam adribhiḥ

original: RV_05.086.06.2 tā sūriṣu śravo bṛhad rayiṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣaṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam
analyzed: tā sūriṣu śravaḥ bṛhat rayim gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣam gṛṇatsu didhṛtam

original: RV_05.087.01.1 pra vo mahe matayo yantu viṣṇave marutvate girijā evayāmarut
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe matayaḥ yantu viṣṇave marutvate giri jāḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.01.2 pra śardhāya prayajyave sukhādaye tavase bhandadiṣṭaye dhunivratāya śavase
analyzed: pra śardhāya prayajyave su khādaye tavase bhandat iṣṭaye dhuni vratāya śavase

original: RV_05.087.02.1 pra ye jātā mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvata evayāmarut
analyzed: pra ye jātāḥ mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvate eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.02.2 kratvā tad vo maruto nādhṛṣe śavo dānā mahnā tad eṣām adhṛṣṭāso nādrayaḥ
analyzed: kratvā tat vaḥ marutaḥ na ādhṛṣe śavaḥ dānā mahnā tat eṣām adhṛṣṭāsaḥ na adrayaḥ

original: RV_05.087.03.1 pra ye divo bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā suśukvānaḥ subhva evayāmarut
analyzed: pra ye divaḥ bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā su śukvānaḥ su bhvaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.03.2 na yeṣām irī sadhastha īṣṭa āṃ agnayo na svavidyutaḥ pra syandrāso dhunīnām
analyzed: na yeṣām sadhasthe īṣṭe ām agnayaḥ na sva vidyutaḥ pra syandrāsaḥ dhunīnām

original: RV_05.087.04.1 sa cakrame mahato nir urukramaḥ samānasmāt sadasa evayāmarut
analyzed: sa cakrame mahataḥ niḥ uru kramaḥ samānasmāt sadasaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.04.2 yadāyukta tmanā svād adhi ṣṇubhir viṣpardhaso vimahaso jigāti śevṛdho nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: yadā ayukta tmanā svāt adhi snubhiḥ viṣpardhasaḥ vimahasaḥ jigāti śevṛdhaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_05.087.05.1 svano na vo 'mavān rejayad vṛṣā tveṣo yayis taviṣa evayāmarut
analyzed: svanaḥ na vaḥ mavān rejayat vṛṣā tveṣaḥ yayiḥ taviṣaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.05.2 yenā sahanta ṛñjata svarociṣa sthāraśmāno hiraṇyayāḥ svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ
analyzed: yena sahantaḥ ṛñjata sva rociṣaḥ sthā raśmānaḥ hiraṇyayāḥ su āyudhāsaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_05.087.06.1 apāro vo mahimā vṛddhaśavasas tveṣaṃ śavo 'vatv evayāmarut
analyzed: apāraḥ vaḥ mahimā vṛddha śavasaḥ tveṣam śavaḥ vatu eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.06.2 sthātāro hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te na uruṣyatā nidaḥ śuśukvāṃso nāgnayaḥ
analyzed: sthātāraḥ hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te naḥ uruṣyata nidaḥ śuśukvāṃsaḥ nā agnayaḥ

original: RV_05.087.07.1 te rudrāsaḥ sumakhā agnayo yathā tuvidyumnā avantv evayāmarut
analyzed: te rudrāsaḥ su makhāḥ agnayaḥ yathā tuvi dyumnāḥ avantu eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.07.2 dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivaṃ yeṣām ajmeṣv ā mahaḥ śardhāṃsy adbhutainasām
analyzed: dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivam yeṣām ajmeṣu ā mahaḥ śardhāṃsi adbhuta enasām

original: RV_05.087.08.1 adveṣo no maruto gātum etana śrotā havaṃ jaritur evayāmarut
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ naḥ marutaḥ gātum etana śrota havam jarituḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.08.2 viṣṇor mahaḥ samanyavo yuyotana smad rathyo na daṃsanāpa dveṣāṃsi sanutaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ mahaḥ samanyavaḥ yuyotana smat rathyaḥ na daṃsanā apa dveṣāṃsi sanutar

original: RV_05.087.09.1 gantā no yajñaṃ yajñiyāḥ suśami śrotā havam arakṣa evayāmarut
analyzed: ganta naḥ yajñam yajñiyāḥ suśami śrota havam arakṣaḥ eva yā marut

original: RV_05.087.09.2 jyeṣṭhāso na parvatāso vyomani yūyaṃ tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavo nidaḥ
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāsaḥ na parvatāsaḥ vyomani yūyam tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavaḥ nidaḥ
